activities.name: L'Antica Pizzeria
activities.timing_content: Daily 8:30 AM - 12 AM
activities.information:
From Napoli to Dubai, discover the authentic taste of L’Antica Pizzeria da Michele. This popular pizzeria boasts three great locations in Dubai and takes great pride in their pizzas, using only Italian products, to offer an exquisite dining experience for your family and friends to enjoy.

  • Our Favorite Thing: The authentic taste 
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Traditional Napoletana Pizza

Reservation Not Required for Dubai Hills Mall & JBR branch. Walk-in basis only.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Akiba Dori
activities.address: Dubai Design District, Dubai Hills Mall
activities.timing_content: Daily 12 PM - 12 AM
activities.information:
Inspired by the neon-lit streets of one of Tokyo’s most popular areas, Akihabara, Akiba Dori combines Japanese street food with Japanese-Italian fusion pizzas, spread across two great locations in the city. This Tokyo-style restaurant features arcade games, bright neon lights, and anime characters. 

  • Our Favorite Thing: On Mondays enjoy unlimited Pizza for 2 hours for 99 AED
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Five Cheese Neapolitan Pizza

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Luigia
activities.timing_content:
Monday to Friday 5:30 PM - 12 AM
Saturday and Sunday 12:30 PM - 12 AM
activities.information:
Located inside Rixos Premium JBR, discover an Italian family feast at Luigia Dubai. The menu offers eight varieties of Margherita pizzas with over thirty toppings to choose from.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Brunch every weekend
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Langarola Pizza

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Bussola
activities.address: The Westin Dubai Mina Seyahi, Dubai Marina
activities.timing_content:
Monday to Friday 12 PM - 3 PM / 6 PM - 11 PM

Saturday and Sunday 12 PM - 4 PM / 6 PM - 11 PM
activities.information:
Bussola at The Westin Dubai Mina Seyahi has been serving outstanding Italian cuisine for over 21 years. The long-standing restaurant and pizzeria offers an extensive pizza menu and features an expansive outdoor terrace overlooking the pool and beach. 

  • Our Favorite Thing: The relaxed family atmosphere
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: La Tartufata Pizza (Truffle Pizza)

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Pitfire Pizza
activities.timing_content: Daily 11 AM - 11 PM
activities.information:
Pitfire Pizza is a homegrown pizzeria with multiple locations across Dubai. Using only locally sourced ingredients, their signature artisan dough takes up to 72 hours to make. Their pizza toppings and dressings are also made fresh daily. Reservation Not Required.

  • Our Favorite Thing: 10- and 15-inch size pizzas available
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: The Palm Pizza

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Motorino Pizzeria
activities.timing_content:
Sunday to Thursday 12 PM - 11 PM
Friday and Saturday 12 PM - 12 AM
activities.information:
Renowned as ‘The Best Pizza in New York’, world-famous New York pizzeria Motorino has finally arrived in Dubai, at JA Ocean View Hotel in JBR.

Loved by celebrities and foodies alike, the iconic pizzeria has since expanded to nine locations worldwide, from Hong Kong to Singapore.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Pizza Hour, 2-hours of free-flowing pizza and drinks from 3pm to 7pm
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Pizza Al Tartufo e Porcini

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.timing_content: Daily 12 PM - 2 AM
activities.information:
Blu Pizzeria presents a harbourside casual dining experience, with a limited menu offering only seven pizzas. The wood-fired, sourdough-crusted Neapolitan-style pizza is one of the city’s most exciting new openings. Reservation Not Required.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Great spot for a casual dinner on the waterfront
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Tartufo Pizza

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.timing_content: Daily 11 AM - 12 AM
activities.information:
Pizzeria Pulcinella is a local Italian restaurant in Dubai, serving a selection of Italian, Pizza, and Mediterranean food in Sports City. Chef Domenico and his wife Claudia have imported Napolitano cuisine to Dubai, maintaining a focus on simplicity rather than sophistication. Reservation Not Required.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Family run restaurant serving authentic pizza
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Bufalina

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.timing_content: Daily 7 AM - 12 AM
activities.information:
Seven Seeds Restaurant in Jumeirah 1 serves quality food, including a wide selection of pizza with great service to match – and a lovely backyard full of greenery.

  • Our Favorite Thing: This venue is dog-friendly
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Margherita Pizza

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

Sunday to Thursday 11 AM - 11 PM

Friday and Saturday 11 AM - 11:30 PM
activities.information:
Rossovivo serves a variety of Italian dishes and authentic pizza prepared using the freshest ingredients. There are two locations in Dubai (Millennium Tower in Business Bay and Media City) and they offer a friendly dine-in experience.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Delivery options are available across the city

Günaydin Dubai is the first restaurant outside of Turkey for this popular chain. Located in Souk Al Bahar and overlooking Burj Khalifa, Günaydin presents an authentic Turkish dining experience serving traditional flavors.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Front-row views overlooking The Dubai Fountain Show
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Yuvalama Çorbası

Dress Code: Casual

Entry & Age Policy: Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

activities.timing_content: Daily 9 AM - 1 AM
activities.information:
Popular Turkish restaurant Sirali Kebap is the latest addition to the dining scene in Business Bay. Sirali serves quality meat-focused dishes and is deeply committed to the traditional aspect of its recipes.

  • Our Favorite Thing: The glass cube area allows guests to view the master butchers at work 
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Adana Kebab with Yoghurt

Dress Code: Smart Casual

Entry & Age Policy: Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

activities.timing_content: Daily 8 AM - 1 AM
activities.information:
Sultan Saray restaurant presents traditional Turkish flavors in Dubai with a commitment to quality and service. The menu consists of authentic Turkish salads and succulent meats, serving a variety of mezze, kebabs, and tempting desserts that will transport you on a culinary journey to Turkey.

  • Our Favorite Thing: A selection of over 120 dishes on the menu
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Sultan Kabab

Dress Code: Casual

Entry & Age Policy: Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

activities.timing_content: Daily 9 AM - 4 AM
activities.information:
Bebek Dubai is a delightful restaurant that brings the warmth of Turkish hospitality to Jumeirah. Known for its authentic dishes and cozy ambiance, Bebek offers a menu that showcases the best of Turkish cuisine, inviting guests to indulge in rich flavors and traditional recipes.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Location in the Heart of Jumeirah
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Meat Iskender

Dress Code: Smart Casual

Entry & Age Policy: Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Not required

Minimum Spend Policy: None

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: RÜYA
activities.timing_content: Daily 12 PM - 1 AM
activities.information:
Located on the third floor of St. Regis Dubai The Palm, RÜYA serves authentic Anatolian cuisine from Head Chef Gökhan Çökelez. RÜYA which translates to ‘dream’ in Turkish, presents a warm atmosphere with Byzantine-inspired interiors, offering an enticing culinary menu designed for sharing. Enjoy Turkish classics like kebabs, pide, manti and more.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Portions are more than generous
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Flavorful cocktail Nazar Sour 

Dress Code: Smart Casual

﻿Entry & Age Policy: Guests aged 11 and below can stay until 10 PM only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Not required

Minimum Spend Policy: None

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Gigi Rigolatto
activities.timing_content:
Restaurant: Monday-Thursday 12 PM - 6:30 PM / 7 PM - 1 AM

Friday-Sunday 12 PM - 5:00 PM / 8 PM - 1 AM

Pool: Daily 10 AM to sunset

The Bellini Bar: Daily 10 AM to sunset
activities.information:
Gigi Rigolatto Dubai is an refined Italian restaurant nestled along the stunning shores of Jumeirah at J1 Beach. With a lively atmosphere and breathtaking views, guests can indulge in a menu crafted from the finest ingredients, celebrating the essence of Italian cuisine. The venue also features beautifully designed outdoor terraces, a vibrant bar, cabanas, and a dedicated space for families.

  • Our Favorite Thing: St.Tropez Vibes in the Heart of Jumeirah
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Linguine Ala Vongolo

Dress Code: Smart Casual

Entry & Age Policy: For lunch, all ages are welcome on weekdays. On weekends, children are allowed during the first service only. For dinner, children are permitted until 8:30 PM only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required - a cancellation/no-show fee of AED 200 per guest applies.

Minimum Spend Policy: Thursday to Sunday only

Lunch First service: 12 PM - 2 PM AED 500 minimum spend per person

Lunch Second service: 3 PM - 4:30 PM AED 1,000 minimum spend per person

Dinner service: AED 500 minimum spend per person.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Clap
activities.timing_content: Daily 12 PM - 3 AM
activities.information:
Situated on the largest rooftop in DIFC, Clap Dubai consists of an indoor restaurant, an outdoor terrace, and two lounge bars which can accommodate up to 300 guests. This popular Beirut-born restaurant presents spectacular views and innovative Japanese cuisine, including vegan-friendly dishes, hot and cold starters, signature mains, rolls, nigiris, and makis to suit your appetite.

  • Our Favorite Thing: The hidden speakeasy Ongaku
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Salmon Clap Cloud

Dress Code: Smart Casual 

Entry & Age Policy: Children are allowed until 10 PM only. After 10 PM, the venue is restricted to ages 21 and above. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required. A cancellation/no-show fee of AED 200 per guest applies.

Minimum Spend Policy: Required to have a full dining experience per guest. For group reservations of 8 guests and above, AED 500 minimum spend per guest applies.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Amazonico
activities.timing_content: Daily 12 PM - 3 AM
activities.information:
Madrid’s most loved restaurant, Amazonico, hosts a popular dining concept in the bustling DIFC district, created by world-renowned restaurateurs Sandro Silva and Marta Seco. Inspired by the Amazon region, the three-story venue has a glamorous jungle feel, offering a mix of Latin American and Peruvian cuisine.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Enjoy signature cocktails and electro beats on the rooftop terrace
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Bife Angosto Wagyu 

Dress Code: Smart Casual 

Entry & Age Policy: All ages are welcome until 9:30 PM; after 9:30 PM, guests must be over the age of 10. Lounge bar is restricted to guests aged 21 and older. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required for group reservations of 4 guests and above – a cancellation/no-show fee of AED 200 plus 7% DIFC Fee per guest applies.

Minimum Spend Policy: Depends on the number of guests.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.timing_content: Daily 12 PM until late
activities.information:
Founded in 1927 at the famous Place de la Madeleine in Paris, Kaspia Dubai offers French fine dining with a Russian twist. Located in the vibrant DIFC district, this Parisian institution provides an intimate dining experience with lively tunes from the resident DJ throughout the night.

  • Our Favorite Thing: A creative selection of home-made infused vodkas
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Baked Potato with Caviar

Dress Code: Smart Elegant 

Entry & Age Policy: On weekends after 10 PM, only guests aged 21 and above are permitted. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Not required

Minimum Spend Policy: None

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Sushi Samba
activities.address: The St. Regis Dubai, Palm Jumeirah
activities.timing_content:
Monday to Thursday 12 PM - 3 PM / 6 PM - 2 AM

Friday 12 PM - 3 PM / 6 PM - 3 AM

Saturday 1 PM - 3:30 PM / 6 PM - 3 AM

Sunday 1 PM - 3:30 PM / 6 PM - 2 AM
activities.information:
Dine in the clouds on the 51st floor of Palm Tower. Sushi Samba offers 360-degree views of the iconic Palm Jumeirah, Arabian Gulf, Ain Dubai, and Dubai Marina. The world-famous restaurant features an open kitchen concept with live performers and music, celebrating the culture and cuisine of Japan, Brazil, and Peru.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Panoramic sweeping views of the city skyline
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Samba Dubai 

Dress Code: Smart Casual

Entry & Age Policy: Guests below 21 years are allowed until 9 PM only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required – a cancellation/no-show fee of AED 250 per guest applies.

Minimum Spend Policy: From Sunday to Wednesday, AED 650 per guest for window tables, regular tables have no minimum spend. From Thursday to Saturday, for regular tables AED 300 per guest from 6 PM to 7:45 PM, and AED 400 per guest from 8 PM onwards. For window tables, the minimum spend is AED 900 per guest.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Sexy Fish
activities.timing_content: Daily 5 PM - 2 AM
activities.information:
Sexy Fish Dubai offers a lavish dining experience, seamlessly blending contemporary Asian cuisine with mesmerizing ocean-inspired interiors. Located in DIFC, the venue boasts a vibrant ambiance, world-class art installations, and an extensive cocktail menu. Perfect for indulgent evenings and chic celebrations, Sexy Fish redefines luxury dining in Dubai.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Artistic Design
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Maki Rolls

Dress Code: Stylish Chic

Entry & Age Policy: Guests under the age of 21 are allowed until 9 PM. After 9 PM, entry is restricted to 21 and above only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required – a cancellation fee of AED 150 for lunch and AED 300 for dinner per guest applies, no-show incurs the agreed minimum spend.

Minimum Spend Policy: Sunday to Wednesday (11 PM onwards): AED 450 min spend per guest; AED 550 for 10 guests and above with AED 200 pre-payment per guest. Thursday to Saturday (9 PM onwards): AED 600 per guest (indoor), AED 450 (outdoor). AED 200 pre-payment for 5 guests and above.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Coya Dubai
activities.timing_content: Daily 12 PM - 3:30 PM / 6:30 PM - 2 AM
activities.information:
Located at the popular Four Seasons Resort Restaurant Village, COYA Dubai brings the spirit of Latin America to Dubai. The award-winning restaurant offers a mix of traditional Peruvian dishes, including ceviche, sharing plates, and char-grilled fish and meat, all to be enjoyed among the setting of bespoke hand-carved furnishings, Peruvian trinkets, and contemporary art.

  • Our Favorite Thing: The members-only lounge, featuring live entertainment on the weekends
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Guacamole – served with Corn Tortilla Chips and Shrimp Crackers 

Dress Code: Smart Casual 

Entry & Age Policy: For lunch, all ages are welcome. For dinner, guests under 5 are welcome until 9:30 PM; after 9:30 PM, only guests aged 5 and above are permitted. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required for group reservations of 4 guests and above. A cancellation/no-show fee of AED 200 per guest applies.

Minimum Spend Policy: For group reservations of 9 guests and above, AED 750 per guest applies.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.timing_content:
Monday - Closed

Tuesday to Sunday 9 PM - 3 AM
activities.information:
Founded in 1998 by world-renowned F1 legend Flavio Briatore, Billionaire Dubai presents a high-end dining experience, featuring live entertainment and Japanese and Italian flavors. Guests enjoy a set five course menu and experience energetic live dance performances and acrobatic shows throughout the night. Billionaire is truly an electric experience for a night to remember.

  • Our Favorite Thing: The great music and live performances     
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Caviar  

Dress Code: Smart Elegant

Dress Code: Smart Casual

Entry & Age Policy: Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

activities.timing_content: Daily 12 PM - 3:30 PM / 6 PM until midnight
activities.information:
World-renowned restaurant L'Atelier by Joël Robuchon is located in the trendy DIFC district. Famous for high-end French cuisine, L'Atelier focuses on healthy, seasonal produce and uses minimal ingredients to allow their culinary creations to shine.

Dress Code: Smart Casual / Elegant

STAY offers an unforgettable fine dining experience with French cuisine curated by Chef Yannick Alléno. The restaurant features elegant décor, including an outdoor terrace with stunning views of the grand pool and secluded gardens at One&Only The Palm Jumeirah.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Each dish presented resembles a work of art 
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Foie Gras

Dress Code: Smart Elegant – long trousers for men

MINA Brasserie welcomes guests to a contemporary brasserie-style dining experience in DIFC, led by award-winning chef Michael Mina and serving classic European favorites. It is located on the podium level of the Four Seasons DIFC with lush greenery and elegant chandeliers for the perfect dining setting.

Carine serves award-winning French-Mediterranean cuisine created by popular chef Izu Ani at Emirates Golf Club. The outdoor terrace boasts spectacular views across the greenery of the golf course.

  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Lobster Linguine

activities.information:
LPM Dubai presents a culinary fine dining experience in DIFC, inspired by the charm of the French Riviera. Having first opened its doors over a decade ago, guests can enjoy fresh Mediterranean cuisine, often recommended to be shared, for a memorable dining experience.

Inspired by the South of France, globally acclaimed restaurant Bagatelle is one of the top party spots in Dubai, welcoming guests from all over the world to enjoy the fun atmosphere and classic French cuisine. Guests can expect upbeat tunes and entertainment until the early hours of the morning.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Upbeat performances from the dancing wait staff
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Pomme Spunta Farcie Aux Champignons

Dress Code: Smart Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: Guests below 21 years are welcome when accompanied by adults. However, please be advised that the venue will be a fully smoking area with a more festive ambiance and loud music. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required – a cancellation/no-show fee of AED 100 per guest applies.

Minimum Spend Policy: For Tuesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and holidays AED 500 per guest applies.

  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Tartare de Boeuf

activities.name: Bistro Des Arts

Guests can enjoy a lush outdoor garden terrace, featuring panoramic views of DIFC and lively DJ tunes throughout the evening.

activities.timing_content:
Daily 9 AM until late

Last order 11 PM
activities.information:
Josette brings Parisian glamour to the DIFC dining scene, inspired by the iconic French actress Josette Day. Expect a refined menu of reimagined French classics, including foie gras and escargot. Artistic director Sebastien Agius delivers a theatrical dining experience, combining different dance styles for your viewing pleasure.

Josette will also house Petit Josette, a Parisian street-style café, serving indulgent breakfasts to late afternoon lunches.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Josette’s very own Josette French bubbly 
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Signature Poulet Roti

Dress Code: Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: Please be informed that children of all ages are welcome for breakfast while children aged 6 and above are welcome for lunch. 16 years old and above are welcome for sparkling afternoons, brunch, and dinner from 7 PM – 10 PM. Josette loves a late-night soirée so after 10 PM it’s 21 and over only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required for group reservations of 8 guests and above. A cancellation/no-show fee of AED 100 for lunch and afternoon tea, AED 150 for dinner per guest applies.

Minimum Spend Policy: Requires to have a full dining experience.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

Located in Dubai’s DIFC district, Chic Nonna presents an elegant two-story Osteria gourmet and lounge, serving fine Italian cuisine with an extensive vintage wine selection from the largest wine cellar in the region. Zuma Dubai is a popular award-winning restaurant, serving modern Japanese cuisine in a sleek and stylish setting spanning two floors in DIFC. The menu is based around the Japanese Izakaya style of dining, an informal and fun food-sharing concept. Children are allowed to dine in the restaurant section, although the upper lounge area is only open to adults.

This popular Beirut-born restaurant presents spectacular views and innovative Japanese cuisine, including vegan-friendly dishes, hot and cold starters, signature mains, rolls, nigiris, and makis to suit your appetite.

Expect contemporary Japanese classics with a twist, including an extensive selection of small plates, signature maki roll creations, cold bites, gyoza, and more. Chic colonial-style interiors with a low-key jazz soundtrack transport you to an oriental age inspired by 1920s Osaka.

  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Oven Baked Black Cod

Located in DIFC, the venue boasts a vibrant ambiance, world-class art installations, and an extensive cocktail menu. Perfect for indulgent evenings and chic celebrations, Sexy Fish redefines luxury dining in Dubai.

Featuring a menu that celebrates the freshest seafood and vibrant Mediterranean flavors, the restaurant offers a refined yet relaxed dining experience. With its elegant design and breathtaking ocean views, Sirene by Gaia is the perfect destination for romantic dinners, leisurely lunches, or stylish seaside gatherings.

On weekends, enjoy ambient beats from the resident DJ while soaking in the mesmerizing views of the Arabian Gulf and the iconic Burj Al Arab.

The restaurant showcases a menu of authentic Mediterranean cuisine, crafted with the fine ingredients. With its warm ambiance, intimate design, and exceptional service, Casa Amor is the ideal destination for romantic evenings, special celebrations, or day time parties.

Expect exceptional Mediterranean-inspired cuisine and a festive atmosphere from day to night. Verde Beach is an ideal destination for a decadent feast and sophisticated beach relaxation, with soundtracks provided by world-class DJs.

Nobu by the Beach debuts a luxurious pool and beach club at Atlantis The Royal Dubai.

Lounge in your private cabana, sip on a signature cocktail, and enjoy inventive Japanese-Peruvian bites, sharing platters, and signature dishes. Nobu promises to meet all your expectations in a haven of indulgent relaxation.

Designed to resemble an Italian mansion, you can dine with a view of Burj Khalifa from the terrace and enjoy jazz-style performances throughout the evening.

  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Tiramisu

activities.information:
Inspired by Latin American and European influences, Chef Fernando Trocca prepares carefully sourced ingredients, combined with an open-fire cooking technique using charcoal and wood, all the way from South America to DIFC. Signature dishes include King Crab Tostada, Argentinian Ribeye, and Squid-Ink Paella, which are recommended to be shared.

activities.name: Babylon
activities.timing_content: Wednesday to Saturday 9 PM - 3 AM
activities.information:
Babylon Dubai is located in the popular DIFC district. The upscale venue is a mix between a restaurant and a club is inspired by the ancient city of Babylon. Indulge in a sharing menu, which includes a sushi selection and seafood platters, with live entertainment and the finest hospitality.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Great performances with an impressive fine dining menu
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Lobster and Tuna Carpaccio

Dress Code: Smart Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: The venue is for guests aged 21 and above only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Josette
activities.timing_content:
Daily 9 AM until late

Last order 11 PM
activities.information:
Josette welcomes Parisian glamor to the DIFC dining scene, inspired by the iconic French actress Josette Day. Expect a refined menu of reimagined French classics, including foie gras and escargot. Artistic director Sebastien Agius brings together exciting live performances of burlesque stars, tap dancers, and singers to deliver a classy theatrical dining experience viewing pleasure.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Josette’s very own Josette French bubbly 
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Signature Poulet Roti 

Dress Code: Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: Please be informed that children of all ages are welcome for breakfast while children aged 6 and above are welcome for lunch. 16 years old and above are welcome for sparkling afternoons, brunch, and dinner from 7 PM – 10 PM. Josette loves a late-night soirée so after 10 PM it’s 21 and over only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required for group reservations of 8 guests and above. A cancellation/no-show fee of AED 100 for lunch and afternoon tea, AED 150 for dinner per guest applies.

Minimum Spend Policy: Requires to have a full dining experience.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

Nestled on the 63rd floor of Address Downtown, Birds Dubai offers guests a sky-high dining experience with stunning views of Burj Khalifa. Guests can enjoy a unique theatrical dining experience with contemporary Japanese fusion cuisine.

  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Sushi Rolls

Dress Code: Chic & Elegant

Founded in 1998 by world-renowned F1 legend Flavio Briatore, Billionaire Dubai presents a high-end dining experience, featuring live entertainment and Japanese and Italian flavors. Guests enjoy a set five course menu and experience energetic live dance performances and acrobatic shows throughout the night. Billionaire is truly an electric experience for a night to remember.

  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Caviar  

Dress Code: Smart Elegant

activities.timing_content: Daily 12 PM - 12 AM

Shanghai ME presents a contemporary take on fine dining Asian cuisine and is inspired by 1930’s Art Deco elegance. The menu pays an ode to the region’s rich gastronomic heritage, offering a fusion of signature Asian dishes with a modern twist.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Designed by renowned architect Michele Bonan, the beautiful bamboo and banana tree filled terrace
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Crispy Duck Salad with Pine Nuts & Cress

Dress Code: Smart Elegant 

Entry & Age Policy: Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

activities.timing_content: Daily 7 PM - 1 AM
activities.information:
Buddha Bar Dubai located at the Grosvenor House in Dubai is a majestic two-storied restaurant and bar featuring overhead chandeliers, opulent décor, and large bay windows with exceptional views of Dubai Marina. Indulge in delicious Far-East & Asian flavors from an innovative menu inspired by the cuisines of China, Japan, and Thailand. Party upstairs at the Dragon Bar to the eclectic tunes from the resident DJ.

  • Our Favorite Thing: The Buddha statue designed by Bruno Tanquerel
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Buddha-Bar Maki 

Dress Code: Smart & Trendy. No Shorts Allowed.

BB Social Dining is a home-grown concept, set in a quiet corner of Dubai’s bustling DIFC district in a space formerly occupied by an art gallery. The menu focuses on clean and simple flavors, serving a variety of Modern Eastern cuisine from bites and baos to bowls and BBQ. Spread across three floors, the restaurant includes a bar, lounge, garden, and terrace connected by a grand spiral staircase.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Features a wide variety of dishes that cater to vegetarians and vegans
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: The Chestnut Bao

Famous rooftop-brand CÉ LA VI, originally from Marina Bay Sands Singapore, is located on the 54th floor of the iconic Address Sky View Dubai. Here, you can indulge in a contemporary Asian menu created by Executive Chef Howard Ko. The rooftop restaurant and lounge offer stunning views of Burj Khalifa, featuring a 360-degree outdoor dining terrace.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Picture perfect views of Burj Khalifa
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Scallop Ceviche

Dress Code: Smart Casual – shorts are permitted during lunch only.

activities.information:
MayaBay first opened in Monaco in 2005 and quickly became one of the most famous restaurants in the French Riviera. Defined by its unique interpretation of Thai and Japanese cuisines, MayaBay Dubai offers a memorable experience through its wide selection of tantalizing dishes and exotic interiors. Nestled in Jumeirah Al Naseem’s beautiful turtle lagoon, MayaBay Dubai brings a refined perspective on Asian dining from the heart of Monaco to Dubai.

  • Our Favorite Thing: A sophisticated dining setting with an energetic vibe 
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Prawn Dumplings

Dress Code: Smart Elegant

activities.timing_content: Daily 12 PM - 11:30 PM
activities.information:
Founded in November 2016 and well-known for serving standout Asian fusion seafood dishes, 3 Fils is an independently owned, unlicensed, casual dining experience that requires no reservations. Expect excellent service with a quality-focused menu of sushi rolls, carpaccio, king crab salads, marinated lamb ribs, and matcha chocolates for a reasonable price. Reservation Not Required.

  • Our Favorite Thing: 3 Fils has been voted the best restaurant in the Middle East and North Africa
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Yellowtail Carpaccio

Dress Code: Casual

SHI offers a sophisticated atmosphere reminiscent of the upscale restaurants in Hong Kong or Shanghai. Guests can expect an incredible culinary experience and social ambience with views overlooking the glittering skyline.

Karam Beirut is a favorite among locals and tourists, serving traditional Lebanese street food that consistently promises quality and great value.

The menu includes hot or cold mezze plates – the delicious salads and hummus are standout favorites. Authentic Lebanese juices are available, as well as desserts and smoothies.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Indoor and outdoor seating overlooking Ski Dubai at Mall of the Emirates.
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Lamb Meat Kebab

activities.timing_content: Daily 8 AM - 4 AM
activities.information:
Honoring its namesake, Al Beiruti embodies all things Beirut and brings the city’s undeniable soulfulness everywhere it goes, serving memories and aspirations while mixing the old with the new.

By combining the elements, one looks for in both a perfect restaurant and a homey café, the Al Beiruti Restau-Café experience sets the tone as soon as you take your first steps through the door.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Breakfast served all day
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Foul Medammas

Starting from AED 440 per person, guests can enjoy a selection of signature dishes such as Burgers, Tuna Tartare, Tataki, Lobster Rolls, and Crème Brûlée. Chic interiors and laid-back vibes create the perfect atmosphere for a relaxed brunch over the weekend. 

Dress Code: Casual

activities.information:
Arabian Tea House Restaurant & Café began its operations in 1997 and now has 4 locations across Dubai. Discover a selection of sandwiches, pastries, salads, and desserts to accompany your beverage of choice. Choose from over 150 different types of tea and drinks, including mint lemonade or a house blend of black tea with herbs and fruit.

Reservations must be made 36 hours in advance and are available for groups of 10 or more guests only. The venue does not accept reservations on Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. For small groups of fewer than 10 guests, walk-in basis only.

  • Our Favorite Thing: An oasis of peace and calm where tourists, locals, and a few famous faces come time and again
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Gahwa Traditional Coffee

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Al Khayma Heritage Restaurant
activities.timing_content: Daily 8 AM - 11 PM
activities.information:
Situated in the Al Fahidi Historical Neighborhood, this culture-conscious dining venue offers visitors the best of Middle Eastern flavors. Part-restaurant, part-museum, it features an extensive menu serving local favorites such as Dango and Biryani Laham, along with hearty meat-laden dishes and sizzling seafood platters.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Meal portions are very generous
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Mixed Grill

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.timing_content: Daily 9 AM - 10 PM
activities.information:
Located within one of the oldest houses in Al Fahidi, Local House offers guests a taste of authentic Emirati cuisine and culture. Established in 1997 by Mr. Khalid Al Halyan, it was the first Dubai restaurant to popularize camel burgers as an Arabian delicacy.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Historic Dubai Ambiance
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Camel Meat Burger

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

Weekend 10 AM - 1 AM
activities.information:
Logma Restaurant brings a delicious and innovative take on local and Khaleeji (Gulf) cuisine. Authentic traditional dishes are served in a relaxed, café-style setting at The Dubai Mall – perfect for families or groups.

Popular dishes include a Dubai delicacy known as Chips Oman or Lamb Machboos. Other must-try mains include Butter Chicken and Chicken Biryani. For a sweet ending, taste the Date Pudding or Lotus Karak Cake.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Located in Dubai Mall – a great spot to enjoy local cuisine after a day of shopping
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Pistachio Mafroukeh

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

Inspired by the neon-lit streets of Akihabara, one of Tokyo’s most popular areas, Akiba Dori combines Japanese street food with Japanese-Italian fusion pizzas, spread across two great locations in the city. The Tokyo-style restaurant offers arcade games with bright neon lights and anime characters. 

  • Our Favorite Thing: Great locations in D3 and Dubai Hills
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Black Angus Truffle Maki

activities.information:
Reif Japanese Kushiyaki describes its offering as ‘unconventional affordable Japanese street food’. In addition to kushiyaki, REIF features an exclusive chef’s table menu. The open kitchen concept allows you to discover the creation of these unique dishes. 

Reif Japanese Kushiyaki serves up the first bottle of tap-filtered still and sparkling water for free and they focus on minimizing food wastage.

  • Our Favorite Thing: The eatery uses local, hormone-free produce as well as seasonal seafood from France, Italy, and Australia
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Spicy Tuna Maki Rolls

Reservation Not Required for Dar Al Wasl & Time Out Market branch. Walk-in basis only.

Enjoy a special menu featuring Nobu’s famous Japanese cuisine with a Peruvian twist, including the popular Miso Black Cod and Yellowtail Sashimi with Jalapeno, for a culinary experience like no other.

  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Miso Black Cod

activities.information:
Dinner in the Sky Dubai offers an unforgettable, unique dining experience 50 meters above the ground. It has been selected by Forbes.com as one of the 10 most unusual restaurants in the world. Feast on a 3-course meal of your choice, suspended by a crane above Dubai Marina, with panoramic views of the Marina skyline, Palm Jumeirah, and Bluewaters Island. Enjoy lunch, dinner, or afternoon tea, all catered by top chefs from Le Meridien Hotel and The Westin Mina Seyahi Marina Resort.

activities.name: At.mosphere Burj Khalifa
activities.timing_content:
Restaurant: Daily 12 PM - 4 PM / 5:30 PM - 12 AM

Lounge: Daily 7 AM - 4 PM / 5:30 PM - 2 AM
activities.information:
At.mosphere presents an upscale fine dining restaurant, lounge, and bar located on the 122nd floor of the world's tallest tower, Burj Khalifa. This unique dining experience is one of the highest restaurants in the world, situated at 442 meters above the ground and offering guests a true 360° view of Dubai. Embark on a culinary journey through France and savor the rich flavors of modern French cuisine with a 13-course seasonal blind tasting menu, perfectly paired with beverages selected by expert sommeliers. Enjoy a decadent breakfast in the lounge or a 3-course Afternoon Tea in the Clouds.

  • Our Favorite Thing: One of the Highest & Best Views in Dubai
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Sea Bass

Dress Code: Smart Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: All ages are welcome for breakfast. Lunch is for ages 5 and above, and dinner is for ages 8 and above. Dinner and drinks special at the lounge, guests 8 and above are allowed until 7:30 PM; after that, it's 21 and above only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Reservation Policy: Required - a deposit per guest will be applied to secure the reservation. Non-refundable in case of late cancellation or no-show.

Minimum Spend Policy:

Breakfast (Lounge): AED 250 minimum spend per person

Lunch: AED 350 minimum spend per person for a non-window table, AED 500 minimum spend per person for a window table

Dinner: AED 500 minimum spend per person for a non-window table, AED 850 minimum spend per person for a window table

Dinner and Drinks (Lounge): AED 350 minimum spend per person for a non-window table, AED 550 minimum spend per person for a window table

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc., can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Ossiano
activities.timing_content:
Daily 6 PM - 11 PM

Last seating: 9 PM
activities.information:
Seafood takes center stage at Ossiano Dubai, an acclaimed restaurant in the iconic Atlantis The Palm. This intimate underwater dining experience features a stunning floor-to-ceiling aquarium. The restaurant blends creativity with top-quality ingredients in a truly unforgettable setting.

  • Our Favorite Thing: The incredible aquarium view
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Caramelized Black Cod

Dress Code: Smart Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: Reservations and full pre-payment are required at least 24 hours in advance. 13 years and above only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required for a full pre-payment of AED 1,250 per guest. Non-refundable in case of cancellation or no-show.

Minimum Spend Policy: Set menu for food - AED 1,250 per guest, with drinks available à la carte.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Miso Lobster

activities.name: Ristorante L'Olivo at Al Mahara
activities.timing_content: Daily 6:30 PM - 10 PM
activities.information:
Ristorante L'Olivo at Al Mahara offers an exceptional fine dining experience inside the iconic Burj Al Arab. The restaurant is surrounded by a breathtaking floor-to-ceiling aquarium. The menu showcases Italian seafood specialties inspired by Capri Palace Jumeirah, with options to dine à la carte or savor a curated Tasting Menu.

  • Our Favorite Thing: The 5-course tasting menu
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Cornish Porthilly Oysters

Dress Code: Smart Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: 8 years and above only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: A redeemable deposit of AED 500 per person is required to confirm your reservation. Deposit is not refundable if the reservation is cancelled less than 24 hours prior the reservation.

Minimum Spend Policy: Required to have full dining experience. 2 courses per person for parties up to 5 people, tasting menus are mandatory for parties of 6 people and above.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Sonara Camp
activities.timing_content: Daily from 6:30 PM
activities.information:
Escape the hustle and bustle of the city and discover a magical desert retreat at the pristine Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve.

Sonara is a private camp home to native wildlife such as oryxes and gazelles. This luxury desert camp focuses on an eco-friendly and sustainable experience, with a zero-waste policy to preserve the natural landscape.

Dinner under the stars is prepared by resident French chef Franck Sanna's carefully curated menu in an open-air kitchen, serving Arabic-inspired dishes as well as classic European cuisine.

Live entertainment includes belly dancers and a memorable fire show to end the evening.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Luxury Destination in the Desert
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Fire Grilled Shrimp

Dress Code: Smart Casual

Entry & Age Policy: Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required for a full pre-payment of the set menu.

Minimum Spend Policy: Each guest is required to have a set menu.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc., can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.timing_content:

Friday and Saturday 1 PM - 2:45 PM / 6:30 PM - 10:30 PM

Sunday 1 PM - 2:45 PM / 6:30 PM - 10 PM
activities.information:
Pier Chic is a romantic, award-winning Italian restaurant set across a private pier at Jumeirah Al Qasr. Make your way to the restaurant with a scenic stroll while enjoying captivating views of the Arabian Gulf and Burj Al Arab.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Panoramic ocean views of the iconic Burj Al Arab
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Risotto All'Astice 

Dress Code: Smart Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: Children under 12 are not permitted during dinner service. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Al Muntaha
activities.timing_content: Daily 12:30 PM - 2:30 PM / 7 PM - 10:30 PM
activities.information:
One Michelin-starred and curated by Chef Saverio Sbaragli, guests can indulge in the finest French and Italian cuisine. Nestled on the 27th floor of Burj Al Arab Jumeirah, Al Muntaha offers panoramic views of the Jumeirah coastline.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Amazing Views
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Blue Lobster

Dress Code: Smart Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: 8 years and above only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Minimum Spend Policy: Required to have a full dining experience per guest.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.timing_content: Daily 12 PM - 3 AM
activities.information:
Zenon is an upscale Mediterranean and Asian fusion restaurant at the Address Dubai Mall Hotel. Guests can savor an immersive experience featuring AI visual entertainment and an ambiance inspired by Greek mythology.

  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Rigatoni with Cream Reduction and Caviar
  • Our Favorite Thing: Unique AI Entertainment

Dress Code: Smart Elegant

activities.information:
Situated on the largest rooftop in DIFC, Clap Dubai consists of an indoor restaurant, an outdoor terrace, and two lounge bars which can accommodate up to 300 guests. This popular Beirut-born restaurant presents spectacular views and innovative Japanese cuisine, including vegan-friendly dishes, hot and cold starters, signature mains, rolls, nigiris, and makis to suit your appetite.

  • Our Favorite Thing: The hidden speakeasy Ongaku
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Salmon Clap Cloud

Dress Code: Smart Casual 

Entry & Age Policy: Children are allowed until 10 PM only. After 10 PM, the venue is restricted to ages 21 and above. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required. A cancellation/no-show fee of AED 200 per guest applies.

Minimum Spend Policy: Required to have a full dining experience per guest. For group reservations of 8 guests and above, AED 500 minimum spend per guest applies.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

Skybar: Daily 12 PM - 3 AM

Famous rooftop-brand CÉ LA VI, originally from Marina Bay Sands Singapore, is located on the 54th floor of the iconic Address Sky View Dubai. Here, you can indulge in a contemporary Asian menu created by Executive Chef Howard Ko. The rooftop restaurant and lounge offer stunning views of Burj Khalifa, featuring a 360-degree outdoor dining terrace.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Picture perfect views of Burj Khalifa
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Scallop Ceviche

Dress Code: Smart Casual – shorts are permitted during lunch only.

Entry & Age Policy: All ages are welcome for lunch. For dinner, guests aged 7 and above are permitted from 6 PM to 11 PM. After 11 PM, the venue is restricted to guests aged 21 and above. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required – a cancellation/no-show fee of AED 150 per guest applies.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: CouCou
activities.timing_content: Daily 8 PM - 2 AM
activities.information:
CouCou Dubai presents an elevated rooftop dining experience nestled 52 stories high at The View Palm. You can take in panoramic views while savoring Mediterranean cuisine and signature cocktails. It’s a location just perfect for every occasion.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Spectacular 360-degree views of Palm Jumeirah and the Arabian Gulf
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Lobster Linguine A La Provençale

Dress Code: Smart Casual

Entry & Age Policy:  Children are allowed until 10 PM only. After 10 PM, the venue is restricted to guests aged 21 years and above. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required – a cancellation/no-show fee of AED 250 per guest applies.

Minimum Spend Policy: From 10 PM onwards - Sunday, Tuesday, and Wednesday - AED 500 per guest. Monday, Thursday, Friday, and Saturday - AED 1,000 per guest. Please note that minimum spend is subject to change accordingly during holidays/special nights/etc.

activities.name: Akira Back
activities.timing_content: Daily 7 PM - 11:30 PM
activities.information:
Perched on the fifth floor of the futuristic W Dubai The Palm, Akira Back offers a sleek rooftop dining experience. Created by Chef Akira Back, the restaurant blends Japanese and Korean flavors, complemented by stunning sea views and the Dubai skyline.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Outdoor Dining with Skyline Views
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Hirame Carpaccio

Dress Code: Smart Casual

Entry & Age Policy: Children aged 10 years and below are welcome to dine until 9 PM only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Minimum Spend Policy: None

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.timing_content:
Sunday to Friday 5 PM - 2 AM

Saturday 2 PM - 5 PM / 7 PM - 2 AM
activities.information:
Located on the 31st floor of W Dubai Mina Seyahi, this new rooftop bar and lounge offers panoramic views of Dubai Harbour, Palm Jumeirah, and Bluewaters Island. Attiko serves Pan-Asian cuisine alongside an impressive wine and cocktail menu. Live entertainment includes percussionists, DJs, and dancers dressed in peacock-inspired outfits.

  • Our Favorite Thing: The perfect spot for sundowners offering spectacular views 
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Bluefin Tuna Carpaccio 

Dress Code: Smart Elegant

﻿Entry & Age Policy: No-children policy, only guests 21 and above are allowed.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Not required

Minimum Spend Policy: For outdoors, AED 450 per guest applies every Friday and Saturday.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

Sunday to Wednesday 5 PM - 1 AM

Thursday to Saturday 5 PM - 2 AM
activities.information:
Barfly by Buddha-Bar is the latest rooftop addition in Dubai to debut at Hilton Dubai Palm Jumeirah. Located on the 13th floor, Barfly is a Parisian-born concept. It serves an innovative menu of Asian fusion dishes with extravagant cocktails and panoramic ocean views.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Daily Sunset Sessions from 5 PM to 7 PM – enjoy 30% off food and beverages
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: 24 Carat Gold Sushi

Dress Code: Smart Casual

Entry & Age Policy: Indoor Area - 5 PM to 9 PM: Ages 6 and above / 9 PM onwards: Ages 10 and above

Outdoor Area - Ages 21 and above only; no kids allowed

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required for a group booking of 7 guests & above and a pre-payment will be applied. A cancellation/no-show will result in no refund of the deposit. 

Minimum Spend Policy: None

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.timing_content:
Daily 12:30 PM - 3 PM / 6:30 PM - 12 AM

Last entry: for lunch 2 PM, for dinner 11 PM.
activities.information:
TOMO offers one of the best views of Dubai, as well as the freshest sushi in town. This hidden gem is situated on the 17th floor of Raffles Hotel Dubai. Guests experience a traditional Japanese dining experience seated on tatami mat tables. 

  • Our Favorite Thing: The large outdoor terrace offers the perfect spot to admire the sunset 
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Chefs Special Omakase

Dress Code: Smart Casual

Entry & Age Policy: All ages allowed to dine for lunch & dinner. Terrace & Bar: after 10 PM, strictly 21 and above

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.timing_content:
Sunday to Wednesday 5 PM - 1 AM

Thursday to Saturday 5 PM - 2 AM
activities.information:
TIKI’s is set on the second floor of Canary Club in JLT. Discover a range of tiki-inspired cocktails with a rotating selection of Canary Club’s classics. Then, savor a selection of Japanese and Mexican bites, including taco makis, skewers, rolls, and pizzas, alongside panoramic skyline views to the sounds of tropical house and afro beats.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Brunch every weekend from 2 PM - 5 PM
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Signature Sushi Platter

Dress Code: Smart Casual

Entry & Age Policy: Only guests aged 21 years and above are allowed. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required for group booking and a pre-payment will be applied. A cancellation/no-show will result in no refund of the deposit. 

Minimum Spend Policy: Thursday AED 195 for ladies, AED 300 for gentlemen. Friday and Saturday AED 300 per guest applies.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.timing_content:
Sunday to Thursday 4 PM - 1 AM

Friday 4 PM - 2 AM

Saturday 1 PM - 2 AM

Kitchen closes at 11:30 PM
activities.information:
A beautiful rooftop spot at Palm West Beach with breathtaking sea views of the Dubai Marina skyline. Guests can enjoy a unique Nikkei menu featuring Peruvian and Japanese cuisine.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Golden Hour Skyline Views
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Maguro Karai

Dress Code: Smart Casual 

Entry & Age Policy: The restaurant is open to guests aged 12 and above, the lounge and terrace are restricted to guests aged 16 and above. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol. Please note that the Lounge and Terrace operate on a walk-in basis only and do not accept reservations.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required for a group booking of 10 guests and above. A cancellation/no-show will result in no refund of the deposit. 

Minimum Spend Policy: None

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Sexy Fish
activities.timing_content: Daily 5 PM - 2 AM
activities.information:
Sexy Fish Dubai offers a lavish dining experience, seamlessly blending contemporary Asian cuisine with mesmerizing ocean-inspired interiors. Located in DIFC, the venue boasts a vibrant ambiance, world-class art installations, and an extensive cocktail menu. Perfect for indulgent evenings and chic celebrations, Sexy Fish redefines luxury dining in Dubai.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Artistic Design
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Maki Rolls

Dress Code: Stylish Chic

Entry & Age Policy: Guests under the age of 21 are allowed until 9 PM. After 9 PM, entry is restricted to 21 and above only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required – a cancellation fee of AED 150 for lunch and AED 300 for dinner per guest applies, no-show incurs the agreed minimum spend.

Minimum Spend Policy: Sunday to Wednesday (11 PM onwards): AED 450 min spend per guest; AED 550 for 10 guests and above with AED 200 pre-payment per guest. Thursday to Saturday (9 PM onwards): AED 600 per guest (indoor), AED 450 (outdoor). AED 200 pre-payment for 5 guests and above.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: REIF Japanese Kushiyaki
activities.timing_content:
Sunday to Thursday 12 PM - 11 PM

Friday and Saturday 12 PM - 12 AM
activities.information:
REIF presents unconventional Japanese dishes, offering an affordable version of kushiyaki—freshly-grilled skewered meats inspired by Japanese robata restaurants. In addition to kushiyaki, REIF features an exclusive chef’s table menu, separate from the à la carte. The centered open kitchen gives you the chance to watch the creation of these unique dishes.

  • Our Favorite Thing: REIF also has a counter at Time Out Market Downtown 
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Spicy Tuna Maki Rolls

Reservation Not Required for Dar Al Wasl & Time Out Market branch. Walk-in basis only.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: BOCA
activities.timing_content: Daily 12 PM - 2 AM
activities.information:
Located in the heart of DIFC, BOCA restaurant and bar celebrates the flavors of the Mediterranean, featuring dishes from France, Italy, and Spain. Known for its dedication to sourcing local and sustainable ingredients, BOCA offers a menu that emphasizes freshness and quality.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Its zero-waste policy
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Dibba Bay Oysters 

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: LOWE
activities.timing_content:
Wednesday and Thursday 6 PM - 11 PM

Friday to Sunday 8 AM - 4 PM / 6 PM - 11PM
activities.information:
LOWE presents a homegrown restaurant in Dubai’s Al Barari neighborhood, advocating a commitment to sustainability. This eco-friendly eatery grows its own vegetables and composts all organic waste, while making creative use of vegetable off-cuts for a sustainable dining experience.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Many of the dishes are cooked over open flames or in a wood-fired oven.
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Smoked Organic Beef Tartare

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.timing_content:
Friday and Saturday 10 AM - 5 PM / 6 PM - 10 PM

Sunday to Thursday 10 AM - 5 PM / 6 PM - 9 PM
activities.information:
Teible is thoughtfully located in Dubai’s contemporary museum, Jameel Arts Centre. This homegrown eatery aims to promote a farm-to-table concept motivated by sustainability, seasonality, simplicity, and locality. Designed around a simplistic kitchen approach, their menu changes seasonally, using sustainable practices and its minimal wastage ethos.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Teible sources 85 to 90 percent of its ingredients from the UAE 
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Avo and Lox

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: One Life Kitchen & Café
activities.timing_content:
Dubai Design District: Daily 8 AM - 11 PM

JVC: Daily 8 AM - 10 PM
activities.information:
One Life Kitchen & Café serves clean homemade meals prepared fresh daily with a focus on sustainability and reducing food waste. The multi-level concept consists of an indoor and outdoor dining area with a co-working space. Enjoy a nutrient dense all-day a la carte menu which include vegetarian and vegan dishes.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Plastic-free bottles are replaced with recycled glass bottles
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Stacked Pancakes

Reservation Not Required for JVC branch. Walk-in basis only.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Seva
activities.timing_content: Daily 8 AM - 10 PM
activities.information:
SEVA is a leading yoga, meditation, holistic wellness center, and café. This hidden gem is 100% organic, plant-based, and vegan, set within a lush garden located in Jumeirah 1. The plant-based menu is made from sustainably-sourced ingredients free from MSG, GMOs, gluten, soy, refined sugars, and trans fats. The area is Wi-Fi-free, encouraging customers to disconnect from screens and use the time to interact with others. 

  • Our Favorite Thing: Seva Shop – a conscious store where guests can pick up self-care products for themselves or to gift others.
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Chunky Monkey Pancakes

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes

activities.name: The Sum of Us
activities.timing_content: Daily 8 AM - 10 PM
activities.information:
The Sum of Us is a homegrown cafe and roastery, specializing in quality casual dining. Located behind Sheraton Grand Hotel, they offer a healthy breakfast and lunch menu, with a selection of breads, pastries, and quality coffee. Reservation Not Required.

  • Our Favorite Thing: They make homemade bread from scratch daily
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Tsou Grazing Plate

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: KAVE
activities.timing_content:
Monday Closed

Tuesday to Friday 10:30 AM - 7:30 PM

Saturday and Sunday 11 AM - 8 PM
activities.information:
Founded by sisters Rania and Zaina Kana'an, Kave offers freshly prepared meals in the trendy Al Serkal Avenue. The plastic-free cafe focuses on upcycling its materials. Zero waste is their biggest goal, and they only use recycled cutlery. This cafe offers the only custom bicycle shop in Dubai, and it's also dog friendly! Reservation Not Required.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Diners are encouraged to bring their own cups to reduce unnecessary waste
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Lentil Salad

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Cassette
activities.timing_content: Daily 8 AM - 6 PM
activities.information:
Named after the French word ‘Cassette’, this Parisian-style bistro is set in Dubai's creative hub at The Courtyard in Al Quoz. This homegrown gem ﬁrst opened its doors in February 2019, serving seasonal ingredients sourced from local farms. Cassette minimizes food waste by repurposing its offcuts in soups and sauces. Enjoy a variety of carefully curated organic food and coffee alongside music, design, art, and everything in between. Reservation Not Required.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Cassette’s takeaway containers are made from an 80 per cent energy-efficient material while their straws and cups are entirely biodegradable
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Nutritious Acai Bowls 

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: HAPI
activities.timing_content: Daily 8 AM - 8 PM
activities.information:
HAPI presents an ice cream shop and all-day diner in Al Khazzan Park, opposite Dubai City Walk. Using only the best ingredients, the zero-waste menu includes an all-day breakfast, burgers, bone broth, preservative-free ice-cream, and vegan sorbets. HAPI creates their own grass-fed organic beef, chicken and vegan mushroom bone broth. Reservation Not Required.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Hapi’s food tubs, cutlery and cups are biodegradable and made from cornstarch
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Salmon Wagel

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: La Niña
activities.timing_content:
Weekdays 12 PM - 4 PM / 7 PM - 1 AM 

Weekends 12:30 PM - 4 PM / 7 PM - 2 AM

Upscale restaurant La Niña offers a fusion of Latin American and Iberian cuisine from the same creative team behind Bagatelle. Dress Code: Smart Elegant

Credit Card Reservation Policy: Required – a cancellation/no-show fee of AED 120 per guest applies.

Minimum Spend Policy: Required to have full dining experience. 

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

Verde Beach is an ideal destination for a decadent feast and sophisticated beach relaxation, with soundtracks provided by world-class DJs.

Featuring a menu that celebrates the freshest seafood and vibrant Mediterranean flavors, the restaurant offers a refined yet relaxed dining experience. activities.information:
African Queen is a vibrant restaurant and beach club that celebrates the rich flavors and cultural essence of the African continent. Featuring a menu inspired by traditional recipes and reimagined with a contemporary twist, it highlights bold spices, fresh ingredients, and creative presentations. Set against a backdrop of eclectic décor and a warm, inviting ambiance, African Queen offers the perfect blend of indulgent dining and serene beachside relaxation, making it an ideal destination for unforgettable moments by the sea.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

activities.name: Jet Car
activities.information:
Cruise around Dubai’s waters in style on a boat that is shaped like a convertible sports car but rides like a jet ski.

You can ride your jet car alone or have fun with your family and friends. Up to a maximum of 2 passengers at a time. Children above 14 years old are always welcome – provided that they are with their legal guardian. 

Important:

  • All guests are required by law to bring their original ID. Tourists require an original Passport. Residents can bring a Passport, Emirates ID, or Emirates Driving License.
  • Any cancellation received 24 hours before the scheduled service time is subject to a 50% cancellation fee.
  • Full charge will be applied if cancellation is received less than 24 hours before to the schedule services times.
