Thursday to Sunday 6 PM - 3 AM
activities.information:
Privilege rooftop presents poolside relaxation from the 75th floor of the SLS Dubai Hotel & Residences. Soak up the sun with two rooftop infinity pools and uninterrupted city views of Downtown Dubai. The pool bar lounge is the perfect spot for shisha and sundowners, serving a selection of signature cocktails with lively DJ tunes in time for sunset.

Dress Code: Casual/Swimwear

Entry & Age Policy: Children aged 12 years and below are strictly not permitted to access the infinity pools on level 75. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Not required

Entrance Fee:

Weekdays & Weekends - AED 400 per person, AED 350 redeemable.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Dinner in the Sky
activities.timing_content:
Lunch is not available during the summer.

Weekdays (Sunday to Thursday)

• Session 1 (2 PM - 3:30 PM) Lunch

• Session 2 (3:30 PM - 5 PM) Lunch

• Session 3 (5 PM - 6:30 PM) Lunch

• Session 4 (6:30 PM - 8 PM) Dinner

• Session 5 (8 PM - 9:30 PM) Dinner

• Session 6 (9:30 PM - 11 PM) Dinner

Weekends (Friday to Saturday)

• Session 1 (2 PM - 3:30 PM) Lunch

• Session 2 (3:30 PM - 5 PM) Lunch

• Session 3 (5 PM - 6:30 PM) Lunch

• Session 4 (6:30 PM - 8 PM) Dinner

• Session 5 (8 PM - 9:30 PM) Dinner

• Session 6 (9:30 PM - 11 PM) Dinner

The dining experience in the sky will take approximately 90 minutes: 15 minutes for seating guests, 60 minutes for flight duration, and 15 minutes for unseating guests.
activities.information:
Dinner in the Sky Dubai is an unforgettable unique dining experience 50 meters from the ground. It was selected by Forbes.com as one of the 10 most unusual restaurants in the world. 

Feast on a 3-course meal of your choice, suspended by a crane above Dubai Marina with panoramic views of the Marina skyline, Palm Jumeirah, and Bluewaters Island.

Enjoy lunch, dinner, or afternoon tea. All delicious meals are catered by top chefs from Le Meridien Hotel and The Westin Mina Seyahi Marina Resort. 

Please note that the maximum table capacity is 22 guests.

Important:

  • Pregnant women are not allowed to experience Dinner in the Sky.
  • Persons under 14 years must be accompanied by an adult. 
  • Minimum height: 110 cm. Maximum weight: 150 kg.
  • Seats purchased cannot be refunded, exchanged, or cancelled once issued, except in the event of a cancellation by the venue itself.
activities.pricing_content:
Weekdays (Sunday to Thursday)

  • Lunch - AED 733.95
  • Dinner - AED 733.95

Weekend (Friday to Saturday)

  • Lunch - AED 733.95
  • Dinner - AED 838.95

*Prices include 5% VAT

activities.name: Dune Buggy in the Desert
activities.timing_content:
Daily 

1 hour 7:30 AM

1 hour 10:30 AM

1 hour 3:30 PM

2 hours 7 AM

2 hours 8:30 AM

2 hours 10 AM

2 hours 2 PM

Closed on 25th December and 1st January
activities.information:
Navigate the sandy dunes with opportunities to spot the fascinating animals that roam freely in the desert. If you’re lucky, you may get a picture with one of the local camels. Plus, you will get to stop at scenic locations to snap photos of the panoramic views, keeping your special memories forever. 

Riders are assessed on ability and a full safety briefing, ensuring your ride is suitable for you.

Important:

  • If you want to get behind -the -wheel of a self-drive buggy, you must be over the age of 16. If under 16, an adult’s presence is required.
  • A driver’s license is not required, but a preliminary training session will be provided, before taking you on the ATV trail.
  • If you cancel your reservation less than 24 hours before the start of an activity, there will be no return due to you. An activity will be deemed canceled if you do not show up at the agreed-upon location by the scheduled departure time.
activities.pricing_content:
Dune Buggy

1 & 2 Seater Polaris RZR 1000 XP 2022 Models

1 or 2 people

  • 1 Hour - AED 1,000
  • 2 Hours - AED 1,800

4-Seater Polaris RZR XP 1000 Turbo

up to 4 people

  • 1 Hour - AED 1,400
  • 2 Hours - AED 2,400

activities.name: Hot Air Balloon
activities.timing_content: 7 days a week from October until the end the of May
activities.information:
Highlights:

  • Pick up and drop-off from Dubai in a luxury vehicle.
  • Arrive at the take-off site and watch the Balloon inflation.
  • Receive a 15-minute safety briefing from your pilot.
  • Enjoy ultra-comfort as the capacity of each basket compartment has been reduced to allow more room and exclusivity on every flight.
  • Board your balloon and take off with the sunrise; 1-hour flight (weather dependant).
  • After landing in the desert, your breakfast will be served in a desert setting.
  • Embark on a luxury one-hour nature drive through the Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve.
  • Bathroom facilities available.

Terms and Conditions:

  • Not suitable for children under 5 years old and not suitable for pregnant woman after their 1st trimester.
  • Not recommended for guests that has had major surgery in the last 6 months, has had a broken leg/arm in the last 6 months or anyone who suffers from chronic back, neck pain or injuries.
  • Children over 5 years old and under 12 years old will be accepted at the child rate.
  • Pick up from Dubai Hotels between 3:30 AM and 5:30 AM (depends on sunrise).
  • Return to the Hotel between 10:30 AM and 11:30 AM (depending on traffic).

Important:

  • Cancellations made at least 24 hours prior to tour departure are eligible for full refund.
  • Cancellations made less than 24 hours prior to tour departure are not eligible for refund.
  • If you fail to join a tour, join it after departure, or leave it prior to its completion, no refund can be made.
activities.pricing_content:
Signature Experience

  • Adult - AED 1,995
  • Child (5-11 years old) - AED 1,500
  • starting from 4:30 AM (half day morning)

activities.name: Indoor Skydiving
activities.timing_content:
Monday to Thursday 12 PM - 9 PM

Friday and Sunday 12 PM - 10 PM

Saturday 12 PM - 11 PM
activities.information:
IFly Dubai offers an amazing indoor skydiving experience, welcoming flyers of all ages and abilities.

Discover the thrill of skydiving during a free fall in a safe, supervised, and controlled tunnel environment with highly experienced instructors fully trained in operating our equipment. A professional team provides a one-to-one experience, which is safe as well as thrilling.

Important:

  • Please arrive 30 minutes before your session to sign the waivers.
  • Please be informed that it takes 24/48 hours to confirm your reservation.
  • If you cancel before 48 hours, you will receive a complete refund.
  • Bookings made on the same day of the event cannot be rescheduled, cancelled, or refunded.
activities.pricing_content:
First Time Flyers

  • AED 179 per person

Inclusions:

  • Training session
  • 2 Flights
  • Flight Gear
  • One-on-one personal instructor
  • Flying certificate

activities.name: Sky Views Edge Walk
activities.timing_content: Daily 11 AM - 8 PM
activities.information:
Experience Edge Walk, the highest full-circle hands-free walk in Dubai. This activity will take you along the ledge of the 53rd floor of Address Sky View, almost 220 meters above the ground! Admire sweeping views of Burj Khalifa while defying gravity – with no windows or other barriers between you and the views.

Important:

  • For visitors of the Sky Slide who wish to watch the sunset between 3 PM and 7 PM, we recommend booking an entry time approximately 90 minutes prior during peak seasons.
  • Please arrive at least 20-30 minutes before the scheduled visit.
  • Ages 12-65 (parental consent required in person for those under 18 years of age).
  • Weight: 30–120 kg.
  • Height: 135–200 cm.
  • Modest, comfortable clothing and closed-toed shoes – no skirts, dresses, high heels, flip-flops, or loose footwear.
  • Good medical condition.
  • Wearing the Edge Walk overall is a must to ensure the safety of all guests.
  • Not pregnant.
  • Free of existing or recurring injuries.
  • Not under the influence of narcotics, spirits, or any other substances that impair judgement (e.g. medicine).
  • Free from serious physical or mental disorders that would not allow you to complete the physical and mental tasks required during the experience.
  • Free from medical conditions that require immediate medical attention.
  • Tickets are non-refundable and non-exchangeable.
activities.pricing_content:
General Admission

  • Per Person - AED 499
  • Note: Ages 12-65 (parental consent required in person for those under 18 years of age).

activities.name: Adventure Sunrise Safari
activities.timing_content: From 8 AM
activities.information:
The day will start with a mesmerizing sunrise desert drive that will introduce you to the natural wonders that Dubai has to offer. Then you will traverse the rolling dunes in a comfortable and well-equipped vehicle, expertly guided by our seasoned desert drivers, and witness the stunning sunrise.

Highlights:

  • Take a sunrise desert drive as the sun gracefully paints the sky with hues of orange and gold. Capture stunning photographs and create memories that will last a lifetime.
  • Indulge in a delicious breakfast with culinary delights, crafted to tantalize at Al Maha Desert Resort.
  • Enlightening visit to the Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve Visitor Center.
  • Spot wildlife in its natural habitat and enjoy the unparalleled journey through Dubai’s desert wonders.
  • Experience and witness the untouched beauty of the desert.

Important:

  • Full refund if cancelled at least 2 days before the event.
  • Failure to join the tour, joining after departure, or leaving before its completion will result in forfeiture of any refund.
  • These cancellation policy are subject to change.
activities.pricing_content:
Bedouin Culture Safari with Breakfast

  • Morning duration of 5 hours
  • Adult - AED 625
  • Children (5-11 years old) - AED 415
  • Private Car - starting from AED 2,415

Inclusions:

  • Return luxury transfer (private/shared)
  • Breakfast at Al Maha
  • Sunrise dune drive & sunrise photography (professional photography paid)
  • Professional English-speaking guide

Exclusions:

  • Alcohol is strictly prohibited
  • Professional photography & videography can be looked for an additional charge.

Itinerary:

  • Pick-up from the hotel
  • Sunrise dune Drive and sunrise pics
  • Breakfast at Al Maha
  • Departure back
  • Arrive back at the hotel/location

activities.name: Deep Dive Dubai
activities.timing_content: Daily 9 AM - 6 PM
activities.information:
Deep Dive Dubai is the latest record-breaking attraction in Dubai! It is the only diving facility in the world where you can dive to depths of 60 meters and is verified by the Guinness World Record as the world's deepest swimming pool. 

The pool has an area designed to resemble a sunken city, and it is also used as an underwater film studio.

Important:

  • On entry, customers must display a valid photo identification document, such as original Emirates ID, driving license in English, or original passport. The name on the identification document must match the individual participating in the diving experience. Entrance is valid only for the specified person and time mentioned on the ticket and cannot be reused across multiple bookings.
  • All Deep Dive Dubai bookings are paid in full at the time of reservation.
  • Deep Dive Dubai bookings are non-refundable.
  • A parent/legal guardian must be present during any diving experience and provide written consent for minors.
  • All bookings must honor the specific terms and conditions for the given experience.
  • Deep Dive Dubai booking is valid for the booked date and time only.
  • Rescheduling is allowed up to 5 days in advance. Rescheduling must be completed within 6 months of the original booking.
activities.pricing_content:
Discover Scuba for non-certified guests (up to 12m)

  • Standard Discover Scuba - AED 1,800
  • Premium Discovery Scuba - AED 2,400 - includes edited video, honorary wall certificate
  • Platinum Discovery Scuba - AED 3,000 - includes edited short and long video, personalized images, facility tour, honorary wall certificate

Guided Scuba up to 30m for certified guests (certification required)

  • Standard Guided Scuba - AED 1,200
  • Premium Guided Scuba - AED 2,400 - includes edited video, honorary wall certificate
  • Platinum Guided Scuba - AED 3,000 - includes edited short and long video, personalized images, facility tour, honorary wall certificate

Discover Snorkeling

  • Snorkeling - AED 400

activities.name: Skydive Dubai
activities.timing_content: Daily 8 AM - 2:30 PM
activities.information:
Take the leap and experience a breathtaking free-fall and parachute ride from 13,000 feet with trained tandem skydiving instructors. Sky Dive Dubai is one of the city’s top attractions, and it allows you to discover Dubai from a new perspective.

You can choose from two incredible locations for this activity: the iconic Palm Jumeirah or over the Arabian desert.

Important:

  • You must be 18 years of age or above (according to the Gregorian calendar) on the day of your tandem skydive. Please bring a valid and official government photo ID (Emirates ID, driver’s license, passport) on the day of your skydive.
  • Please be informed that the guest's first and last name should match the ID.
  • Divers must be in a reasonable state of health.
  • Weight requirements: Males must weigh 100.0 kg or less with a maximum BMI of 30.0, and females must weigh 90.0 kg or less with a maximum BMI of 27.5.
  • Once the booking is confirmed, it cannot be cancelled as the tickets are non-refundable.
  • The booking time is the arrival time. Please be at the location 20-30 minutes earlier.
  • Minors are not permitted to skydive.
activities.pricing_content:
Tandem skydive (Jump attached to an experienced instructor)

The Palm Dropzone

  • Weekdays & Weekend Tandem skydive with photos and video at Palm location - AED 2,749

The Desert Dropzone

  • Weekdays & Weekend Tandem skydive with photos and video at Desert location - AED 2,199

activities.name: XLine Dubai
activities.timing_content:
Monday to Sunday 10 AM - 5 PM

Tuesday - Closed
activities.information:
Enjoy breathtaking views of Dubai Marina with Xline Dubai, the longest urban zipline in the world. Setting off from a 170-meter launchpad, you will weave past skyscrapers across the Marina to Dubai Marina Mall at speeds of up to 80 kmph.

Pictures and videos of your experience are provided, and the double zipline feature helps you enjoy a shared experience with your friends and family. It’s sure to be a day of adrenaline-packed fun.

Important:

  • Ages 12-65 (parental consent required in person for those under 18 years of age)
  • 45-100 kg
  • Taller than 130 cm
  • Modest comfortable clothing and closed shoes – no skirts, dresses, or flip-flops
  • Good medical condition
  • Not pregnant
  • Free of existing or recurring injuries
  • Not under the influence of narcotics, spirits, or any other substances that impair judgement (e.g. medicine)
  • Free from serious physical or mental disorders that would not allow you to complete the physical and mental tasks asked throughout the ride
  • Free from medical conditions that require immediate medical attention
  • Once the booking is confirmed, it cannot be cancelled as the tickets are non-refundable
activities.pricing_content:
Go Ziplining

  • XLine Experience Adult - AED 699
  • XLine Experience Child (12 to 16 years old) - AED 499

activities.name: Gyrocopter Flight
activities.timing_content:
Monday to Sunday 8:30 AM - 2 PM

Tuesday and Wednesday - CLOSED
activities.information:
The standard package includes a 20-minute flight. Pictures and an edited video of the experience are complimentary.

The flight takes off from Skydive Dubai Palm, giving you the best aerial views of Dubai Marina, Ain Dubai, Palm Jumeirah island, the Atlantis, Kite beach, and Burj Al Arab. You will fly back through the city over the Sheikh Zayed Road and Mall of the Emirates, passing the Palm view back to Skydive Dubai runway.

What to bring:

  • Valid ID or passport
  • Pair of sunglasses
  • Jacket or sweater, during the cold months

Important:

  • You must be 17 years old (according to the Gregorian calendar) on the day of your flight. Customers must meet this requirement.
  • Your weight must be 105 kg or below on the day of your flight. Sorry, this is a legal requirement from our manufacturers, and we cannot make any exceptions. Customers must meet this requirement. Due to weather conditions, the weight limit during the summer is 100 kg. 
  • If you do not show up for your Gyrocopter flight and the experience has been paid for in advance, your money will not be refunded.
  • You must reschedule your flight at least 24 hours prior to the date. In this case, your booking must be redeemed within 6 months from the date of purchase unless otherwise stated on the receipt.
  • All customers are requested to arrive 30 minutes prior to their booking/flight time. 
  • This experience is not suitable for pregnant women.
activities.pricing_content:
20-minute Gyrocopter Flight

  • AED 1,199 per person

activities.name: IMG Worlds of Adventure
activities.address: E311 Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Rd, City of Arabia
activities.timing_content:
Sunday to Thursday 12 PM - 10 PM

Friday & Saturday 12 PM - 11 PM
activities.information:
Visit the world's largest indoor theme park! IMG Worlds of Adventure is Dubai's first mega-themed entertainment destination, covering an area of over 1.5 million square feet. The park is divided into five zones, representing global brands such as Cartoon Network and Marvel.

Free parking is available, and there is plenty of space for everyone.

Valet parking is also available for an additional fee.

Important:

  • Children under the age of 12 must be accompanied by an Adult aged 16+ years.
  • Tickets are non-refundable and non-transferable.
activities.pricing_content:
General Admission

  • Per person - AED 365
  • Children below 1.05 m - FREE

activities.name: Atlantis Aquaventure Waterpark & The Lost Chambers Aquarium
activities.timing_content: Open daily 10 AM – sunset (Closing time subject to change depending on the season)
activities.information:
Aquaventure Waterpark Dubai is the world’s largest waterpark, with over 79 slides and attractions!

Make your way down Dubai’s longest Lazy River, and relax on 500 meters of private beach. Experience fun rides and attractions with full-day access to Dubai’s Largest Aquarium with Aquaventure Super Pass, and discover up to 65,000 marine creatures in The Lost Chambers Aquarium.

Important:

  • Children under 1.2 metres (48”) should be always supervised by a responsible adult.
  • Guests under 12 years old should be accompanied by an adult for The Lost Chambers Aquarium admission.
  • Aquaventure Waterpark ticket sales are final and are 100% non-refundable.
  • Please make note of the Swim Attire Policy- no refunds or discounts will be given to guests who are unable to ride the slides due to inappropriate swim attire.
activities.pricing_content:
Aquaventure Super Pass

  • Per Person - AED 380
  • Included: 1 Day access to Aquaventure, World's Largest Waterpark, Access to The Lost Chambers Aquarium

Age Policy

  • Children under 2 years old and below complimentary access.
  • Children under 1.2 metres (48”) should be always supervised by a responsible adult.
  • Guests under 12 years old should be accompanied by an adult for The Lost Chambers Aquarium admission.

*A valid Emirates I.D. must be presented at the ticket office.

activities.name: Dubai Parks & Resorts: Motiongate
activities.timing_content:
Motiongate Dubai

Sunday to Thursday 11 AM - 8 PM

Friday & Saturday 11 AM - 9 PM
activities.information:
Motiongate Dubai is a Hollywood-inspired theme park located in Dubai Parks and Resorts. It features 4 world-famous motion picture studios (Dreamworks Animation, Columbia Pictures, Lionsgate, and Smurfs) and has 40 world-class attractions.

Important:

  • Tickets are non-refundable, non-resalable, and non-exchangeable for any other promotion, discount, or ticket.
activities.pricing_content:
One Park Pass

  • Per Person - AED 330
  • Free admission for children under 3 years of age

activities.name: The Green Planet
activities.timing_content: Daily 10 AM - 6 PM
activities.information:
Green Planet takes guests deep into the heart of the Amazon.

Discover an enchanting enclosed ecosystem in a tropical indoor rainforest in City Walk. Home to more than 3,000 species of plant and animal life, Green Planet invites guests to explore our planet’s fascinating flora and fauna through an immersive expedition into the tropics.

The educational rainforest helps to spread awareness of nature’s delicate balance and the importance of our oldest living eco-systems.

Important:

  • Children under the age of 13 years old must be accompanied by an adult 18 years and above.
  • All bookings are non-refundable, non-transferable, and non-exchangeable.
  • Online booking confirmations must be shown in print or on a smart device at the venue, and all bookings must be exchanged for tickets or vouchers to enter the park.
activities.pricing_content:
Day Access Ticket

  • Adult (11 years and above) - AED 175
  • Child (2-10 years old) - AED 150
  • Infant (under 2 years old) - Free

activities.name: Aventura Parks
activities.timing_content:
Wednesday and Thursday 2 PM to 8 PM

Friday and Saturday 2 PM to 9 PM

Sunday 2 PM to 8 PM
activities.information:
Experience a day of action-packed nature adventure inside Dubai’s largest zip line park at Aventura Adventure Park! 

Enjoy unlimited access to over 85 exhilarating challenges across 5 different levels off the ground and between trees. You will be guided by expert instructors and facilitators to ensure a safe experience. Exciting activities include zip-lining, rope climbing, Tarzan Swings, and much more inside the park’s 35,000sqm of adventure areas. Aventura Parks caters to all ages and groups it’s the perfect place to spend time bonding and having fun.

Important:

  •  All issued tickets are non-refundable. However, if the ticket is cancelled 24 hours before the reservation, the Counter Ticket Staff at the Park could reschedule the reservation.
activities.pricing_content:
General Admission

  • Children (1.15m to 1.4m tall) - AED 195
  • Includes - up to 4 hour park admission with access to rangers and explorador circuits (depending on height), discovery playground (participants under 1.25m tall), 1 rabbit encounter, and 1 trampoline experience.
  • Adults (1.4m tall and above) - AED 275
  • Includes - up to 4 hour park admission with access to all circuits.

Aventura Unlimited

  • Adults/Children (1.15m to 1.4m tall and above) - AED 395
  • Includes - all day park admission with access to all circuits, 1 rabbit encounter, 1 trampoline experience, 1 survival pack, and 1 welcome drink.

Discovery Playground

  • (Between 1.05m and 1.25m tall) - AED 70 (1 hour)
  • AED 80 (2 hours)
  • AED 95 (3 hours)

Aventura Challenges

  • Himalaya - AED 75
  • Jacob's Ladder - AED 150

Visitor

  • Children under the age of 6 may only participate in the mini-kids circuits
  • Maximum Weight: Adult circuit 130 kg, Children’s circuit 100 kg

activities.name: Dubai Mall Aquarium & Underwater Zoo
activities.timing_content:
Weekdays 10 AM - 11 PM

Weekends 10 AM - 1 AM
activities.information:
Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo is the world’s largest suspended aquarium tank.

Home to thousands of aquatic animals, with over 140 species and 400 sharks and rays, including sand tiger sharks and giant groupers.

A series of carefully designed experiences allow visitors to come face to face with aquatic residents for memorable moments with friends and family.

Important:

  • The booking confirmation is valid only for the specific date and time shown and shall automatically expire upon the lapse of this specific date and time.
  • Booking confirmation(s) and/or ticket(s) can only be used once and are not subject to refund or exchange of any kind whatsoever, whether before or after the ticket(s) expiry.
  • Lost, damaged, and/or stolen ticket(s) cannot be replaced, refunded, or exchanged in any manner.
activities.pricing_content:
Regular Pass Penguin Cove & Nursery Experience

  • AED 199 per person

Inclusions:

  • Aquarium Tunnel
  • Underwater Zoo
  • Penguin Cove & Nursery
  • 1x AED 20 Aquarium Retail Voucher

activities.name: Ski Dubai Penguin Encounter
activities.timing_content:
Ski Dubai Opening Hours

Monday to Thursday 10 AM - 11 PM

Friday 10 AM - 12 AM

Saturday & Sunday 9 AM - 12 AM﻿
activities.information:
Escape the desert heat and spend a cold winter day at Ski Dubai! 

Dubai is home to The Middle East’s first indoor ski resort, Ski Dubai, located at Mall of the Emirates. Ski Dubai covers 22,500 square meters with real snow all year round and has the world’s first sub-zero zipline. Exciting attractions include the opportunity to meet with penguins. Book the Peng-Friend Encounter or Snow Premium package for unlimited access to the Ski Dubai and a chance to meet penguins up close.

Important:

  • If you cancel 48 hours before, you will receive a complete refund.
  • If you cancel 24 hours before, you will receive a refund of 50%.
  • Bookings made on the same day of the event cannot be rescheduled, cancelled, or refunded.
activities.pricing_content:
Snow Premium with Penguin Encounter

  • Per person - AED 499

Inclusions:

  • A 40-minute penguin encounter
  • Choose from either: A Slope Pass for experienced skiers and snowboarders (Skill Level 2+), or a 60-minute Ski and Snowboard Discovery Lesson
  • Unlimited access to the Snow Park & Rides (Tubing Run, Climbing wall, Bobsleds, Bumper Cars, Sliding Hills, Snow Plough Playground, Mountain Thriller ride, and Snow Bullet)
  • Unlimited access to the chairlift
  • Standard locker, hand warmers & waterproof gloves.
  • One photo in the Snow Park (Penguin encounter photos are not included and can be purchased at an additional cost)

activities.name: Atlantis Dolphin & Sea Lion Encounter
activities.timing_content: Daily 9:45 AM - 6:30 PM
activities.information:
Interact with dolphins and sea lions at Atlas Bay Atlantis The Palm Dubai, one of the world's most sophisticated dolphin habitats. Choose from a range of dolphin and sea lion experiences – suitable for all ages and swimming abilities.

Every experience includes unlimited access to Aquaventure Waterpark, the world’s largest waterpark, for the day. Enjoy 105 slides, attractions and experiences, a private beach, and a wave rider.

Important:

  • If unaccompanied by an adult, children must be at least 13 years old to enter Aquaventure.
  • All children under 12 years old must be accompanied by a participating and paying adult over 18.
  • Children 2 years old and below have complimentary access to Dolphin Meet & Greet, Dolphin Encounter, and Sea Lion Meet & Greet.
activities.pricing_content:
Dolphin Meet & Greet

  • Per person - AED 845
  • This is a dry experience for all ages - guests can meet and learn more about the dolphins without getting into the water. Includes free same-day access to Aquaventure Waterpark.

Dolphin Encounter

  • Per Person - AED 995
  • This experience is for all ages and swimming abilities - guests can dip and play with the dolphins in the water. This is an activity suitable for beginner swimmers as well. Includes free same-day access to Aquaventure Waterpark.

Dolphin Swim

  • Per Person - AED 1,245
  • This experience is for confident/skilled swimmers aged 8 years old and above - guests can swim with the dolphins and get to know more about them. Includes free same-day access to Aquaventure Waterpark.

Sea Lion Meet & Greet

  • Per Person- AED 745
  • This is a dry experience for all ages - guests can meet and learn more about the sea lions without getting into the water. Includes free same-day access to Aquaventure Waterpark.

Legoland Dubai

Saturday & Sunday 10 AM - 7 PM
activities.information:
Legoland Waterpark features 20 Lego-themed water slides and attractions designed for families with kids aged 2-12. Visitors can enjoy the Joker Soaker, construct their own Lego raft, embark on a splash safari, and slide down thrilling attractions. It will be a day of endless fun!

activities.name: Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque
activities.address: Sheikh Rashid Bin Saeed Street, Abu Dhabi
activities.timing_content:
Saturday to Thursday 9 AM - 10 PM

Friday 9 AM - 12 PM & reopens 3 PM - 10 PM
activities.information:
The Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque Abu Dhabi is an awe-inspiring structure and one of the largest mosques in the world. It can accommodate over 40,000 people and is a popular tourist destination, attracting visitors from all corners of the globe.

Stroll around the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque on a guided tour that draws you into the history and meaning of the mosque.

Important:

  • Mosques hold a religious and sacred position for all Muslims. Visitors should therefore abide by specific ethics and rules and show their full respect.
  • No smoking, food, or drinks allowed.
  • Kindly avoid showing overt displays of affection and any emblems or symbols of significance.
activities.pricing_content:
Free Entrance

  • Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque offers free guided tours in English or Arabic.

Dress Code:

  • No transparent (see- through) clothing.
  • No shorts and skirts
  • No sleeveless shirts
  • No clothing with profanity
  • No tight clothing

Ferrari World

Daily 11 AM - 8 PM
activities.information:
Ferrari World Abu Dhabi is the world's first Ferrari-themed Park. The park features Formula Rossa, the world's fastest roller coaster, and over 40 record-breaking attractions. Visitors of all ages can expect heart-racing fun.

activities.name: Pearl Farm
activities.timing_content: Daily 9 AM - 7 PM
activities.information:
The Suwaidi Pearl Farm is located in the small fishing village of Al Rams, situated between the majestic Al Hajar mountain range in Ras Al Khaimah, UAE. It was established in 2005 by Mr. Abdulla Al Suwaidi, the world’s first Arabian pearl farmer.

The expert team will take you through the process of seeding, where experts insert a round bead made from mother-of-pearl shell, along with oyster tissue, to allow a layer of nacre to grow around the bead and eventually form a pearl.

Important:

  • At least 48 hours' notice for bookings and cancellations is required.
activities.pricing_content:
Pearl Farm Tour

  • Adult - AED 262.50
  • Children (9-12 years old) - AED 131.25
  • Children (5-8 years old) - AED 52.50

activities.name: Qasr Al Watan Presidential Palace Tour
activities.timing_content: Daily 11 AM - 6:30 PM
activities.information:
Qasr Al Watan is an incredible, new, and unique landmark in the United Arab Emirates.

Located in the Emirate of Abu Dhabi, Qasr Al Watan Palace offers insight into the Arab heritage, the governing principles that shaped the history of the UAE, and its vision for the future. Providing an enriching journey in a contemporary setting that reveals and reflects on governance, knowledge, and craftsmanship.

The Palace in Abu Dhabi offers a unique opportunity to marvel at majestic hallways, explore exhibitions that celebrate the region’s rich Arabic heritage, and learn more about the rulers and governing institutions that shaped our great nation. You will also gain a deeper appreciation of the innovations that will drive the country’s future.

Important:

  • This ticket is non-exchangeable and non-refundable.
  • This ticket is void if altered or damaged.
activities.pricing_content:
Qasr Al Watan Presidential Palace Tour

  • Adult - AED 65
  • Children (4-17 years old) - AED 30

activities.name: Louvre Abu Dhabi (Coming Soon)
activities.timing_content:
Tuesday to Sunday 10 AM - 6:30 PM

The museum is closed every Monday.
activities.information:
Experience the iconic Louvre Abu Dhabi located on Saadiyat Island, renowned for its unique design featuring over 7,850 uniquely shaped metal stars that form a giant domed roof, creating stunning patterns of light and shadow.

Explore Jean Nouvel's groundbreaking architectural design, which resembles a floating city with 55 individual yet interconnected buildings housing 26 galleries.

For your safety, please take note of the following:

Important:

  • E-tickets should be presented on arrival on your personal device; please do not print your tickets.
  • Please arrive a maximum of 10 minutes prior to your time slot. Entry will be denied and no refund will be offered if you do not arrive during your Arrival Time Slot.
  • Once at the museum, you may remain for up to 3 hours during opening hours.

activities.name: Private Hot Air Balloon
activities.timing_content: 7 days a week from October until the end the of May
activities.information:
Highlights:

  • Pick up and drop-off from Dubai in a private luxury Range Rover.
  • Arrive at the take-off site and watch the balloon inflation.
  • Receive a 15-minute safety briefing from your pilot.
  • Board your private balloon and take off with the sunrise; 1-hour flight (weather dependent).
  • After landing in the desert, your private Range Rover will collect you for breakfast served in a private desert setting.
  • Embark on a luxury one-hour nature drive in a Range Rover through the Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve.
  • Bathroom facilities available.

Terms and Conditions:

  • Not suitable for children under 5 years old and not suitable for pregnant women after their 1st trimester.
  • Not recommended for guests who have had major surgery in the last 6 months, have had a broken leg/arm in the last 6 months, or anyone who suffers from chronic back, neck pain, or injuries.
  • Pick up from Dubai hotels between 3:30 AM and 5:30 AM (depends on sunrise).
  • Return to the hotel between 10:30 AM and 11:30 AM (depending on traffic).

Important:

  • Cancellations made at least 24 hours prior to tour departure are eligible for a full refund.
  • Cancellations made less than 24 hours prior to tour departure are not eligible for a refund.
  • If you fail to join a tour, join it after departure, or leave it prior to its completion, no refund can be made.
activities.pricing_content:
Ultimate Private Experience

  • AED 12,950 for two guests

Inclusions: 

  • Transfers from your hotel in a luxury Range Rover
  • Private sunrise hot air balloon ride (approximately 1 hour)
  • 5-star gourmet breakfast at an exclusive desert oasis
  • Wildlife drive in the Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve

activities.name: Helicopter Tour
activities.address: White Beach Parking Atlantis Hotel, Palm Jumeirah
activities.timing_content: Daily 9 AM - 5:30 PM
activities.information:
Enjoy a bird’s-eye view flying over iconic Dubai landmarks on board a luxury helicopter.

Depart from a helipad at Atlantis the Palm and experience a memorable 12, 15, or 25-minute scenic flight. 

With this activity, you can admire Dubai’s skyline from a unique perspective, flying above sights such as Burj Al Arab, Burj Khalifa, and Palm Jumeirah.

Each helicopter has 6 seats, including 3 window seats for maximum views, with live narration by your professional, experienced pilot.

Important:

  • Don't forget to bring a pair of sunglasses and a jacket or sweater, especially during winter (November to March). These items are essential for passengers' comfort.
  • The weight limit is 110 kg per passenger. Passengers who weigh more than this or close to this may have to wait for a flight that can safely accommodate their weight.
  • If cancellation is made at least 7 days prior to the start of the service, no cancellation fee will be charged.
  • In the event of a cancellation made between 6 to 4 calendar days before the start of the service, a cancellation fee of 50% will be charged.
  • If the cancellation is made within 3 calendar days of the start of the service, a cancellation fee of 100% will be charged, and no refund will be provided.
  • If the cancellation is made on the day of the scheduled service or after, a cancellation fee of 100% will be charged, and no refund will be given.
activities.pricing_content:
Pearl Heli - 12 min

  • Sharing: AED 715
  • Exclusive 6-seater: AED 3,145
  • Exclusive 7-seater: AED 3,670
  • Inclusions: 12-minute flight takes off from Atlantis Hotel at The Palm Jumeirah Island and heads to Burj Khalifa, the most iconic tower in the world, flying over Burj Al Arab, Dubai coastline, and the most famous landmarks of Dubai. 

Fun Ride - 15 min

  • Sharing: AED 921
  • Exclusive 6-seater: AED 4,041
  • Exclusive 7-seater: AED 4,715
  • Inclusions: Fly from Dubai’s most famous man-made island to the world’s tallest tower. Going from Atlantis The Palm to Burj Khalifa, you’ll see Aquaventure Water Park, the striking Burj Al Arab, Jumeirah Beach coastline, and The World Islands from its south pole. 

City Circuit - 25 min

  • Sharing: AED 1,450
  • Exclusive 6-seater: AED 6,353
  • Exclusive 7-seater: AED 7,410
  • Inclusions: Experience a dramatic ascent from a modern man-made wonder to the historic Creek where Dubai was born. From Atlantis The Palm, across the Gulf and over The Worlds Islands, before proceeding to Burj Khalifa, the world’s tallest tower. Take in the skyscrapers of Sheikh Zayed Road before marveling at Dubai Creek with its captivating heritage architecture. On the way back, you will pass Port Rashid, Union House, and the Jumeirah Beach coastline until Burj Al Arab, before swerving inland to see Dubai Marina.

Explore the world’s highest lounge at 585 meters above the ground, and immerse yourself in the clouds with an exclusive tour of the outdoor terrace. Delight in an impeccable selection of the finest teas and coffees, or enjoy a house beverage or glass of bubbly complimented by gourmet canapés.

activities.information:
Experience a luxury desert safari with the leading operator of desert experiences in Dubai. Our tours allow you to witness the magnificent landscape of the reserve, delve into the rich culture and history of the region and experience thrilling adventures in the desert.

Highlights:

  • Discover nature, culture, and adventure at the Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve.
  • Watch an engaging and interactive falcon show, go on a nature trail in rare, iconic, classic 1950s open-top land rovers, and then take a camel trek at sunset.
  • Indulge in a luxury camp and enjoy Arabian inspired cuisine.
  • Our campsite provides the perfect ambience for a memorable evening under the stars.
  • Enjoy fascinating shows and entertainment in the heart of the desert. 

Important:

Home to native wildlife such as oryxes and gazelles, this luxury desert escape provides an eco-friendly and sustainable experience, with a zero-waste policy to preserve the natural landscape.

Dinner under the stars is prepared by the resident chef in an open-air kitchen, showcasing Arabic-inspired dishes, as well as classic European cuisine.

activities.name: Camping in the Desert
activities.timing_content:
• Typical timing: 4 PM to 9 AM the following day
  • Duration: Approximately 12 hours
  • Timings will vary during the winter months (October to May) and summer months (June to September)
  • Timings vary depending on the exact pick-up location.
activities.information:
This camping experience will take you far away from the hustle and bustle of everyday life and immerse you into the wilds of our stunning landscape. Stop at the camel race track on your way out of town and head into the dunes for a thrilling dune drive. 

You will enjoy the sunset with a cold, fresh juice before the BBQ is served straight from the grill. After dinner, we light the campfire for marshmallow roasting before allowing you to turn in for the night at your leisure. In the morning, you will wake up to a cooked breakfast upon the rising sun. This activity is sure to create memories that will last a lifetime.  

Important:

  • Cancellations up to 3 calendar days prior to your booked tour date are eligible for a full refund.
  • Cancellations less than 3 calendar days prior to your booked tour date are eligible for a rescheduled date within 6 months of the booking date without penalty.

activities.name: Stretch Limousine
activities.information:
Enjoy a chauffeur-driven stretch limousine experience for a relaxing journey to your destination or special event. Our limousines are equipped with state-of-the-art facilities and can accommodate groups of 10-20 passengers.

We work closely with you to understand your needs and wishes for the event in order to provide you with the best possible experience and exceptional quality.
activities.pricing_content: Contact us for more information.

activities.name: Gold Souk
activities.timing_content:
Saturday to Thursday 9:30 AM - 9:30 PM (many stores close between 1 PM and 4 PM) 

Friday 4 PM - 10 PM
activities.information: Located in the historic part of Dubai, this is one of the oldest markets in the Emirate. Discover a large selection of precious metals, gemstones, jewelry, and ornaments at the world’s best prices. The Dubai Government carefully controls the authenticity of the merchandise so you can feel safe knowing that the goods are genuine.

activities.name: Ras Al Khor Wildlife Sanctuary
activities.timing_content:
Winter timings (October to March)

7:30 AM - 5:30 PM

Summer timings (April to September)

6:00 AM - 6:00 PM

During Ramadan:

8 AM to 4 PM, Fridays closed

Preferably plan your visit in the morning hours when the birds are most active.
activities.information:
Ras Al Khor Wildlife Sanctuary is situated in the wetlands just a short drive outside the city, close to Deira and Dubai Creek. 

The natural estuarine is home to tens of thousands of birds and species of plants. It is an abundant breeding ground for other wildlife, including mammals, crustaceans, and fish. 

The best time to visit is between December and March, when thousands of birds, including flamingos, migrate to the sanctuary.

activities.name: Public Beaches
activities.information:
La Mer offers 2.5 kilometers of public beachfront access and a wide variety of seaside restaurants, shops, and entertainment to enjoy.

Kite Beach gathers water sports enthusiasts and chilled beachgoers alike. With its laid-back atmosphere, it has something to offer for everyone. 

The Beach at JBR is a family-friendly beach located in a bustling cosmopolitan area. You can enjoy a large selection of beachside dining, shopping, and water sports.

activities.name: Alserkal Avenue Arts & Culture
activities.timing_content: Opening hours: Varies from venue to venue. Art galleries are closed on Fridays
activities.information: Spread across 500,000 square feet, Alserkal Avenue is a vibrant district with more than 30 outlets made up of art galleries, cafes, shops, and theaters.

activities.name: Madinat Jumeirah
activities.timing_content: Opening times (shops) 10 AM - 11 PM
activities.information:
Madinat Jumeirah is a traditional mini-city within Dubai. Spread across 40 hectares, you will find the finest 5-star hotels of Dubai, including a private beach and traditional-themed souk, with more than 50 different restaurants and lounges to discover. 

There is also a 5-kilometer river system, where you can explore the scenic waterways on an Abra boat trip.

activities.name: Dubai Marina Walk
activities.information: Nestled between iconic skyscrapers and the palm-lined promenade, Marina Walk provides the perfect place for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront. There are a wide variety of shops, cafes, and restaurants to enjoy.

activities.name: Al Qudra
activities.timing_content: Al Marmoom Desert Conservation Reserve is open seven days a week. The best time to visit is from October to March.
activities.information: Al Qudra is a 50-minute drive from the heart of Dubai and has plenty of activities for you to enjoy. Cycle around the 84 km long Al Qudra Cycling Track or visit the man-made lakes (there is even a heart-shaped one) – the perfect picnic spot with great views of the desert sunrise and sunset. You could even bring your own tent and spend the night stargazing in the desert.

activities.name: Historical Dubai
activities.timing_content:
Al Ahmadiya School & Heritage House

Saturday to Thursday 8 AM – 7:30 PM

Friday 2:30 PM – 7:30 PM

Spice souk

10 AM – 10 PM

Al Fahidi Historical Neighborhood/Bastakiya

You can visit the neighborhood around the clock – shops and museums all have their own operating hours.
activities.information:
Suggested itinerary:

  • Start at the Al Ahmadiya School and Heritage House 
  • Walk to the Spice Souk
  • Take the ferry from Deira Old Souk Abra Station to Bur Dubai Abra Station (cost AED 1)
  • Head West to Shindagha
  • Visit the Sheikh Saeed al Maktoum House and the Heritage and Diving Villages
  • Walk back along the creek and visit the Textile Souk
  • Finish off the tour with a stroll in Al Fahidi Historical Neighbourhood. Admire the art and ambience in the cosy XVA Art Hotel and grab a coffee in the XVA café. Head on out and grab a bite at one of the picturesque cafes and restaurants in the area, such as Arabian Tea House Restaurant & Café or Bastakiya Nights

activities.name: Downtown Dubai
activities.timing_content:
Dubai Mall

Sunday to Thursday: 10 AM - 12 AM

Friday and Saturday: 10 AM - 1 AM

Fountain Show Timings

Saturday to Thursday: 1PM - 1:30 PM

Every 30 minutes from 6 PM to 11 PM

Friday: 1:30 PM - 2 PM

Every 30 minutes from 6 PM to 11 PM

Souk Al Bahar

Saturday to Thursday: 10 AM - 10 PM 

Fridays: 2 PM - 10 PM

Sheikh Mohammed Bin Rashid Boulevard

Depends on the location. However, most of the restaurants and outlets are open until midnight.
activities.information:
Discover Downtown Dubai, a lively entertainment district filled with popular restaurants, cafes, and shops.

  • Burj Khalifa: the world’s tallest building.
  • Dubai Mall: one of the world’s biggest shopping malls.
  • Dubai Fountain: the world’s biggest choreographed fountain show.
  • Dubai Opera: a multi-format performing arts center.
  • Souk Al Bahar: a modern Arabic souk which hosts a variety of restaurants and shopping outlets.  
  • Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Boulevard: a 3.5 km long boulevard offering a wide selection of restaurants, cafes, and outdoor art exhibitions.

activities.name: Palm Jumeirah
activities.information:
Palm Jumeirah is a man-made island in the shape of a palm tree that stretches out into the Arabian Gulf. It is often referred to as the eighth wonder of the world.

Discover the finest 5-star hotels, restaurants, dining promenades, shopping malls, beaches, and leisure tracks. It even has its own monorail.

activities.name: Personal Shopper/Stylist (Coming Soon)
activities.information:
Upgrade your wardrobe with a personal shopper. Browse the stores together or shop from your hotel room. 

We customize a unique shopping experience according to your preferences.
activities.pricing_content: Contact us for more information.

activities.name: Yachts
activities.information:
Whether you're visiting or residing in Dubai, you must experience a luxury yacht cruise, an experience Dubai is famous for.

Celebrate with friends and family, watch sunsets, and take in the amazing views of the iconic Dubai skyline. The crew can even create an itinerary tailored to your preferences.

Important:

  • Please arrive earlier than your booking time.
  • Cancellation or rescheduling 72 hours prior to the booking is free of charge.
  • Upon cancellation less than 48 hours prior to the booking, 50% of the total will be charged.
  • No-show or cancellation less than 24 hours prior to the booking will be non-refundable.
activities.pricing_content:

Contact us for more information.

activities.name: Private Desert Escape
activities.information:
This experience is private, exclusive, and bespoke. You can customize your desert escape to fit your desires.

Create your own menu and enjoy fine dining under the stars, catered by the most exclusive chefs.

Then you will experience a range of entertainment and activities.

Comfort is provided in the form of luxurious nomadic tents for your overnight stay, which includes dinner and breakfast.

*Tent occupancy is up to 4 guests.

Important:

﻿Less than 6 guests:

  • Cancellation up to 72 hours prior to the booked experience – eligible for a full refund with or without the Cancellation Protection Program.
  • Cancellation less than 72 hours prior to the booked experience – eligible for a full refund with the Cancellation Protection Program.
  • Cancellation less than 72 hours prior to the booked experience – not eligible for a refund without the Cancellation Protection Program.
activities.pricing_content:
Your Bespoke Desert Experience

  • A private and exclusive camp site in the beautiful dunes of the Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve.
  • Select your menu and enjoy amazing food under the stars, catered by the most exclusive chefs.
  • Enjoy a range of entertainment and activities.
  • Accommodation in luxurious nomadic tents (Tent occupancy is up to 4 guests*).
  • Your overnight stay includes dinner and breakfast.

Itinerary:

  • If you choose the chauffeur service, you'll be picked up from your hotel/home for a 30–40-minute  drive from Dubai. 
  • Choose from a gentle desert drive or a camel ride to reach our Camp.
  • Enjoy the activities you have selected, or simply revel in the beauty of the sunset.
  • Dinner will be served at your preferred time.
  • Be amazed by talented artists while enjoying a cup of tea/coffee.
  • Return to Dubai after your evening, or sleep in one of the beautiful nomadic tents.
  • Breakfast will be served in the early hours.
  • Return to Dubai in the morning.

3 PM to 9 PM

Timings vary depending on the exact pick-up location.

activities.information:
Visitors must experience the peaceful Dubai desert with a Private BBQ Dinner surrounded by untouched dunes. Your experience includes a thrilling dune drive and unlimited sandboarding.

A dedicated team will prepare a fresh BBQ dinner for you, served just after sunset when the sky darkens and the stars appear. We'll light the campfire for you to roast marshmallows on, before returning to Dubai with happy memories and sandy toes. It’s our signature experience: exclusive, authentic, and truly an adventure to remember!

Important:

Nesting offers a peaceful and innovative sleeping concept. Designed by award-winning Architect Gianni Ranaulo, this is sure to be an unforgettable night in the desert.

Each Nest has an en-suite bathroom and private terrace. Equipped with one double bed – an extra bed can also be installed in your Nest to cater for 2 adults and 2 children.

Inclusions:

  • Desert Nest of your choice with en-suite bathroom
  • Mini bar
  • Sunset tapas and wood fire pizza with soft drinks
  • Sandboarding

  • Nature walk

activities.name: At The Top Burj Khalifa
activities.timing_content: Monday to Sunday 7 AM - 11 PM
activities.information:
The Burj Khalifa is the world’s tallest tower and by far Dubai’s most iconic landmark, attracting thousands of visitors every year.

At The Top Burj Khalifa is located 585 meters up in the air, covering floors 152, 153, and 154., iIt is officially the tallest lounge in the world!

Enjoy views from the stunning outdoor terrace, where guests can capture the perfect selfie with unmatched sights of the glittering Dubai skyline.

activities.information:
Ski Dubai is the only place to experience a full-fledged ski resort in the UAE. Here, you can ski, snowboard, and zip line all year round!

Enjoy a variety of winter activities in the desert, such as skiing and snowboarding, zip lininge, and meeting the resident snow penguins. Passes include skiing equipment, fleece gloves, locker facilities, plus much more.

Important:

  • For safety reasons, children under 2 years of age are not allowed.
  • To ride on the Snow Bullet Ride, children must be above 8 years of age, 125 cm in height, and more than 30 kg in weight.
  • Adults should not weigh more than 120 kg.
  • Guests under the age of 14 must be supervised by an adult.
  • If you request a cancellation before 48 hours, you will receive a full refund.

activities.information:
The View Palm is one of Dubai’s newest attractions. Standing at 240 meters high, it's the tallest building on Palm Jumeirah. However, high-speed elevators can reach the 52nd floor in just 45 seconds. 

The View Palm is conveniently connected to Nakheel Mall and accessible from St. Regis Dubai The Palm. It boasts a unique 360-degree lookout point with unparalleled views of the iconic Palm Jumeirah, Bluewaters Island, Arabian Sea, and the Dubai Marina sky.

Aquaventure Waterpark Dubai is the world’s largest waterpark, with over 79 slides and attractions!

Make your way down Dubai’s longest Lazy River, and relax on 500 meters of private beach. Experience fun rides and attractions with full-day access to Dubai’s Largest Aquarium with Aquaventure Super Pass, and discover up to 65,000 marine creatures in The Lost Chambers Aquarium.

activities.timing_content:
Sunday to Thursday 12 PM to 8 PM

Friday and Saturday 11 AM to 9 PM
activities.information:
Don’t miss the ultimate and world-renowned wax experience. Madame Tussauds Dubai Wax Museum has recently opened on Bluewaters Island, which is walking distance from Ain Dubai. Madame Tussauds Dubai features 16 wax figures from the Middle East, with many being notable personalities. 

Strike a pose and get up close and personal with your favorite celebrities. The venue is divided into 7 fun zones: music party, fashion, film, leaders, media, Bollywood, and sport, each representing popular celebrities from that industry.

Important:

  • Tickets are non-refundable and non-transferable.

  • A group photographer and unlimited digital photos 
  • Meet the artists and learn more about the making of the figures 
  • Includes gifts and the Madame Tussauds Guidebook

activities.information:
Located on floors 52 and 53 of Address Sky View Hotel, the Observatory offers an unforgettable experience for residents and visitors alike. 

Take a thrilling ride in the panoramic glass elevator to more than 219.5 meters above the ground. Walk the 25-meter glass floor, and enjoy spectacular views of the city’s fabulous skyline and shining coast.

Sky Views Observatory offers three adrenaline-pumping activities, including the Glass Slide, a 12m-long glass transparent tube that wraps around the exterior of Address Sky View. Your ride from floor to floor is completely uninterrupted with amazing views of the city below.

activities.information:
Escape the city and experience a relaxing horseback ride in the scenic desert dunes of Dubai.  

Horse riding in the desert is the perfect opportunity to get back to nature and enjoy a unique horse-riding experience. This activity is set in the rolling desert dunes of the UAE, a country famous for equestrian sports.

Explore the Al Marmoum Desert conservation area, and see UAE’s abundant desert wildlife up close, with scenic views and a private lake.

Additional Information:

  • Age limit: 3+
  • Weight limit: 85 kg
  • It is advised to wear long pants and closed shoes to avoid rubbing bare skin on saddlery equipment
  • Please keep your feet in the stirrups throughout the duration of the ride
  • Pay close attention to everything your guides tell you, as they are there for your safety and protection
  • Please do not scream, shout, kick, slap, or jump up and down while riding or whilst near any of the animals – it may scare them and cause an accident
  • Helmets are provided for all riders; chaps and boots are subject to availability
  • Shower and change room facilities are available

Important:

  • It is not permissible to cancel the reserved activity within 24 hours of the scheduled time.

  • Weekends (Fridays, Saturday, Sunday & Holidays) - AED 170
  • Full Moon Horse Riding - AED 200

You will enjoy the sunset with a cold, fresh juice before the BBQ is served straight from the grill. After dinner, we light the campfire for marshmallow roasting before allowing you to turn in for the night at your leisure. In the morning, you will wake to a cooked breakfast upon the rising sun. This activity is sure to create memories that will last a lifetime.

activities.name: Hot Air Balloon
activities.timing_content: 7 days a week from October until the end the of May
activities.information:
Highlights:

  • Pick up and drop-off from Dubai in a luxury vehicle.
  • Arrive at the take-off site and watch the Balloon inflation.
  • Receive a 15-minute safety briefing from your pilot.
  • Enjoy ultra-comfort as the capacity of each basket compartment has been reduced to allow more room and exclusivity on every flight.
  • Board your balloon and take off with the sunrise; 1-hour flight (weather dependant).
  • After landing in the desert, your breakfast will be served in a desert setting.
  • Embark on a luxury one-hour nature drive through the Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve.
  • Bathroom facilities available.

Terms and Conditions:

  • Not suitable for children under 5 years old and not suitable for pregnant woman after their 1st trimester.
  • Not recommended for guests that has had major surgery in the last 6 months, has had a broken leg/arm in the last 6 months or anyone who suffers from chronic back, neck pain or injuries.
  • Children over 5 years old and under 12 years old will be accepted at the child rate.
  • Pick up from Dubai Hotels between 3:30 AM and 5:30 AM (depends on sunrise).
  • Return to the Hotel between 10:30 AM and 11:30 AM (depending on traffic).

Important:

  • Cancellations made at least 24 hours prior to tour departure are eligible for full refund.
  • Cancellations made less than 24 hours prior to tour departure are not eligible for refund.
  • If you fail to join a tour, join it after departure, or leave it prior to its completion, no refund can be made.

activities.information:
Get a chance to experience the iconic seven-star hotel Burj Al Arab, one of the world-famous landmarks of Dubai. This one-of-a-kind immersive experience welcomes guests to an exclusive 90-minute tour, to discover the untold stories of a true UAE landmark. The experience has been specially curated for up to 12 visitors, with butler-guided groups setting off every 15 minutes.

Important:

  • Tickets are non-refundable or transferable. Should you require to amend the date or time, please contact us within 48 hours prior to your booking time.

activities.timing_content:

(Last Entry at 10 PM)

Thursday to Saturday 10 AM - 12 AM

(Last entry - 11 PM)
activities.information:
The View Palm is one of Dubai’s newest attractions. Standing at 240 meters high, it's the tallest building on Palm Jumeirah. However, speed elevators can reach the 52nd floor in just 45 seconds.

The View Palm is conveniently connected to Nakheel Mall and accessible from St. Regis Dubai The Palm. It boasts a unique 360-degree lookout point with unparalleled views of the iconic Palm Jumeirah, Bluewaters Island, Arabian Sea, and the Dubai Marina sky.

activities.information:
Ski Dubai is the only place to experience a full-fledged ski resort in the UAE. Here, you can ski, snowboard, and zip line all year round!

Enjoy a variety of winter activities in the desert, such as skiing and snowboarding, zip lining, and meeting the resident snow penguins. Passes include skiing equipment, fleece gloves, locker facilities, plus much more.

Important:

  • For safety reasons, children under 2 years of age are not allowed.
  • To ride on the Snow Bullet Ride children must be above 8 years of age, 125 cm in height and more than 30 kg in weight.
  • Adults should not weigh more than 120 kg.
  • Guests under the age of 14 must be supervised by an adult.

activities.timing_content:
Wednesday to Sunday 6:30 PM - 8 PM / 9 PM - 10:30 PM

activities.information:
La Perle by Dragone is Dubai's number 1 permanent show, featuring breathtaking performances created by acclaimed theatre director Franco Dragone. 

His recent masterpiece is performed in world-class facilities in the heart of Dubai at Al Habtoor City.

Prepare to be amazed by flawless acrobatics, dancers, waterfalls, flying acts from incredible heights, and impressive visual effects. It will provide show-stopping entertainment for the whole family.

Important:

  • All bookings are non-refundable, non-transferable, and non-exchangeable.
  • In the event of a show being canceled, a new show will be rescheduled or a voucher will be provided.
  • Children ages 2+ are allowed to attend but MUST have a ticket.

activities.name: Dinner in the Sky
activities.timing_content:
Lunch is not available during the summer.

Weekdays (Sunday to Thursday)

• Session 1 (2 PM - 3:30 PM) Lunch

• Session 2 (3:30 PM - 5 PM) Lunch

• Session 3 (5 PM - 6:30 PM) Lunch

• Session 4 (6:30 PM - 8 PM) Dinner

• Session 5 (8 PM - 9:30 PM) Dinner

• Session 6 (9:30 PM - 11 PM) Dinner

The dining experience in the sky will take approximately 90 minutes: 15 minutes for seating guests, 60 minutes for flight duration, and 15 minutes for unseating guests.
activities.information:
Dinner in the Sky Dubai is an unforgettable unique dining experience 50 meters from the ground. It was selected by Forbes.com as one of the 10 most unusual restaurants in the world. 

Feast on a 3-course meal of your choice, suspended by a crane above Dubai Marina with panoramic views of the Marina skyline, Palm Jumeirah, and Bluewaters Island.

Enjoy lunch, dinner, or afternoon tea. All delicious meals are catered by top chefs from Le Meridien Hotel and The Westin Mina Seyahi Marina Resort.

Please note that the maximum table capacity is 22 guests.

Important:

  • Pregnant women are not allowed to experience Dinner in the Sky.
  • Persons under 14 years must be accompanied by an adult. 
  • Minimum height: 110 cm. Maximum weight: 150 kg.
  • Seats purchased cannot be refunded, exchanged, or cancelled once issued, except in the event of a cancellation by the venue itself.

activities.name: Madame Tussauds
activities.timing_content:
Sunday to Thursday: 12 PM to 8 PM

Friday and Saturday: 11 AM to 9 PM
activities.information:
Don’t miss the ultimate and world-renowned wax experience. Madame Tussauds Dubai Wax Museum has recently opened on Bluewaters Island, which is walking distance from Ain Dubai. Madame Tussauds Dubai features 16 wax figures from the Middle East, with many being notable personalities. 

Strike a pose and get up close and personal with your favorite celebrities. The venue is divided into 7 fun zones,: music party, fashion, film, leaders, media, Bollywood, and sport, each representing popular celebrities from that industry.

Important:

  • Tickets are non-refundable and non-transferable.
activities.pricing_content:
General Admission Ticket 

  • Adult - AED 150
  • Child (2-11 years old) - AED 125

Inclusions:

  • 90-min guided tour for up to 10 guests with fun facts and insights into the making of the figures 
  • A group photographer and unlimited digital photos 
  • Meet the artists and learn more about the making of the figures
  • Includes gifts and the Madame Tussauds Guidebook

activities.name: Atlantis Aquaventure Waterpark & The Lost Chambers Aquarium
activities.timing_content: Daily 10:00am – sunset (Closing time subject to change depending on the season)
activities.information:
Aquaventure Waterpark Dubai is the world’s largest waterpark, with over 79 slides and attractions!

Make your way down Dubai’s longest Lazy River, and relax on 500 meters of private beach. Experience fun rides and attractions with full-day access to Dubai’s Largest Aquarium with Aquaventure Super Pass, and discover up to 65,000 marine creatures in The Lost Chambers Aquarium.

Important:

  • Children under 1.2 metres (48”) should be always supervised by a responsible adult.
  • Guests under 12 years old should be accompanied by an adult for The Lost Chambers Aquarium admission.
  • Aquaventure Waterpark ticket sales are final and are 100% non-refundable.
  • Please make note of the Swim Attire Policy- no refunds or discounts will be given to guests who are unable to ride the slides due to inappropriate swim attire.
activities.pricing_content:

Age Policy

  • Children under 2 years old and below complimentary access.
  • Children under 1.2 metres (48”) should be always supervised by a responsible adult.
  • Guests under 12 years old should be accompanied by an adult for The Lost Chambers Aquarium admission.

*A valid Emirates I.D. must be presented at the ticket office.

activities.name: Dubai Mall Aquarium & Underwater Zoo
activities.timing_content:
Weekdays 10:00 AM - 11:00 PM

Weekends 10:00 AM - 01:00 AM
activities.information:
Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo is the world’s largest suspended aquarium tank.

Home to thousands of aquatic animals, with over 140 species and 400 sharks and rays, including sand tiger sharks and giant groupers.

A series of carefully designed experiences allow visitors to come face to face with aquatic residents for memorable moments with friends and family.

activities.address: E311 Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Rd - City of Arabia

Sunday to Thursday 12:00 PM - 10:00 PM

Friday & Saturday 12:00 PM - 11:00 PM
activities.information:
Visit the world's largest indoor theme park! IMG Worlds of Adventure is Dubai's first mega-themed entertainment destination, covering an area of over 1.5 million square feet. The park is divided into five zones, representing global brands such as Cartoon Network and Marvel.

Free parking is available and there is plenty of space for everyone.

Valet parking is also available for an additional fee.

Important:

  • Children under the age of 12 must be accompanied by an adult aged 16+ years.
  • Tickets are non-refundable and non-transferable.

  • Per person - AED 365
  • Children below 1.05 m - FREE

activities.name: The Green Planet
activities.timing_content: Daily 10 AM - 6 PM
activities.information:
Green Planet takes guests deep into the heart of the Amazon.

Discover an enchanting enclosed eco-system in a tropical indoor rainforest in City Walk. Home to more than 3,000 species of plant and animal life, Green Planet invites guests to explore our planet’s fascinating flora and fauna through an immersive expedition into the tropics.

The educational rainforest helps to spread awareness of nature’s delicate balance and the importance of our oldest living eco-systems.

Important:

  • Children under the age of 13 years old must be accompanied by an adult 18 years and above.
  • All bookings are non-refundable, non-transferable and non-exchangeable.
  • Online booking confirmations must be shown in print or on a smart device at the venue, all bookings must be exchanged for tickets or vouchers to enter the park.

activities.name: Helicopter Tour
activities.address: White Beach Parking Atlantis Hotel, Palm Jumeirah
activities.timing_content: Daily 9 AM - 5:30 PM
activities.information:
Enjoy a bird’s-eye view flying over iconic Dubai landmarks onboard a luxury helicopter.

Depart from a helipad at Atlantis the Palm and experience a memorable 12, 15, or 25-minute scenic flight. 

With this activity, you can admire Dubai’s skyline from a unique perspective, flying above sights such as Burj Al Arab, Burj Khalifa, and Palm Jumeirah.

Each helicopter has 6 seats, including 3 window seats for maximum views, with live narration by your professional, experienced pilot.

Important:

  • Don't forget to bring a pair of sunglasses and a jacket or sweater, especially during winter (November to March). These items are essential for passengers' comfort.
  • The weight limit is 110 kg per passenger. Passengers who weigh more than this or close to this may have to wait for a flight that can safely accommodate their weight.
  • If cancellation is made at least 7 days prior to the start of the service, no cancellation fee will be charged.
  • In the event of a cancellation made between 6 to 4 calendar days before the start of the service, a cancellation fee of 50% will be charged.
  • If the cancellation is made within 3 calendar days of the start of the service, a cancellation fee of 100% will be charged, and no refund will be provided.
  • If the cancellation is made on the day of the scheduled service or after, a cancellation fee of 100% will be charged, and no refund will be given.
activities.pricing_content:
Pearl Heli - 12 min

  • Sharing: AED 715
  • Exclusive 6-seater: AED 3,145
  • Exclusive 7-seater: AED 3,670
  • Inclusions: 12-minute flight takes off from Atlantis Hotel at The Palm Jumeirah Island and heads to Burj Khalifa, the most iconic tower in the world, flying over Burj Al Arab, Dubai coastline, and the most famous landmarks of Dubai. 

Fun Ride - 15 min

  • Sharing: AED 921
  • Exclusive 6-seater: AED 4,041
  • Exclusive 7-seater: AED 4,715
  • Inclusions: Fly from Dubai’s most famous man-made island to the world’s tallest tower. Going from Atlantis The Palm to Burj Khalifa, you'll see Aquaventure Water Park, the striking Burj Al Arab, Jumeirah Beach coastline, and The World Islands from its south pole. 

City Circuit - 25 min

  • Sharing: AED 1,450
  • Exclusive 6-seater: AED 6,353
  • Exclusive 7-seater: AED 7,410
  • Inclusions: Experience a dramatic ascent from a modern man-made wonder to the historic Creek where Dubai was born. From Atlantis The Palm, across the Gulf and over The Worlds Islands, before proceeding to Burj Khalifa, the world’s tallest tower. Take in the skyscrapers of Sheikh Zayed Road before marveling at Dubai Creek with its captivating heritage architecture. On the way back, you will pass Port Rashid, Union House, and the Jumeirah Beach coastline until Burj Al Arab, before swerving inland to see Dubai Marina.

activities.name: Sky Views Edge Walk
activities.timing_content: Daily 11 AM - 8 PM
activities.information:
Experience Edge Walk, the highest full-circle hands-free walk in Dubai. This activity will take you along the ledge of the 53rd floor of Address Sky View, almost 220 meters above the ground! Admire sweeping views of Burj Khalifa while defying gravity – with no windows or other barriers between you and the views.

Important:

  • For visitors of the Sky Slide who wish to watch the sunset between 3 PM and 7 PM, we recommend booking an entry time approximately 90 minutes prior during peak seasons.
  • Please arrive at least 20-30 minutes before the scheduled visit.
  • Ages 12-65 (parental consent required in person for those under 18 years of age).
  • Weight: 30–120 kg.
  • Height: 135–200 cm.
  • Modest, comfortable clothing and closed-toed shoes – no skirts, dresses, high heels, flip-flops, or loose footwear.
  • Good medical condition.
  • Wearing the Edge Walk overall is a must to ensure the safety of all guests.
  • Not pregnant.
  • Free of existing or recurring injuries.
  • Not under the influence of narcotics, spirits or any other substances that impair judgement (e.g. medicine).
  • Free from serious physical or mental disorders that would not allow you to complete the physical and mental tasks required during the experience.
  • Free from medical conditions that require immediate medical attention.
  • Tickets are non-refundable and non-exchangeable.

  • Note: Ages 12-65 (parental consent required in person for those under 18 years of age).

activities.information:
IFly Dubai offers an amazing indoor skydiving experience, welcoming flyers of all ages and abilities.

Discover the thrill of skydiving during a free fall in a safe, supervised, and controlled tunnel environment with highly experienced instructors fully trained in operating our equipment. A professional team provides a one-to-one experience which is safe as well as thrilling.

Important:

activities.information:
Interact with dolphins and sea lions at Atlas Bay Atlantis The Palm Dubai, one of the world's most sophisticated dolphin habitats. Choose from a range of dolphin and sea lion experiences – suitable for all ages and swimming abilities.

Every experience includes unlimited access to Aquaventure Waterpark, the world’s largest waterpark, for the day. Enjoy 105 slides, attractions and experiences, a private beach, and a wave rider.

Important:

  • If unaccompanied by an adult, children must be at least 13 years old to enter Aquaventure.
  • All children under 12 years old must be accompanied by a participating and paying adult over 18.
  • Children 2 years old and below have complimentary access to Dolphin Meet & Greet, Dolphin Encounter, and Sea Lion Meet & Greet.

  • This experience is for all ages and swimming abilities - guests can dip and play with the dolphins in the water. This is an activity suitable for beginner swimmers as well. Includes free same-day access to Aquaventure Waterpark.

Experience a day of action-packed nature adventure inside Dubai’s largest zip line park at Aventura Adventure Park! 

Enjoy unlimited access to over 85 exhilarating challenges across 5 different levels off the ground and between trees. You will be guided by expert instructors and facilitators to ensure a safe experience. Exciting activities include zip-lining, rope climbing, Tarzan Swings, and much more inside the park’s 35,000sqm of adventure areas. Aventura Parks caters to all ages and groups it’s the perfect place to spend time bonding and having fun.

Escape the desert heat and spend a cold winter day at Ski Dubai!

Dubai is home to The Middle East’s first indoor ski resort, Ski Dubai, located at Mall of the Emirates. Ski Dubai covers 22,500 square meters with real snow all year round and has the world’s first sub-zero zipline. Exciting attractions include the opportunity to meet with penguins. Book the Peng-Friend Encounter or Snow Premium package for unlimited access to the Ski Dubai and a chance to meet penguins up close.
