activities.name: Skydive Dubai
activities.timing_content: Daily 8 AM - 2:30 PM
activities.information:
Take the leap and experience a breathtaking free-fall and parachute ride from 13,000 feet with trained tandem skydiving instructors. Sky Dive Dubai is one of the city’s top attractions, and it allows you to discover Dubai from a new perspective.

You can choose from two incredible locations for this activity: the iconic Palm Jumeirah or over the Arabian desert.

Important:

  • You must be 18 years of age or above (according to the Gregorian calendar) on the day of your tandem skydive. Please bring a valid and official government photo ID (Emirates ID, driver’s license, passport) on the day of your skydive.
  • Please be informed that the guest's first and last name should match the ID.
  • Divers must be in a reasonable state of health.
  • Weight requirements: Males must weigh 100.0 kg or less with a maximum BMI of 30.0 and females must weigh 90.0 kg or less with a maximum BMI of 27.5.
  • Once the booking is confirmed, it cannot be cancelled as the tickets are non-refundable.
  • The booking time is the arrival time. Please be at the location 20-30 minutes earlier.
  • Minors are not permitted to skydive.
activities.pricing_content:
Tandem skydive (Jump attached to an experienced instructor)

The Palm Dropzone

  • Weekdays & Weekend Tandem skydive with photos and video at Palm location - AED 2,749

The Desert Dropzone

  • Weekdays & Weekend Tandem skydive with photos and video at Desert location - AED 2,199

activities.name: XLine Dubai
activities.timing_content:
Monday to Sunday 10 AM - 5 PM

Tuesday - Closed
activities.information:
Enjoy breathtaking views of Dubai Marina with Xline Dubai, the longest urban zipline in the world. Setting off from a 170-meter launchpad, you will weave past skyscrapers across the Marina to Dubai Marina Mall at speeds of up to 80 kmph.

Pictures and videos of your experience are provided and the double zipline feature helps you enjoy a shared experience with your friends and family. It's sure to be a day of adrenaline-packed fun.

Important:

  • Ages 12-65 (parental consent required in person for those under 18 years of age)
  • 45–100 kg
  • Taller than 130 cm
  • Modest comfortable clothing and closed shoes – no skirts, dresses, or flip-flops
  • Good medical condition
  • Not pregnant
  • Free of existing or recurring injuries
  • Not under the influence of narcotics, spirits or any other substances that impair judgement (e.g. medicine)
  • Free from serious physical or mental disorders that would not allow you to complete the physical and mental tasks asked throughout the ride
  • Free from medical conditions that require immediate medical attention
  • Once the booking is confirmed, it cannot be cancelled as the tickets are non-refundable
activities.pricing_content:
Go Ziplining

  • XLine Experience Adult - AED 699
  • XLine Experience Child (12 to 16 years old) - AED 499

activities.name: Deep Dive Dubai
activities.timing_content: Daily - 9 AM - 6 PM
activities.information:
Deep Dive Dubai is the latest record-breaking attraction in Dubai! It is the only diving facility in the world where you can dive to depths of 60 meters and is verified by the Guinness World Record as the world's deepest swimming pool. 

The pool has an area designed to resemble a sunken city, and it is also used as an underwater film studio.

Important:

  • On entry, customers must display a valid photo identification document, such as original Emirates ID, driving license in English, or original passport. The name on the identification document must match the individual participating in the diving experience. Entrance is valid only for the specified person and time mentioned on the ticket and cannot be reused across multiple bookings.
  • All Deep Dive Dubai bookings are paid in full at the time of reservation.
  • Deep Dive Dubai bookings are non-refundable.
  • A parent/legal guardian must be present during any diving experience and provide written consent for minors.
  • All bookings must honor the specific terms and conditions for the given experience.
  • Deep Dive Dubai booking is valid for the booked date and time only.
  • Rescheduling is allowed up to 5 days in advance. Rescheduling must be completed within 6 months of the original booking.
activities.pricing_content:
Discover Scuba for non-certified guests (up to 12m)

  • Standard Discover Scuba - AED 1,800
  • Premium Discovery Scuba - AED 2,400 - includes edited video, honorary wall certificate
  • Platinum Discovery Scuba - AED 3,000 - includes edited short and long video, personalized images, facility tour, honorary wall certificate

Guided Scuba up to 30m for certified guests (certification required)

  • Standard Guided Scuba - AED 1,200
  • Premium Guided Scuba - AED 2,400 - includes edited video, honorary wall certificate
  • Platinum Guided Scuba - AED 3,000 - includes edited short and long video, personalized images, facility tour, honorary wall certificate

Discover Snorkeling

  • Snorkeling - AED 400

activities.name: Theatre of Digital Art (ToDa)
activities.timing_content: Daily 11 AM - 11 PM
activities.information:
Located in Souk Madinat Jumeirah, ToDA Dubai is an impressive digital art and culture exhibition. ToDA combines 3 formats of digital art with multimedia exhibitions, immersive installations and art in virtual reality, incorporating visual effects and surround sound. Experience some of the world’s most profound artists, transforming Souk Madinat Jumeirah’s art space into a modern stage.

Important:

  • All bookings are non-refundable, non-transferable and non-exchangeable.
activities.pricing_content:
Digital Art Show - General Admission

  • Adult - AED 116.29
  • Child (3-11 years old) - AED 60

activities.timing_content:
Motiongate Dubai

Sunday to Thursday 11:00 AM - 08:00 PM

Friday & Saturday 11:00 AM - 09:00 PM
activities.information:
Motiongate Dubai is a Hollywood-inspired theme park located in Dubai Parks and Resorts. It features 4 world-famous motion picture studios (Dreamworks Animation, Columbia Pictures, Lionsgate, and Smurfs) and has 40 world-class attractions.

Important:

  • Tickets are non-refundable, non-resalable, and non-exchangeable for any other promotion, discount or ticket.

  • Free admission for children under 3 years of age

activities.name: Dubai Parks & Resorts: Legoland
activities.timing_content:
Legoland Dubai

Monday to Friday 10:00 AM - 06:00 PM

Saturday & Sunday 10:00 AM - 7:00 PM
activities.information:
Legoland Dubai has six themed lands: Factory, Lego City, Imagination, Kingdoms, Adventure, and Miniland. The park features over 40 Lego-themed interactive rides, shows, and attractions, as well as 15,000 Lego model structures made from over 60 million Lego bricks.﻿

Important:

  • Tickets are non-refundable, non-resalable and non-exchangeable for any other promotion, discount or ticket.

  • Free admission for children under 3 years of age

activities.timing_content:
Legoland Waterpark

Monday to Friday 10:00 AM - 06:00 PM

Saturday & Sunday 10:00 AM - 7:00 PM
activities.information:
Legoland Waterpark features 20 Lego-themed water slides and attractions designed for families with kids aged 2-12. Visitors can enjoy the Joker Soaker, construct their own Lego raft, embark on a splash safari, and slide down thrilling attractions. It will be a day of endless fun!

Important:

  • Tickets are non-refundable, non-resalable, and non-exchangeable for any other promotion, discount, or ticket.

activities.name: Gyrocopter Flight
activities.timing_content:
Monday to Sunday 8:30 AM - 2 PM

Tuesday and Wednesday - CLOSED
activities.information:
The standard package includes a 20-minute flight. Pictures and an edited video of the experience are complimentary.

The flight takes off from Skydive Dubai Palm, giving you the best aerial views of Dubai Marina, Ain Dubai, Palm Jumeirah island, the Atlantis, Kite beach, and Burj Al Arab. You will fly back through the city over the Sheikh Zayed Road and Mall of the Emirates, passing the Palm view back to Skydive Dubai runway.

What to bring:

  • Valid ID or passport
  • Pair of sunglasses
  • Jacket or sweater, during the cold months

Important:

  • You must be 17 years old (according to the Gregorian calendar) on the day of your flight. Customers must meet this requirement.
  • Your weight must be 105 kg or below on the day of your flight. Sorry, this is a legal requirement from our manufacturers, and we cannot make any exceptions. Customers must meet this requirement. Due to weather conditions the weight limit during the summer is 100 kg. 
  • If you do not show up for your Gyrocopter flight and the experience has been paid for in advance, your money will not be refunded.
  • You must reschedule your flight at least 24 hours prior to the date. In this case, your booking must be redeemed within 6 months from the date of purchase unless otherwise stated on the receipt.
  • All customers are requested to arrive 30 minutes prior to their booking/flight time. 
  • This experience is not suitable for pregnant women.
activities.pricing_content:
20-minute Gyrocopter Flight

  • AED 1,199 per person

activities.information:
Become a captain for the day and experience Dubai’s first self-drive boat tour cruising along the iconic coastline of Dubai! Water sports and boating are very popular activities in Dubai, perfect for sea-lovers looking for their next adventure. No boat license required to become a captain for the day.

This activity is a fun alternative to sightseeing in Dubai with plenty of photo opportunities of Dubai’s coastline and skyline. Reach speeds of 50km/h on these speedy HERO boats as you stop at famous landmarks such as Burj Al Arab, Atlantis, The Palm Jumeirah and Ain Dubai.

Important:

  • Children under 6 years are not permitted on this activity.
  • Children from 6 years and above must be accompanied by an adult or guardian who is over 18 years old and able to drive the boats.
  • All guests must be 18 years or above to be permitted to drive the boats.
  • Cancellations made at least 24 hours prior to tour departure are eligible for full refund.
  • Cancellations made less than 24 hours prior to tour departure are not eligible for refund.

Cruise towards the iconic Burj Al Arab, Atlantis The Palm, and Ain Dubai for the best views of Dubai – perfect for memorable photographs. Enjoy delicious food and beverages onboard, whether it’s breakfast, lunch, or dinner, and then head back to the marina as the tour ends.

activities.information:
Experience a unique water sightseeing tour of the iconic skyline of Dubai. The Boat Tour offers memorable sea tours of the top landmarks in Dubai such as Dubai Marina, Palm Jumeirah, Burj Al Arab, Ain Dubai, and Atlantis.

Departing daily from Dubai Marina, the tours offer a wide variety of departure times to suit your preferences, with guaranteed stunning sights and plenty of opportunities for photos.

Each boat is equipped with GPS, life jackets, refreshments, and qualified guides, allowing you to have the best and safest experience.

Important:

  • For safety reasons, infants or children below 14 kg are not allowed on the tour.

  • All passengers must wear life jackets.
  • If passengers run late, the ride time will be reduced accordingly.

Water sports and boating are extremely popular activities in Dubai, making this perfect for sea-lovers seeking their next adventure. No boat license is required to become a captain for the day.

This activity offers a fun alternative to sightseeing in Dubai, with ample photo opportunities of Dubai’s coastline and skyline. Reach speeds of 50 km/h on these speedy HERO boats as you stop at famous landmarks such as Burj Al Arab, Atlantis, The Palm Jumeirah, and Ain Dubai.

Important:

  • Children under 6 years are not permitted on this activity.
  • Children aged 6 years and above must be accompanied by an adult or guardian who is over 18 years old and capable of driving the boats.
  • All guests driving the boats must be 18 years or above.
  • Cancellations made at least 24 hours prior to tour departure are eligible for a full refund.
  • Cancellations made less than 24 hours prior to tour departure are not eligible for a refund.
  • If you fail to join a tour, join it after departure, or leave it prior to its completion, no refund can be made.

  • AED 690 - 90 Min Tour

activities.information:
Experience a Luxury Sharing Yacht Experience departing from Dubai Marina.

Perfect for couples, friends, families, and small groups wanting to explore the Dubai Sea without having to hire a private yacht.

Select from a morning, afternoon, or evening cruise for an unforgettable experience on this luxury yacht tour.

Cruise towards the iconic Burj Al Arab, Atlantis The Palm, and Ain Dubai for the best views of Dubai, – perfect for memorable photographs. Enjoy delicious food and beverages onboard, whether it’s breakfast, lunch, or dinner, and then head back to the marina as the tour ends.

Important:

  • All persons under the age of 21 years must be supervised by an adult.
  • All guests are required by law to bring their original ID. Tourists require an original Passport. Residents can bring a Passport, Emirates ID, or Emirates Driving License.
  • Abuse of alcohol & subsequent reckless behavior may result in fines or a termination of the charter without any refunds.
  • No refund if the cancellation occurs within 48 hours of the booking time and date.
  • Full refund if cancellation occurs before 48 hours of the booking time and date.

activities.timing_content: Daily 8 AM - 5 PM
activities.information:
Experience the popular water sport Flyboarding in Dubai, guided by a friendly and expert instructor.

Your instructor will assist and adjust the power according to your skill level, teaching you new tricks such as spinning and diving like a dolphin.

Feel the adrenaline rush as you ascend into the air, dive, and leap out of the water during a 15- or 30-minute session.

Safety briefing and equipment are included.

Important:

  • 100% payment will be charged for cancellations within 24 hours of the booked activity.
  • 50% payment will be charged for cancellations made before 48 hours of the booked activity.
  • 25% payment will be charged for cancellations made before 72 hours of the booked activity.
  • Full payment will be refunded if the cancellation is due to force majeure or adverse weather conditions.

activities.information:
Experience a unique water sightseeing tour of the iconic skyline of Dubai. The Boat Tour offers memorable sea tours of the top landmarks in Dubai, such as Dubai Marina, Palm Jumeirah, Burj Al Arab, Ain Dubai, and Atlantis.

Departing daily from Dubai Marina, the tours offer a wide variety of departure times to suit your preferences, with guaranteed stunning sights and plenty of opportunities for photos.

Each boat is equipped with GPS, life jackets, refreshments, and qualified guides, allowing you to have the best and safest experience.

Important:

  • Children 12 years and under should be accompanied by an adult.
  • Tickets are non-refundable.
  • A minimum of 24 hours notice for rescheduling requests. (Acceptable for one-time reschedule only and subject to availability).
  • Prior booking is required at least 24 hours in advance.
  • Each boat has a capacity of 12 passengers.
  • For safety reasons, infants or children below 14 kg are not allowed on the tour.
  • Passengers must carry an original identification card (Passport, Emirates ID, or Driver's license).
  • All passengers must wear life jackets.
  • If passengers run late, the ride time will be reduced accordingly.

activities.information:
View Dubai’s most iconic landmarks such as Atlantis The Palm, Dubai Marina, Jumeirah Beach Residence, and Ain Dubai from a unique perspective with an exciting parasailing activity.

Soar through the sky as you are towed behind a boat, attached to a specially designed canopy wing known as a parasail, with up to 3 of your friends.

What to bring:

activities.information:
Cruise around Dubai’s waters in style on a boat that is shaped like a convertible sports car but rides like a jet ski.

You can ride your jet car alone or have fun with your family and friends. Up to a maximum of 2 passengers at a time. Children above 14 years old are always welcome – provided that they are with their legal guardian. 

Important:

  • All guests are required by law to bring their original ID. Tourists require an original Passport. Residents can bring a Passport, Emirates ID, or Emirates Driving License.

activities.name: Luxury Heritage Safari
activities.timing_content:
Pick-up: around 2 PM - 4:15 PM

Drop-off: around 9:30 PM
activities.information:
Experience a luxury desert safari with the leading operator of desert experiences in Dubai. Our tours allow you to witness the magnificent landscape of the reserve, delve into the rich culture and history of the region and experience thrilling adventures in the desert.

Highlights:

  • Discover nature, culture, and adventure at the Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve.
  • Watch an engaging and interactive falcon show, go on a nature trail in rare, iconic, classic 1950s open-top land rovers, and then take a camel trek at sunset.
  • Indulge in a luxury camp and enjoy Arabian inspired cuisine.
  • Our campsite provides the perfect ambience for a memorable evening under the stars.
  • Enjoy fascinating shows and entertainment in the heart of the desert. 

Important:

  • Full refund if cancelled at least 2 days before the event.
  • Failure to join the tour, joining after departure, or leaving before its completion will result in forfeiture of any refund.
  • These cancellation policy are subject to change.

activities.information:
Navigate the sand dunes and spot some of the fascinating animals that roam freely in the desert. If you’re lucky, you may get the chance to take a picture with one of the local camels. You’ll also get the chance to stop off at scenic locations to snap pictures of the panoramic views, keeping your special memories alive forever. 

Riders are assessed on ability and a full safety briefing is given, ensuring your ride is suitable for you.

Important:

  • If you want to get behind the wheel of a self-drive buggy, you must be over the age of 16. If under 16, an adult’s presence is required.
  • A driver’s license is not required, but a preliminary training session will be provided, before taking you on the ATV trail.
  • Cancellation of the reservation is non-refundable, but can be reschedule. An activity will be deemed canceled if you do not show up at the agreed-upon location by the scheduled departure time.

activities.name: Hot Air Balloon
activities.timing_content: 7 days a week from October until the end the of May
activities.information:
Highlights:

  • Pick up and drop-off from Dubai in a luxury vehicle.
  • Arrive at the take-off site and watch the Balloon inflation.
  • Receive a 15-minute safety briefing from your pilot.
  • Enjoy ultra-comfort as the capacity of each basket compartment has been reduced to allow more room and exclusivity on every flight.
  • Board your balloon and take off with the sunrise; 1-hour flight (weather dependant).
  • After landing in the desert, your breakfast will be served in a desert setting.
  • Embark on a luxury one-hour nature drive through the Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve.
  • Bathroom facilities available.

Terms and Conditions:

  • Not suitable for children under 5 years old and not suitable for pregnant woman after their 1st trimester.
  • Not recommended for guests that has had major surgery in the last 6 months, has had a broken leg/arm in the last 6 months or anyone who suffers from chronic back, neck pain or injuries.
  • Children over 5 years old and under 12 years old will be accepted at the child rate.
  • Pick up from Dubai Hotels between 3:30 AM and 5:30 AM (depends on sunrise).
  • Return to the Hotel between 10:30 AM and 11:30 AM (depending on traffic).

Important:

  • Cancellations made at least 24 hours prior to tour departure are eligible for full refund.
  • Cancellations made less than 24 hours prior to tour departure are not eligible for refund.
  • If you fail to join a tour, join it after departure, or leave it prior to its completion, no refund can be made.

activities.information:
The day will start with a mesmerizing sunrise desert drive that will introduce you to the natural wonders that Dubai has to offer. Then you will traverse the rolling dunes in a comfortable and well-equipped vehicle, expertly guided by our seasoned desert drivers, and witness the stunning sunrise.

Highlights:

  • Take a sunrise desert drive as the sun gracefully paints the sky with hues of orange and gold. Capture stunning photographs and create memories that will last a lifetime.
  • Indulge in a delicious breakfast with culinary delights, crafted to tantalize at Al Maha Desert Resort.
  • Enlightening visit to the Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve Visitor Center.
  • Spot wildlife in its natural habitat and enjoy the unparalleled journey through Dubai’s desert wonders.
  • Experience and witness the untouched beauty of the desert.

Important:

  • Full refund if cancelled at least 2 days before the event.
  • Failure to join the tour, joining after departure, or leaving before its completion will result in forfeiture of any refund.

activities.information:
Escape the hustle and bustle of the city and discover a refined desert camp at the pristine Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve. Home to native wildlife such as oryxes and gazelles, this luxury desert escape focuses on an eco-friendly and sustainable experience, with a zero-waste policy to preserve the natural landscape.

Dinner under the stars is prepared by the resident chef in an open-air kitchen, showcasing Arabic-inspired dishes, as well as classic European cuisine.

activities.information:
Escape the city and experience a relaxing horseback ride in the scenic desert dunes of Dubai.  

Horse riding in the desert is the perfect opportunity to get back to nature and enjoy a unique horse-riding experience. This activity is set in the rolling desert dunes of the UAE, a country famous for equestrian sports.

Explore the Al Marmoum Desert conservation area, and see UAE’s abundant desert wildlife up close, with scenic views and a private lake.

Additional Information:

  • Age limit: 3+
  • Weight limit: 85 kg
  • It is advised to wear long pants and closed shoes to avoid rubbing bare skin on saddlery equipment
  • Please keep your feet in the stirrups throughout the duration of the ride
  • Pay close attention to everything your guides tell you, as they are there for your safety and protection
  • Please do not scream, shout, kick, slap, or jump up and down while riding or whilst near any of the animals – it may scare them and cause an accident
  • Helmets are provided for all riders; chaps and boots are subject to availability
  • Showers and change room facilities are available

Important:

  • It is not permissible to cancel the reserved activity within 24 hours of the scheduled time.
activities.pricing_content:
Horse Riding in the Desert

  • Weekends (Fridays, Saturday, Sunday & Holidays) - AED 170
  • Full Moon Horse Riding - AED 200

Each Nest has an en-suite bathroom and private terrace. Equipped with one double bed – an extra bed can also be installed in your Nest to cater for 2 adults and 2 children.

A dedicated team will prepare a fresh BBQ dinner for you, served just after sunset when the sky darkens and the stars come out. We'll light the campfire for you to roast marshmallows on, before heading back to Dubai with happy memories and sandy toes. It’s our signature adventure for being exclusive, authentic, and truly an adventure to remember!

  • Campfire and marshmallows

Checklist:

  • Not recommended for pregnant guests within their third trimester
  • Not recommended for guests that have had major surgery in the last 6 months, anyone that has had a broken leg/arm in the last 6 months, or anyone who suffers from chronic back, neck pain, or injuries
  • Closed shoes for the sandboarding
  • Comfortable, light clothing
  • Sun protection

activities.name: Overnight Luxury Glamping in the Desert
activities.timing_content:
• Typical timing: 3 PM to 9 AM the following day
  • Timings will vary during the winter months (October to May) and summer months (June to September)
  • Timings vary depending on the exact pick up location
  • Duration: approximately 17 hours
activities.information:
An overnight luxury camping experience in the desert will give you both adventure and relaxation.

Discover the stunning landscape and desert dunes, enjoy the sunset with a cold fresh juice, and tuck into a delicious BBQ served straight from the grill. 

After dinner, the team will light the campfire for you to roast marshmallows on before allowing you to turn in for the night at your leisure. You will then start your morning with a cooked breakfast and the rising sun. These memories will last a lifetime. 

Important:

  • Cancellations up to 3 calendar days prior to your booked tour date are eligible for a full refund.
  • Cancellations less than 3 calendar days prior to your booked tour date are eligible for a rescheduled date within 6 months of the booking date without penalty.
  • No refund will be given less than 3 calendar days prior to your booking date.
  • Cancellations must be received in writing stating the tour details and booking name.
  • Any cancellation within 24 hours prior to the tour booking date will not be eligible for a refund.
activities.pricing_content:
Overnight Glamping Adventure 

  • For minimum 2 guests sharing one tent - AED 2,990
  • For an additional guest - AED 700
  • Per additional tent with up to two beds - AED 850

Inclusions: 

  • Round-trip transfer by 4x4 from your hotel/home
  • Hot and cold BBQ dinner off the grill
  • Cooked breakfast with tea and coffee
  • Unlimited water, soft drinks, and fresh juice
  • Exciting dune bashing drive
  • Camel farm visit
  • Unlimited sandboarding
  • Campfire and marshmallows
  • Canvas Bell tent 5m round, with mattresses, cotton bedding, and decorations 

Checklist:

  • No back or neck injuries
  • No pregnancies
  • Closed shoes for the sandboarding
  • Comfortable light clothing
  • Your usual sun protection

activities.name: Theatre of Digital Art (ToDa)
activities.information: Located in Souk Madinat Jumeirah, ToDA Dubai is an impressive digital art and culture exhibition. ToDA combines 3 formats of digital art with multimedia exhibitions, immersive installations and art in virtual reality, incorporating visual effects and surround sound. Experience some of the world’s most profound artists, transforming Souk Madinat Jumeirah’s art space into a modern stage.
activities.pricing_content:
Digital Art Show - General Admission

  • Adult - AED 110
  • Child (3-11 years old) - AED 60

activities.name: Dubai Opera
activities.information: The Dubai Opera House is the first multi-format performing arts theatre in Dubai, situated in the heart of Downtown with front-row views of Burj Khalifa and the famous dancing fountains. The state-of-the-art theatre hosts a variety of performances throughout the year to enjoy, including ballet, musicals, comedy, concerts, and family shows.

activities.name: La Perle
activities.information:
La Perle by Dragone is Dubai's number 1 permanent show, featuring breathtaking performances created by acclaimed theatre director Franco Dragone. 

His recent masterpiece is performed in world-class facilities, located in the heart of Dubai at Al Habtoor City.

Prepare to be amazed by flawless acrobatics, dancers, waterfalls, flying acts from incredible heights and impressive visual effects, promising show-stopping entertainment for the whole family.
activities.pricing_content:

  • AED 269 per person

Silver Ticket

  • AED 319 per person

Gold Ticket

  • AED 419 per person

VIP Ticket

  • AED 809 per person

activities.name: Miracle Garden
activities.information: The Dubai Miracle Garden operates seasonally from November to April and is the world's largest natural flower garden, earning two Guinness World Record titles. Located in Dubailand, discover millions of flowers and giant floral structures including the record-breaking Emirates Airbus A380 arrangement, covered in more than 500,000 flowers. Dubai Miracle Garden is also home to Dubai Butterfly Garden, the region’s largest butterfly garden featuring 15,000 butterflies and 26 species.
activities.pricing_content:
General Admission

  • Adult - AED 95
  • Child (3 to 12 years old) - AED 80

activities.name: Global Village
activities.information: Global Village Dubai is a theme park for all ages, featuring 27 pavilions representing more than 75 countries. Explore cultures and cuisines from around the globe including family fun entertainment, live shows, rides, shopping and landmark attractions.
activities.pricing_content:
Park Entry

  • AED 25 per person

activities.name: Personal Concierge
activities.information:
Let us take care of your busy schedule with our dedicated personal assistants, available on-site or virtually 24/7, so you can focus on what is most important to you. Our specialist services and reservations include:

Private Jets

Private jets are a luxurious and comfortable way to travel. We can manage the entire process for you, tailoring it to your needs, and ensuring maximum satisfaction, including organizing bookings, flights, and transfers from the airport to the destination.

Real Estate in Dubai

Book your luxury real estate with us, from beachfront villas to high-rise apartments and penthouses. Select from long-term or short-term stays and your desired neighborhood.

Company Formation (Onshore & Offshore) 

It is important to fully understand your options before establishing your company’s presence in the UAE. Book a consultation with professionals who can guide you step-by-step to conduct the right business set-up, offering business support for UAE Free Zone Entities, Offshore companies and Mainland LLC companies.

Cosmetic and Beauty Treatments 

Look and feel your best with the latest technologies and beauty treatments provided by licensed experts for Botox, Dermal Fillers, Skin Therapy, and Body Slimming for men and women.

Medical Treatments

Book your selected medical treatments such as Dentistry, Chiropractic, Physiotherapy, and IVF, and receive care from experienced specialists.

Residency & Citizenship

Obtain your UAE residence visa with us. We will provide a seamless, trustworthy process.
activities.pricing_content: Contact us for more information.

activities.name: Luxury Heritage Safari
activities.timing_content:
Pick-up: around 2 PM - 4:15 PM

Drop-off: around 9:30 PM
activities.information:
Experience a luxury desert safari with the leading operator of desert experiences in Dubai. Our tours allow you to witness the magnificent landscape of the reserve, delve into the rich culture and history of the region and experience thrilling adventures in the desert.

Highlights:

  • Discover nature, culture, and adventure at the Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve.
  • Watch an engaging and interactive falcon show, go on a nature trail in rare, iconic, classic 1950s open-top land rovers, and then take a camel trek at sunset.
  • Indulge in a luxury camp and enjoy Arabian inspired cuisine.
  • Our campsite provides the perfect ambience for a memorable evening under the stars.
  • Enjoy fascinating shows and entertainment in the heart of the desert. 

Important:

  • Full refund if cancelled at least 2 days before the event.
  • Failure to join the tour, joining after departure, or leaving before its completion will result in forfeiture of any refund.
  • These cancellation policy are subject to change.

activities.name: Skydive Dubai
activities.timing_content: Daily 8 AM - 2:30 PM
activities.information:
Take the leap and experience a breathtaking free-fall and parachute ride from 13,000 feet with trained tandem skydiving instructors. Sky Dive Dubai is one of the city’s top attractions, and you can choose from two incredible locations: the iconic Palm Jumeirah or the Arabian desert.

Important:

  • You must be 18 years of age or above (according to the Gregorian calendar) on the day of your tandem skydive. Please bring a valid and official government photo ID (Emirates ID, driver’s license, passport) on the day of your skydive
  • Please be informed that the guest's first and last name should match the ID.
  • Divers must be in a reasonable state of health.
  • Weight requirements: Males must weigh 100.0 kg or less with a maximum BMI of 30.0, and females must weigh 90.0 kg or less with a maximum BMI of 27.5.
  • Once the booking is confirmed, it cannot be canceled as the tickets are non-refundable.
  • The booking time is the arrival time. Please be at the location 20-30 minutes earlier.
  • Minors are not permitted to skydive.
activities.pricing_content:
Tandem skydive (Jump attached to an experienced instructor)

The Palm Dropzone

  • Weekdays & Weekend Tandem skydive with photos and video at Palm location - AED 2,749

The Desert Dropzone

  • Weekdays & Weekend Tandem skydive with photos and video at Desert location - AED 2,199

activities.name: Deep Dive Dubai
activities.timing_content: Daily - 9 AM - 6 PM
activities.information:
Deep Dive Dubai is the latest record-breaking attraction in Dubai. It is the only diving facility in the world where you can dive to depths of 60 meters and is verified by the Guinness World Record as the world's deepest swimming pool! 

The pool has an area designed to resemble a sunken city, and it is also used as an underwater film studio.

Important:

  • On entry, customers must display a valid photo identification document, such as original Emirates ID, driving license in English, or original passport. The name on the identification document must match the individual participating in the diving experience. Entrance is valid only for the specified person and time mentioned on the ticket and cannot be reused across multiple bookings.
  • All Deep Dive Dubai bookings are paid in full at the time of reservation.
  • Deep Dive Dubai bookings are non-refundable.
  • A parent/legal guardian must be present during any diving experience and provide written consent for minors.
  • All bookings must honor the specific terms and conditions for the given experience.
  • Deep Dive Dubai booking is valid as per the booked date and time only.
  • Rescheduling is allowed up to 5 days in advance. Rescheduling must be completed within 6 months of the original booking.
activities.pricing_content:
Discover Scuba for non-certified guests (up to 12m)

  • Standard Discover Scuba - AED 1,800
  • Premium Discovery Scuba - AED 2,400 - includes edited video, honorary wall certificate
  • Platinum Discovery Scuba - AED 3,000 - includes edited short and long video, personalized images, facility tour, honorary wall certificate

Guided Scuba up to 30m for certified guests (certification required)

  • Standard Guided Scuba - AED 1,200
  • Premium Guided Scuba - AED 2,400 - includes edited video, honorary wall certificate
  • Platinum Guided Scuba - AED 3,000 - includes edited short and long video, personalized images, facility tour, honorary wall certificate

Pictures and videos of your experience are provided, and the double zipline feature helps you enjoy a shared experience with your friends and family. It is sure to be a day of adrenaline-packed fun.

activities.name: Helicopter Tour
activities.address: White Beach Parking Atlantis Hotel, Palm Jumeirah
activities.timing_content: Daily 9 AM - 5:30 PM
activities.information:
Enjoy a bird’s-eye view flying over iconic Dubai landmarks onboard a luxury helicopter.

Departing from a helipad at Atlantis the Palm, experience a memorable 12, 15, or 25-minute scenic flight. 

Admire Dubai’s skyline from a unique perspective, flying above sights such as Burj Al Arab, Burj Khalifa, and Palm Jumeirah.

Each helicopter has 6 seats, including 3 window seats for maximum views, with live narration by your professional, experienced pilot.

Important:

  • Don't forget to bring a pair of sunglasses and a jacket or sweater, especially during winter (November to March). These items are essential for passengers' comfort.
  • The weight limit is 110 kg per passenger. Passengers who weigh more than this or close to this may have to wait for a flight that can safely accommodate their weight.
  • If the cancellation is made at least 7 days prior to the start of the services, no cancellation fee will be charged.
  • In the event of a cancellation made between 6 to 4 calendar days before the start of the service, a cancellation fee of 50% will be charged.
  • If the cancellation is made within 3 calendar days of the start of the service, a cancellation fee of 100% will be charged, and no refund will be provided.
  • If the cancellation is made on the day of the scheduled services or after, a cancellation fee of 100% will be charged, and no refund will be given.
activities.pricing_content:
Pearl Heli - 12 min

  • Sharing: AED 715
  • Exclusive 6-seater: AED 3,145
  • Exclusive 7-seater: AED 3,670
  • Inclusions: 12-minute flight takes off from Atlantis Hotel at The Palm Jumeirah Island and heads to Burj Khalifa, the most iconic tower in the world, flying over Burj Al Arab, Dubai coastline, and the most famous landmarks of Dubai. 

Fun Ride - 15 min

  • Sharing: AED 921
  • Exclusive 6-seater: AED 4,041
  • Exclusive 7-seater: AED 4,715
  • Inclusions: Fly from Dubai’s most famous man-made island to the world’s tallest tower. Going from Atlantis The Palm to Burj Khalifa, you will see Aquaventure Water Park, the striking Burj Al Arab, Jumeirah Beach coastline, and The World Islands from its south pole. 

City Circuit - 25 min

  • Sharing: AED 1,450
  • Exclusive 6-seater: AED 6,353
  • Exclusive 7-seater: AED 7,410
  • Inclusions: Experience a dramatic ascent from a modern man-made wonder to the historic Creek where Dubai was born. From Atlantis The Palm, across the Gulf and over The Worlds Islands, before proceeding to Burj Khalifa, the world’s tallest tower. Take in the skyscrapers of Sheikh Zayed Road before marveling at Dubai Creek with its captivating heritage architecture. On the way back, you will pass Port Rashid, Union House, and the Jumeirah Beach coastline until Burj Al Arab, before swerving inland to see Dubai Marina.

activities.information:

We work closely with you to understand your needs and wishes for the event in order to provide you with the best possible experience and exceptional quality.

activities.name: Personal Shopper/Stylist (Coming Soon)
activities.information:
Upgrade your wardrobe with a personal shopper. Browse the stores together or shop from your hotel room. 

We customize a unique shopping experience according to your preferences.
activities.pricing_content: Contact us for more information.

activities.name: Atlantis Dolphin & Sea Lion Encounter
activities.timing_content: Daily from 9:45 AM to 6:30 PM
activities.information:
Interact with dolphins and sea lions at Atlas Bay Atlantis The Palm Dubai, one of the world's most sophisticated dolphin habitats. Choose from a range of dolphin and sea lion experiences suitable for all ages and swimming abilities.

Every experience includes unlimited access to Aquaventure Waterpark, the world’s largest waterpark, for the day. Enjoy 105 slides, attractions and experiences, a private beach, and a wave rider.

Important:

  • If unaccompanied by an adult, children must be at least 13 years old to enter Aquaventure.
  • All children under 12 years old must be accompanied by a participating and paying adult over 18.
  • Children 2 years and under have complimentary access to Dolphin Meet & Greet and Dolphin Dip & Play.
activities.pricing_content:
Dolphin Meet & Greet

  • Per person - AED 725
  • This is a dry experience for all ages - guests can meet and learn more about the dolphins without getting into the water. Includes free same-day access to Aquaventure Waterpark.

Dolphin Encounter

  • Per Person - AED 875
  • This experience is for all ages and swimming abilities - guests can dip and play with the dolphins in the water. This is an activity suitable for beginner swimmers as well. Includes free same-day access to Aquaventure Waterpark.

Dolphin Swim

  • Per Person - AED 1,125
  • This experience is for confident/skilled swimmers aged 8 years old and above - guests can swim with the dolphins and get to know more about them. Includes free same-day access to Aquaventure Waterpark.

Sea Lion Meet & Greet

  • Per Person- AED 625
  • This is a dry experience for all ages - guests can meet and learn more about the sea lions without getting into the water. Includes free same-day access to Aquaventure Waterpark.

activities.name: La Perle
activities.timing_content:
Wednesday to Sunday - 6:30 PM - 8 PM / 9 PM - 10:30 PM

Duration: 90 minutes per show
activities.information:
La Perle by Dragone is Dubai's number 1 permanent show, featuring breathtaking performances created by acclaimed theater director Franco Dragone. 

His recent masterpiece is performed in world-class facilities in the heart of Dubai at Al Habtoor City.

Prepare to be amazed by flawless acrobatics, dancers, waterfalls, flying acts from incredible heights, and impressive visual effects. It will provide show-stopping entertainment for the whole family.

Important:

  • All bookings are non-refundable, non-transferable, and non-exchangeable.
  • In the event of a show being canceled, a new show will be rescheduled or a voucher will be provided.
  • Children ages 2+ are allowed to attend but MUST have a ticket.
activities.pricing_content:
Silver B Ticket

  • AED 269 per person

Silver Ticket

  • AED 319 per person

Gold Ticket

  • AED 419 per person

VIP Ticket

  • AED 809 per person

activities.name: Helicopter Tour
activities.address: White Beach Parking Atlantis Hotel, Palm Jumeirah
activities.timing_content: Daily 9 AM - 5:30 PM
activities.information:
Enjoy a bird’s-eye view flying over iconic Dubai landmarks onboard a luxury helicopter.

Departing from a helipad at Atlantis the Palm, experience a memorable 12, 15, or 25-minute scenic flight. 

Admire Dubai’s skyline from a unique perspective, flying above sights such as Burj Al Arab, Burj Khalifa, and Palm Jumeirah.

Each helicopter has 6 seats, including 3 window seats for maximum views, with live narration by your professional, experienced pilot.

Important:

  • Don't forget to bring a pair of sunglasses and a jacket or sweater, especially during winter (November to March). These items are essential for passengers' comfort.
  • The weight limit is 110 kg per passenger, passengers who weigh more than this or close to this may have to wait for a flight that can safely accommodate their weight.
  • If the cancellation is made at least 7 days prior to the start of the service, no cancellation fee will be charged.
  • In the event of a cancellation made between 6 to 4 calendar days before the start of the service, a cancellation fee of 50% will be charged.
  • If the cancellation is made within 3 calendar days of the start of the service, a cancellation fee of 100% will be charged, and no refund will be provided.
  • If the cancellation is made on the day of the scheduled service or after, a cancellation fee of 100% will be charged, and no refund will be given.
activities.pricing_content:
Pearl Heli - 12 min

  • Sharing: AED 715
  • Exclusive 6-seater: AED 3,145
  • Exclusive 7-seater: AED 3,670
  • Inclusions: 12-minute flight takes off from Atlantis Hotel at The Palm Jumeirah Island and heads to Burj Khalifa, the most iconic tower in the world, flying over Burj Al Arab, Dubai coastline, and the most famous landmarks of Dubai. 

Fun Ride - 15 min

  • Sharing: AED 921
  • Exclusive 6-seater: AED 4,041
  • Exclusive 7-seater: AED 4,715
  • Inclusions: Fly from Dubai’s most famous man-made island to the world’s tallest tower. Going from Atlantis The Palm to Burj Khalifa, you will see Aquaventure Water Park, the striking Burj Al Arab, Jumeirah Beach coastline, and The World Islands from its south pole.

City Circuit - 25 min

  • Sharing: AED 1,450
  • Exclusive 6-seater: AED 6,353
  • Exclusive 7-seater: AED 7,410
  • Inclusions: Experience a dramatic ascent from a modern man-made wonder to the historic Creek where Dubai was born. From Atlantis The Palm, across the Gulf and over The Worlds Islands, before proceeding to Burj Khalifa, the world’s tallest tower. Take in the skyscrapers of Sheikh Zayed Road before marveling at Dubai Creek with its captivating heritage architecture. On the way back, you will pass Port Rashid, Union House, and the Jumeirah Beach coastline until Burj Al Arab, before swerving inland to see Dubai Marina.

activities.name: Jet Car
activities.information:
Cruise around Dubai’s waters in style on a boat that is shaped like a convertible sports car but rides like a jet ski.

You can ride your jet car alone or have fun with your family and friends. Up to a maximum of 2 passengers are allowed on at one time, and children above 14 years old are always welcome – of course, provided that they are with their legal guardian. 

Important:

  • All guests are required by law to bring their original ID. Tourists require an original Passport. Residents can bring a Passport, Emirates ID, or Emirates Driving License.
  • Any cancellation received 24 hours before the scheduled service time is subject to a 50% cancellation fee.
  • Full charge will be applied if cancellation is received less than 24 hours prior to the scheduled service times.
activities.pricing_content:
15-Minute Journey on Jet Car

  • Per Person - AED 600

30-Minute Journey on Jet Car

  • Per person - AED 1,000

60-Minute Journey on Jet Car

  • Per Person - AED 1,800

activities.name: Jet Ski Tour
activities.timing_content: Daily 9 AM - 6 PM
activities.information:
Discover the iconic sites of Dubai on a guided Jet Ski Tour along the city’s waterfront. 

Experience the adventure with the latest fleet of jet skis. Maximum of 2 people are allowed to ride on a Jet Ski at one time.

Important:

  • All guests are required by law to bring their original ID. Tourists require an original Passport. Residents can bring a Passport, Emirates ID, or Emirates Driving License.
  • The minimum age to drive a jet ski is 16 years old and to ride as a passenger is 14 years old.
  • If you cancel your reservation less than 24 hours before the start of an activity, there will be no return due to you. An activity will be deemed canceled if you do not show up at the agreed-upon location by the scheduled departure time.
activities.pricing_content:
30-Minute Jet Ski Tour

  • Per Person - AED 350

Inclusions:

  • Bulgari with Burj Khalifa views
  • Certified Jetski Instructor
  • Safety Equipment
  • Free pictures and videos of the tour

60-Minute Jet Ski Tour

  • Per Person - AED 650

Inclusions:

  • Burj Al Arab views
  • Certified jet ski instructor
  • Safety equipment
  • Free pictures and videos of the tour

120-Minute Jet Ski Tour

  • Per Person - AED 1,100

  • Certified jet ski instructor
  • Safety equipment
  • Free pictures and videos of the tour

Age Policy

  • Min age driver: 16 years
  • Min age passenger: 14 years 
  • Pregnant women are not permitted

activities.name: Hot Air Balloon
activities.timing_content: 7 days a week from October until the end the of May
activities.information:
Highlights:

  • Pick up and drop-off from Dubai in a luxury vehicle.
  • Arrive at the take-off site and watch the Balloon inflation.
  • Receive a 15-minute safety briefing from your pilot.
  • Enjoy ultra-comfort as the capacity of each basket compartment has been reduced to allow more room and exclusivity on every flight.
  • Board your balloon and take off with the sunrise; 1-hour flight (weather dependant).
  • After landing in the desert, your breakfast will be served in a desert setting.
  • Embark on a luxury one-hour nature drive through the Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve.
  • Bathroom facilities available.

Terms and Conditions:

  • Not suitable for children under 5 years old and not suitable for pregnant woman after their 1st trimester.
  • Not recommended for guests that has had major surgery in the last 6 months, has had a broken leg/arm in the last 6 months or anyone who suffers from chronic back, neck pain or injuries.
  • Children over 5 years old and under 12 years old will be accepted at the child rate.
  • Pick up from Dubai Hotels between 3:30 AM and 5:30 AM (depends on sunrise).
  • Return to the Hotel between 10:30 AM and 11:30 AM (depending on traffic).

Important:

  • Cancellations made at least 24 hours prior to tour departure are eligible for full refund.
  • Cancellations made less than 24 hours prior to tour departure are not eligible for refund.
  • If you fail to join a tour, join it after departure, or leave it prior to its completion, no refund can be made.
activities.pricing_content:
Signature Experience

  • Adult - AED 1,995
  • Child (5-11 years old) - AED 1,500
  • starting from 4:30 AM (half day morning)

activities.name: The Nest Experience
activities.address: Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve, Margham Gate
activities.timing_content: From 4 PM to 10:30 AM
activities.information:
Nesting offers a peaceful and innovative sleeping concept. Designed by award-winning Architect Gianni Ranaulo, this is sure to be an unforgettable night in the desert.

Each Nest has an en-suite bathroom and private terrace. Equipped with one double bed – an extra bed can also be installed in your Nest to cater for 2 adults and 2 children.

Inclusions: 

  • Short desert drive from the Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve gate to the camp
  • Desert Nest of your choice with en-suite bathroom
  • Mini bar
  • Sunset tapas and wood fire pizza with soft drinks
  • Sandboarding
  • Breakfast starting at sunrise
  • Morning camel rides
  • Nature walk

*Alcohol and Shisha is available for purchase at the camp.

Important:

Less than six (6) guests:

  • Cancellation up to seventy-two (72) hours prior to the booked experience – eligible for a full refund with or without the Cancellation Protection Program.
  • Cancellation less than seventy-two (72) hours prior to the booked experience – eligible for a full refund with the Cancellation Protection Program.
  • Cancellation less than seventy-two (72) hours prior to the booked experience – not eligible for a refund without the Cancellation Protection Program.

Above six (6) guests:

  • Cancellation up to seven (7) days prior to the booked experience – eligible for a full refund with or without the Cancellation Protection Program.
  • Cancellation between six (6) days and seventy-two (72) hours prior to the booked experience – eligible for a full refund with the Cancellation Protection Program.
  • Cancellation between six (6) days and seventy-two (72) hours prior to the booked experience – eligible for a fifty percent (50%) refund without the Cancellation Protection Program.
  • Cancellation less than seventy-two (72) hours prior to the booked experience – eligible for a full refund with the Cancellation Protection Program.
  • Cancellation less than seventy-two (72) hours prior to the booked experience – not eligible for a refund without the Cancellation Protection Program.
activities.pricing_content:
The Nest Experience

From AED 3,868.76 per Nest with inclusion of 1 guest

addtional guest: Adult - AED 465.60 / Child - AED 286.40

*Each Nest can accommodate up to 4 guests

Inclusions: 

  • A desert drive from the gate to the camp
  • Stay at the Nest from 4 PM to 10:30 AM the following day
  • Sunset drinks and Nest lounge menu
  • Soft archery, camel ride & lounge music
  • Breakfast in lounge area

The Full Nest Experience

From AED 4,518.68 per Nest with inclusion of 1 guest

addtional guest: Adult - AED 1,099.30 / Child - AED 521.50

activities.name: Yachts
activities.information:
Whether you live in Dubai or are just visiting, you must experience a luxury yacht cruise – a luxury experience Dubai is famous for.

Celebrate with friends and family, watch sunsets, and take in the amazing views of the iconic Dubai skyline. The crew can even create an itinerary tailored to your preferences.

Important:

  • Please arrive earlier than your booking time.
  • Cancellation or rescheduling 72 hours prior to the booking is free of charge.
  • If you cancel less than 48 hours prior to the booking, 50% of the total will be charged.
  • No-show or cancellation less than 24 hours prior to the booking will be non-refundable.

  • 58 Ft Yacht Azimut up to 28 guests - AED 3,240

activities.name: Adventure Sunrise Safari
activities.timing_content: From 8 AM
activities.information:
The day will start with a mesmerizing sunrise desert drive that will introduce you to the natural wonders that Dubai has to offer. Then you will traverse the rolling dunes in a comfortable and well-equipped vehicle, expertly guided by our seasoned desert drivers, and witness the stunning sunrise.

Highlights:

  • Take a sunrise desert drive as the sun gracefully paints the sky with hues of orange and gold. Capture stunning photographs and create memories that will last a lifetime.
  • Indulge in a delicious breakfast with culinary delights, crafted to tantalize at Al Maha Desert Resort.
  • Enlightening visit to the Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve Visitor Center.
  • Spot wildlife in its natural habitat and enjoy the unparalleled journey through Dubai’s desert wonders.
  • Experience and witness the untouched beauty of the desert.

Important:

  • Full refund if cancelled at least 2 days before the event.
  • Failure to join the tour, joining after departure, or leaving before its completion will result in forfeiture of any refund.
  • These cancellation policy are subject to change.
activities.pricing_content:
Bedouin Culture Safari with Breakfast

  • Morning duration of 5 hours
  • Adult - AED 625
  • Children (5-11 years old) - AED 415
  • Private Car - starting from AED 2,415

Inclusions:

  • Return luxury transfer (private/shared)
  • Breakfast at Al Maha
  • Sunrise dune drive & sunrise photography (professional photography paid)
  • Professional English-speaking guide

Exclusions:

  • Alcohol is strictly prohibited
  • Professional photography & videography can be looked for an additional charge.

Itinerary:

  • Pick-up from the hotel
  • Sunrise dune Drive and sunrise pics
  • Breakfast at Al Maha
  • Departure back
  • Arrive back at the hotel/location

activities.name: Exclusive Dinner in Majestic Desert Camp
activities.timing_content: From 5 PM until 10:30 PM
activities.information:
Escape the hustle and bustle of the city and discover a refined desert camp at the pristine Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve. Home to native wildlife such as oryxes and gazelles, this luxury desert escape focuses on an eco-friendly and sustainable experience, with a zero-waste policy to preserve the natural landscape.

Dinner under the stars is prepared by the resident chef in an open-air kitchen, showcasing Arabic-inspired dishes, as well as classic European cuisine.

Important:

Less than 6 guests:

  • Cancellation up to 72 hours prior to the booked experience – eligible for a full refund with or without the Cancellation Protection Program.

  • Cancellation less than 72 hours prior to the booked experience – not eligible for a refund without the Cancellation Protection Program.

activities.name: Overnight Luxury Glamping in the Desert
activities.timing_content:
• Typical timing: 3 PM to 9 AM the following day
  • Timings will vary during the winter months (October to May) and summer months (June to September)
  • Timings vary depending on the exact pick up location
  • Duration: approximately 17 hours
activities.information:
This overnight luxury camping experience in the desert will provide both relaxation and adventure.

Discover the stunning landscape and desert dunes, enjoy the sunset with a cold fresh juice, then feast on a delicious BBQ served straight from the grill. 

After dinner, the team will light the campfire for you to roast marshmallows, and then you can turn in for the night at your leisure. Start your morning with a cooked breakfast and the rising sun for memories that will last a lifetime. 

Important:

  • Cancellations up to 3 calendar days prior to your booked tour date are eligible for a full refund.
  • Cancellations less than 3 calendar days prior to your booked tour date are eligible for a rescheduled date within 6 months of the booking date without penalty.
  • No refund will be given less than 3 calendar days prior to your booking date.
  • Cancellations must be received in writing stating the tour details and booking name.
  • Any cancellation within 24 hours prior to the tour booking date will not be eligible for a refund.
activities.pricing_content:
Overnight Glamping Adventure 

  • For 2 guests sharing 1 tent - AED 2,990
  • For an additional guest - AED 700
  • Per additional tent with up to 2 beds - AED 850

Inclusions: 

  • Round-trip transfer by 4x4 from your hotel/home
  • Hot and cold BBQ dinner off the grill
  • Cooked breakfast with tea and coffee
  • Unlimited water, soft drinks, and fresh juice
  • Exciting dune bashing drive
  • Camel farm visit
  • Unlimited sandboarding
  • Campfire and marshmallows
  • Canvas Bell tent 5m round, with mattresses, cotton bedding, and decorations 

Checklist:

  • No back or neck injuries
  • No pregnancies
  • Closed shoes for the sandboarding
  • Comfortable light clothing
  • Your usual sun protection

activities.name: Skydive Dubai
activities.timing_content: Daily 8 AM - 2:30 PM
activities.information:
Take the leap and experience a breathtaking free-fall and parachute ride from 13,000 feet with trained tandem skydiving instructors. Sky Dive Dubai is one of the city’s top attractions. You can choose from two incredible locations (the iconic Palm Jumeirah or over the Arabian desert) and discover Dubai from a new perspective.

Important:

  • You must be 18 years of age or above (according to the Gregorian calendar) on the day of your tandem skydive. Please bring a valid and official government photo ID (Emirates ID, driver’s license, passport) on the day of your skydive
  • Please be informed that the guest's first and last name should match the ID.
  • Divers must be in a reasonable state of health.
  • Weight requirements: Males must weigh 100.0 kg or less with a maximum BMI of 30.0, and females must weigh 90.0 kg or less with a maximum BMI of 27.5.
  • Once the booking is confirmed, it cannot be cancelled as the tickets are non-refundable.
  • The booking time is the arrival time. Please be at the location 20-30 minutes earlier.
  • Minors are not permitted to skydive.
activities.pricing_content:
Tandem skydive (Jump attached to an experienced instructor)

The Palm Dropzone

  • Weekdays & Weekend Tandem skydive with photos and video at Palm location - AED 2,749

The Desert Dropzone

  • Weekdays & Weekend Tandem skydive with photos and video at Desert location - AED 2,199

activities.name: Deep Dive Dubai
activities.timing_content: Daily 9 AM - 6 PM
activities.information:
Deep Dive Dubai is the latest record-breaking attraction in Dubai. It is the only diving facility in the world where you can dive to depths of 60 meters and is verified by the Guinness World Record as the world's deepest swimming pool. 

The pool has an area designed to resemble a sunken city, and it is also used as an underwater film studio.

Important:

  • On entry, customers must display a valid photo identification document, such as an original Emirates ID, driving license in English, or original passport. The name on the identification document must match the individual participating in the diving experience. Entrance is valid only for the specified person and time mentioned on the ticket and cannot be reused across multiple bookings.
  • All Deep Dive Dubai bookings are paid in full at the time of reservation.
  • Deep Dive Dubai bookings are non-refundable.
  • A parent/legal guardian must be present during any diving experience and provide written consent for minors.
  • All bookings must honor the specific terms and conditions for the given experience.
  • Deep Dive Dubai booking is valid for the booked date and time only.
  • Rescheduling is allowed up to 5 days in advance. Rescheduling must be completed within 6 months of the original booking.
activities.pricing_content:
Discover Scuba for non-certified guests (up to 12m)

  • Standard Discover Scuba - AED 1,800
  • Premium Discovery Scuba - AED 2,400 - includes edited video, honorary wall certificate
  • Platinum Discovery Scuba - AED 3,000 - includes edited short and long video, personalized images, facility tour, honorary wall certificate

Guided Scuba up to 30m for certified guests (certification required)

  • Standard Guided Scuba - AED 1,200
  • Premium Guided Scuba - AED 2,400 - includes edited video, honorary wall certificate
  • Platinum Guided Scuba - AED 3,000 - includes edited short and long video, personalized images, facility tour, honorary wall certificate

Discover Snorkeling

  • Snorkeling - AED 400

activities.name: Dune Buggy in the Desert
activities.timing_content:
Daily 

1 hour 07:30 am

1 hour 10:30 am

1 hour 3:30 pm

2 hours 07:00 am

2 hours 08:30 am

2 hours 10:00 am

2 hours 2:00 pm

Closed on 25th December and 1st January
activities.information:
Navigate the sandy dunes with opportunities to spot the fascinating animals that roam freely in the desert. If you’re lucky you may get to take a picture with one of the local camels. You will stop off at several scenic locations to snap photos of the panoramic views, keeping your special memories alive forever. 

Riders are assessed on ability and a full safety briefing, ensuring your ride is suitable for you.

Important:

  • If you want to get behind the wheel of a self-drive buggy, you must be over the age of 16. If under 16, an adult’s presence is required.
  • A driver’s license is not required, but a preliminary training session will be provided before taking you on the ATV trail.
  • Cancellation of the reservation is non-refundable, but can be reschedule. An activity will be deemed canceled if you do not show up at the agreed-upon location by the scheduled departure time.
activities.pricing_content:
1 & 2 Seater Polaris RZR 1000 XP 2022 Models

1 or 2 people

  • 1 Hour - AED 1,000
  • 2 Hours - AED 1,800

4-Seater Polaris RZR XP 1000 Turbo

up to 4 people

  • 1 Hour - AED 1,400
  • 2 Hours - AED 2,400

activities.name: Helicopter Tour
activities.address: White Beach Parking Atlantis Hotel, Palm Jumeirah
activities.timing_content: Daily 9 AM - 5:30 PM
activities.information:
Enjoy a bird’s-eye view flying over iconic Dubai landmarks onboard a luxury helicopter.

Departing from a helipad at Atlantis the Palm, experience a memorable 12, 15, or 25-minute scenic flight. 

Admire Dubai’s skyline from a unique perspective, flying over sights such as Burj Al Arab, Burj Khalifa, and Palm Jumeirah.

Each helicopter has 6 seats, including 3 window seats for maximum views, with live narration by your professional, experienced pilot.

Important:

  • Don't forget to bring a pair of sunglasses and a jacket or sweater, especially during winter (November to March). These items are essential for passengers' comfort.
  • The weight limit is 110 kg per passenger. Passengers who weigh more than this or close to this may have to wait for a flight that can safely accommodate their weight.
  • If the cancellation is made at least 7 days prior to the start of the service, no cancellation fee will be charged.
  • In the event of a cancellation made between 6 to 4 calendar days before the start of the service, a cancellation fee of 50% will be charged.
  • If the cancellation is made within 3 calendar days of the start of the service, a cancellation fee of 100% will be charged, and no refund will be provided.
  • If the cancellation is made on the day of the scheduled service or after, a cancellation fee of 100% will be charged, and no refund will be given.
activities.pricing_content:
Pearl Heli - 12 min

  • Sharing: AED 715
  • Exclusive 6-seater: AED 3,145
  • Exclusive 7-seater: AED 3,670
  • Inclusions: 12-minute flight takes off from Atlantis Hotel at The Palm Jumeirah Island and heads to Burj Khalifa, the most iconic tower in the world, flying over Burj Al Arab, Dubai coastline, and the most famous landmarks of Dubai. 

Fun Ride - 15 min

  • Sharing: AED 921
  • Exclusive 6-seater: AED 4,041
  • Exclusive 7-seater: AED 4,715
  • Inclusions: Fly from Dubai’s most famous man-made island to the world’s tallest tower. Going from Atlantis The Palm to Burj Khalifa, you will see Aquaventure Water Park, the striking Burj Al Arab, Jumeirah Beach coastline, and The World Islands from its south pole. 

City Circuit - 25 min

  • Sharing: AED 1,450
  • Exclusive 6-seater: AED 6,353
  • Exclusive 7-seater: AED 7,410
  • Inclusions: Experience a dramatic ascent from a modern man-made wonder to the historic Creek where Dubai was born. From Atlantis The Palm, across the Gulf and over The Worlds Islands, before proceeding to Burj Khalifa, the world’s tallest tower. Take in the skyscrapers of Sheikh Zayed Road before marveling at Dubai Creek with its captivating heritage architecture. On the way back, you will pass Port Rashid, Union House, and the Jumeirah Beach coastline until Burj Al Arab, before swerving inland to see Dubai Marina.

activities.name: XLine Dubai
activities.timing_content:
Monday to Sunday 10 AM - 5 PM

Tuesday - Closed
activities.information:
Enjoy breathtaking views of Dubai Marina with Xline Dubai, the longest urban zipline in the world. Setting off from a 170-meter-high launchpad, you will weave past skyscrapers across the Marina to Dubai Marina Mall at speeds of up to 80 kmph.

Pictures and videos of your experience are provided, and the double zipline feature helps you enjoy a shared experience with your friends and family. It is sure to be a day of adrenaline-packed fun.

Important:

  • Ages 12-65 (parental consent required in person for those under 18 years of age)
  • 45–100 kg
  • Taller than 130 cm
  • Modest comfortable clothing and closed shoes – no skirts, dresses, or flip-flops
  • Good medical condition
  • Not pregnant
  • Free of existing or recurring injuries
  • Not under the influence of narcotics, spirits, or any other substances that impair judgment (e.g. medicine)
  • Free from serious physical or mental disorders that would not allow you to complete the physical and mental tasks asked throughout the ride.
  • Free from medical conditions that require immediate medical attention.
  • Once the booking is confirmed, it cannot be canceled as the tickets are non-refundable.
activities.pricing_content:
Go Ziplining

  • XLine Experience Adult - AED 699
  • XLine Experience Child (12 to 16 years old) - AED 499

activities.name: Yachts
activities.information:
Whether you live in Dubai or are just visiting, you must experience a luxury yacht cruise, an experience Dubai is famous for.

Celebrate with friends and family, watch the sunset, and take in the amazing views of the iconic Dubai skyline. The crew can even create an itinerary tailored to your preferences.

Important:

  • Please arrive earlier than your booking time.
  • Cancellation or rescheduling 72 hours prior to the booking is free of charge.
  • Upon cancellation less than 48 hours prior to the booking, 50% of the total will be charged.
  • No-show or cancellation less than 24 hours prior to the booking will be non-refundable.
activities.pricing_content:
3-Hour Package

  • 56 Ft Yacht Majesty up to 24 guests - AED 3,450
  • 58 Ft Yacht Azimut up to 28 guests - AED 3,240
  • 61 Ft Yacht Majesty up to 30 guests - AED 3,750
  • 118 Ft Yacht Hatteras up to 100 guests - AED 30,000
  • 82 Ft Yacht Sunseeker up to 40 guests - AED 7,500
  • 62 Ft Yacht Azimut up to 25 guests - AED 4,500
  • 55 Ft Yacht Azimut up to 17 guests - AED 3,600
  • 50 Ft Yacht Azimut up to 15 guests - AED 3,300
  • 30 Ft Yacht Key Largo up to 8 guests - AED 1,200

activities.name: Jet Car
activities.information:
Cruise around Dubai’s waters in style on a boat that is shaped like a convertible sports car but rides like a jet ski.

You can ride your jet car alone or have fun with your family and friends. Up to a maximum of 2 passengers are allowed, and children above 14 years old are always welcome – of course, provided that they are with their legal guardian. 

Important:

  • All guests are required by law to bring their original ID. Tourists require an original Passport. Residents can bring a Passport, Emirates ID, or Emirates Driving License.
  • Any cancellation received 24 hours before the scheduled service time is subject to a 50% cancellation fee.
  • Full charge will be applied if cancellation is received less than 24 hours before the scheduled service time.
activities.pricing_content:
15-Minute Journey on Jet Car

  • Per Person - AED 600

30-Minute Journey on Jet Car

  • Per person - AED 1,000

60-Minute Journey on Jet Car

  • Per Person - AED 1,800

activities.name: Jet Ski Tour
activities.timing_content: Daily 9 AM - 6:30 PM
activities.information:
Discover the iconic sites of Dubai on a guided Jet Ski Tour along the city’s waterfront. 

Experience the adventure with the latest fleet of jet skis. A maximum of 2 people are allowed to ride a jet ski at one time.

Important:

  • All guests are required by law to bring their original ID. Tourists require an original Passport. Residents can bring a Passport, Emirates ID, or Emirates Driving License.
  • The minimum age to drive a Jet Ski is 16 years old and to ride as a passenger is 14 years old.
  • If you cancel your reservation less than 24 hours before the start of an activity, there will be no return due to you. An activity will be deemed canceled if you do not show up a﻿t the agreed-upon location by the scheduled departure time.
activities.pricing_content:
30-Minute Jet Ski Tour

  • Per Person - AED 350

Inclusions:

  • Bulgari with Burj Khalifa views
  • Certified jet ski instructor
  • Safety equipment
  • Free pictures and videos of the tour

60-Minute Jet Ski Tour

  • Per Person - AED 650

Inclusions:

  • Burj Al Arab views
  • Certified jet ski instructor
  • Safety equipment
  • Free pictures and videos of the tour

90-Minute Jet Ski Tour

  • Per Person - AED 850

Inclusions:

  • Bulgari, Burj Al Arab, Atlantis views
  • Certified jet ski instructor
  • Safety equipment
  • Free pictures and videos of the tour

120-Minute Jet Ski Tour

  • Per Person - AED 1,100

Inclusions:

  • Burj Al Arab, Atlantis, JBR views
  • Certified jet ski instructor
  • Safety equipment
  • Free pictures and videos of the tour

Age Policy

  • Min age driver: 16 years
  • Min age passenger: 14 years 
  • Pregnant women are not permitted.

activities.name: Boat Tour
activities.timing_content:
• 60-Minute Tour Timing - 9 AM, 10 AM, 6:30 PM, and 7:30 PM
  • 90-Minute Tour, 75-Minute Tour Timing - 9 AM, 11 AM, 1 PM, 3 PM and 5 PM
activities.information:
Experience a unique water sightseeing tour of the iconic skyline of Dubai. The Boat Tour offers memorable sea tours of the top landmarks in Dubai, such as Dubai Marina, Palm Jumeirah, Burj Al Arab, Ain Dubai, and Atlantis.

Departing daily from Dubai Marina, the tours offer a wide variety of departure times to suit your preferences, with guaranteed stunning sights and informative, safe guided tours.

Each boat is equipped with GPS, life jackets, refreshments, and qualified guides. Plus, you will get to snap the best pictures of Dubai.

Important:

  • Children 12 years and under should be accompanied by an adult.
  • Tickets are non-refundable.
  • A minimum of 24 hours prior notice for a rescheduling request. (Acceptable for one- time reschedule only and subject to availability).
  • Prior booking is required at least 24 hours in advance.
  • Each boat has a capacity of 12 passengers.
  • For safety reasons, infants or children below 14 kg are not allowed on the tour.
  • Passengers must carry an original identification card (Passport, Emirates ID, or Driver's license).
  • All passengers must wear life jackets.
  • If passengers run late, the ride time will be reduced accordingly.
activities.pricing_content:
Marina Skyline Tour 

  • Duration: 60 Minutes
  • Adult - AED 119
  • Child (4-12 years old) - AED 95
  • VIP (1-12 passengers) - from AED 799

Key Sights

  • Dubai Marina
  • Bluewaters Island
  • Ain Dubai
  • JBR

Atlantis Panoramic Tour 

  • Duration: 75 minutes
  • Adult - AED 139
  • Child (4-12 years old) - AED 105
  • VIP (1-12 passengers) - from AED 969

Key Sights

  • Dubai Marina
  • Bluewaters Island
  • Ain Dubai
  • JBR
  • Atlantis the Palm

Adrenaline Fun Tour 

  • Duration: 90 minutes
  • Adult - AED 149
  • Child (4-12 years old) - AED 115
  • VIP (1-12 passengers) - from AED 1039

Key Sights

  • Dubai Marina
  • Bluewaters Island
  • Ain Dubai
  • JBR
  • Atlantis the Palm
  • Burj Al Arab

activities.name: Skipper of Your Own Boat (Temporarily Closed for Summer)
activities.timing_content:
Timings may vary according to the season.

  • Morning Boat Tour - 9:30 AM
  • Mind-Morning Boat Tour - 11:30 AM
  • Afternoon Boat Tour - 1:30 PM
  • Sunset Boat Tour - 3:30 PM
activities.information:
Become a captain for the day and experience Dubai’s first self-drive boat tour, cruising along the iconic coastline of Dubai! Water sports and boating are very popular activities in Dubai, making this perfect for sea-lovers seeking their next adventure. No boat license is required to become a captain for the day.

This activity offers a fun alternative to sightseeing in Dubai, with plenty of photo opportunities of Dubai’s coastline and skyline. Reach speeds of 50 km/h on these speedy HERO boats as you stop at famous landmarks such as Burj Al Arab, Atlantis, The Palm Jumeirah, and Ain Dubai.

Important:

  • Children under 6 years old are not permitted to participate in this activity.
  • Children aged 6 years and above must be accompanied by an adult or guardian who is over 18 years old and capable of driving the boats.
  • All guests must be 18 years or above to be permitted to drive the boats.
  • Cancellations made at least 24 hours prior to tour departure are eligible for a full refund.
  • Cancellations made less than 24 hours prior to tour departure are not eligible for a refund.
  • If you fail to join a tour, join it after departure, or leave it prior to its completion, no refund can be made.
activities.pricing_content:
Dubai Signature Boat Tour

Single Rider

  • AED 590 - 60 Min Tour
  • AED 690 - 90 Min Tour

Double Rider

  • AED 690 - 60 Min Tour
  • AED 790 - 90 Min Tour

activities.name: Adventure Sunrise Safari
activities.timing_content: From 8 AM
activities.information:
The day will start with a mesmerizing sunrise desert drive that will introduce you to the natural wonders that Dubai has to offer. Then you will traverse the rolling dunes in a comfortable and well-equipped vehicle, expertly guided by our seasoned desert drivers, and witness the stunning sunrise.

Highlights:

  • Take a sunrise desert drive as the sun gracefully paints the sky with hues of orange and gold. Capture stunning photographs and create memories that will last a lifetime.
  • Indulge in a delicious breakfast with culinary delights, crafted to tantalize at Al Maha Desert Resort.
  • Enlightening visit to the Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve Visitor Center.
  • Spot wildlife in its natural habitat and enjoy the unparalleled journey through Dubai’s desert wonders.
  • Experience and witness the untouched beauty of the desert.

Important:

  • Full refund if cancelled at least 2 days before the event.
  • Failure to join the tour, joining after departure, or leaving before its completion will result in forfeiture of any refund.
  • These cancellation policy are subject to change.
activities.pricing_content:
Bedouin Culture Safari with Breakfast

  • Morning duration of 5 hours
  • Adult - AED 625
  • Children (5-11 years old) - AED 415
  • Private Car - starting from AED 2,415

Inclusions:

  • Return luxury transfer (private/shared)
  • Breakfast at Al Maha
  • Sunrise dune drive & sunrise photography (professional photography paid)
  • Professional English-speaking guide

Exclusions:

  • Alcohol is strictly prohibited
  • Professional photography & videography can be looked for an additional charge.

Itinerary:

  • Pick-up from the hotel
  • Sunrise dune Drive and sunrise pics
  • Breakfast at Al Maha
  • Departure back
  • Arrive back at the hotel/location
