Admire Dubai’s skyline from a unique perspective, flying over sights such as Burj Al Arab, Burj Khalifa, and Palm Jumeirah.

Each helicopter has 6 seats, including 3 window seats for maximum views, with live narration by your professional, experienced pilot.

Important:

  • Don't forget to bring a pair of sunglasses and a jacket or sweater, especially during winter (November to March). These items are essential for passengers' comfort.
  • The weight limit is 110 kg per passenger. Passengers who weigh more than this or close to this may have to wait for a flight that can safely accommodate their weight.
  • If the cancellation is made at least 7 days prior to the start of the service, no cancellation fee will be charged.
  • In the event of a cancellation made between 6 to 4 calendar days before the start of the service, a cancellation fee of 50% will be charged.
  • If the cancellation is made within 3 calendar days of the start of the service, a cancellation fee of 100% will be charged, and no refund will be provided.
  • If the cancellation is made on the day of the scheduled service or after, a cancellation fee of 100% will be charged, and no refund will be given.
activities.pricing_content:
Pearl Heli - 12 min

  • Sharing: AED 715
  • Exclusive 6-seater: AED 3,145
  • Exclusive 7-seater: AED 3,670
  • Inclusions: 12-minute flight takes off from Atlantis Hotel at The Palm Jumeirah Island and heads to Burj Khalifa, the most iconic tower in the world, flying over Burj Al Arab, Dubai coastline, and the most famous landmarks of Dubai. 

Fun Ride - 15 min

  • Sharing: AED 921
  • Exclusive 6-seater: AED 4,041
  • Exclusive 7-seater: AED 4,715
  • Inclusions: Fly from Dubai’s most famous man-made island to the world’s tallest tower. Going from Atlantis The Palm to Burj Khalifa, you will see Aquaventure Water Park, the striking Burj Al Arab, Jumeirah Beach coastline, and The World Islands from its south pole. 

City Circuit - 25 min

  • Sharing: AED 1,450
  • Exclusive 6-seater: AED 6,353
  • Exclusive 7-seater: AED 7,410
  • Inclusions: Experience a dramatic ascent from a modern man-made wonder to the historic Creek where Dubai was born. From Atlantis The Palm, across the Gulf and over The Worlds Islands, before proceeding to Burj Khalifa, the world’s tallest tower. Take in the skyscrapers of Sheikh Zayed Road before marveling at Dubai Creek with its captivating heritage architecture. On the way back, you will pass Port Rashid, Union House, and the Jumeirah Beach coastline until Burj Al Arab, before swerving inland to see Dubai Marina.

activities.name: Dinner in the Sky
activities.timing_content:
Weekdays (Sunday to Thursday)

• Session 1 (2 PM - 3:30 PM) Lunch

• Session 2 (3:30 PM – 5 PM) Lunch

• Session 3 (5 PM - 6:30 PM) Lunch

• Session 4 (6:30 PM – 8 PM) Dinner

• Session 5 (8 PM - 9:30 PM) Dinner

• Session 6 (9:30 PM – 11 PM) Dinner

Weekends (Friday to Saturday)

• Session 1 (2 PM - 3:30 PM) Lunch

• Session 2 (3:30 PM – 5 PM) Lunch

• Session 3 (5 PM - 6:30 PM) Lunch

• Session 4 (6:30 PM – 8 PM) Dinner

• Session 5 (8 PM - 9:30 PM) Dinner

• Session 6 (9:30 PM – 11 PM) Dinner

The dining experience in the sky will take approximately 90 minutes as follow; 15 minutes for seating guests, 60 minutes for flight duration and 10 minutes for unseating guests.
activities.information:
Dinner In the Sky Dubai is an unforgettable unique dining experience 50 meters from the ground. It was even selected by Forbes.com as one of the 10 most unusual restaurants in the world. 

Feast on a 3-course meal of your choice, suspended by a crane above Dubai Marina, with panoramic views of the Marina skyline, Palm Jumeirah, and Bluewater’s Island.

Enjoy lunch, dinner, or afternoon tea. All delicious meals are catered by top chefs from Le Meridien Hotel and The Westin Mina Seyahi Marina Resort. 

Please note that the maximum table capacity is 22 guests.

Important:

  • Pregnant women are not allowed to experience Dinner in the Sky.
  • Persons under 14 years must be accompanied by an adult. 
  • Minimum height: 110 cm. Maximum weight: 150 kg.
  • Seats purchased cannot be refunded, exchanged, or cancelled once issued except in the event of a cancellation by the venue itself.
activities.pricing_content:
Weekdays (Sunday to Thursday)

  • Lunch - AED 733.95
  • Dinner - AED 733.95

Weekend (Friday to Saturday)

  • Lunch - AED 733.95
  • Dinner - AED 838.95

*Prices includes 5% VAT

activities.name: Skipper of Your Own Boat (Temporarily Closed for Summer)
activities.timing_content:
TIMINGS MAY VARY ACCORDING TO THE SEASON

  • Morning Boat Tour - 9:30 AM
  • Mind-Morning Boat Tour - 11:30 AM
  • Afternoon Boat Tour - 1:30 PM
  • Sunset Boat Tour - 3:30 PM
activities.information:
Become a captain for the day and experience Dubai’s first self-drive boat tour, cruising along the iconic coastline of Dubai! Water sports and boating are very popular activities in Dubai, making this perfect for sea-lovers seeking their next adventure. No boat license is required to become a captain for the day.

This activity offers a fun alternative to sightseeing in Dubai, with plenty of photo opportunities of Dubai’s coastline and skyline. Reach speeds of 50 km/h on these speedy HERO boats as you stop at famous landmarks such as Burj Al Arab, Atlantis, The Palm Jumeirah, and Ain Dubai.

Important:

  • Children under 6 years old are not permitted to participate in this activity.
  • Children aged 6 years and above must be accompanied by an adult or guardian who is over 18 years old and capable of driving the boats.
  • All guests must be 18 years or above to be permitted to drive the boats.
  • Cancellations made at least 24 hours prior to tour departure are eligible for a full refund.
  • Cancellations made less than 24 hours prior to tour departure are not eligible for a refund.
  • If you fail to join a tour, join it after departure, or leave it prior to its completion, no refund can be made.
activities.pricing_content:
Dubai Signature Boat Tour

Single Rider

  • AED 590 - 60 Min Tour
  • AED 690 - 90 Min Tour

Double Rider

  • AED 790 - 90 Min Tour

activities.name: Yachts
activities.information:
Whether you live in Dubai or are just visiting, you must experience a luxury yacht cruise, a luxury experience Dubai is famous for.

Celebrate with friends and family, watch sunsets, and take in the amazing views of the iconic Dubai skyline. The crew can even create an itinerary tailored to your preferences.

Important:

  • Please arrive earlier than your booking time.
  • Cancellation or rescheduling 72 hours prior to the booking is free of charge.
  • Upon cancellation less than 48 hours prior to the booking, 50% of the total will be charged.
  • No-show or cancellation less than 24 hours prior to the booking will be non-refundable.

activities.timing_content: Daily 9 AM - 6 PM
activities.information:
Discover the iconic sites of Dubai on a guided Jet Ski Tour along the city’s waterfront. 

Experience the adventure with the latest fleet of jet skis. A maximum of 2 people are allowed to ride a jet ski at one time.

Important:

  • All guests are required by law to bring their original ID. Tourists require an original Passport. Residents can bring a Passport, Emirates ID, or Emirates Driving License.
  • The minimum age to drive a Jet Ski is 16 years old and to ride as a passenger is 14 years old.
  • If you cancel your reservation less than 24 hours before the start of an activity, there will be no return due to you. An activity will be deemed canceled if you do not show up a﻿t the agreed-upon location by the scheduled departure time.

activities.name: XLine Dubai
activities.timing_content:
Monday to Sunday 10 AM - 5 PM

Tuesday - Closed
activities.information:
Enjoy breathtaking views of Dubai Marina with Xline Dubai, the longest urban zipline in the world. Setting off from a 170-meter-high launchpad, you will weave past skyscrapers across the Marina to Dubai Marina Mall at speeds of up to 80 kmph.

Pictures and videos of your experience are provided, and the double zipline feature helps you enjoy a shared experience with your friends and family. It is sure to be a day of adrenaline-packed fun.

Important:

  • Ages 12-65 (the presence of an adult guardian is required for those under 18 years of age)
  • 45–100 kg
  • Taller than 130 cm
  • Modest comfortable clothing and closed shoes – no skirts, dresses, or flip-flops
  • Good medical condition
  • Free of existing or recurring injuries
  • Not under the influence of narcotics, spirits, or any other substances that impair judgment (e.g. medicine)
  • Free from serious physical or mental disorders that would not allow you to complete the physical and mental tasks asked throughout the ride
  • Free from medical conditions that require immediate medical attention
  • Once the booking is confirmed, it cannot be canceled as the tickets are non-refundable
activities.pricing_content:
Go Ziplining

  • XLine Experience Adult - AED 699
  • XLine Experience Child (12 to 16 years old) - AED 499

Daily 

1 hour 07:30 AM

1 hour 10:30 AM

2 hours 07:00 AM

2 hours 08:30 AM

activities.information:
Navigate the sandy dunes with opportunities to spot the fascinating animals that roam freely in the desert. If you’re lucky you may get to take a picture with one of the local camels. You will get to stop off at several scenic locations to snap photos of the panoramic views, keeping your special memories alive forever. 

Riders are assessed on ability and a full safety briefing, ensuring your ride is suitable for you.

Important:

  • If you want to get behind the wheel of a self-drive buggy, you must be over the age of 16. If under 16, an adult’s presence is required.
  • A driver’s license is not required, but a preliminary training session will be provided, before taking you on the ATV trail.
  • Cancellation of the reservation is non-refundable, but can be reschedule. An activity will be deemed canceled if you do not show up at the agreed-upon location by the scheduled departure time.

activities.name: Boat Tour
activities.timing_content:
• 60-Minute Tour Timing - 9 AM, 10 AM, 6:30 PM, and 7:30 PM
  • 90-Minute Tour, 75-Minute Tour Timing - 9 AM, 11 AM, 1 PM, 3 PM and 5 PM
activities.information:
Experience a unique water sightseeing tour of the iconic skyline of Dubai. The Boat Tour offers memorable sea tours of the top landmarks in Dubai, such as Dubai Marina, Palm Jumeirah, Burj Al Arab, Ain Dubai, and Atlantis.

Departing daily from Dubai Marina, the tours offer a wide variety of departure times to suit your preferences, with guaranteed stunning sights and informative, safe guided tours.

Each boat is equipped with GPS, life jackets, refreshments, and qualified guides, and you will get the chance to snap the best pictures of Dubai.

Important:

  • Children 12 years and under should be accompanied by an adult.
  • Tickets are non-refundable.
  • A minimum of 24 hours prior notice for a rescheduling request. (Acceptable for one- time rescheduling only and subject to availability).
  • Prior booking is required at least 24 hours in advance.
  • Each boat has a capacity of 12 passengers.
  • For safety reasons, infants or children below 14 kg are not allowed on the tour.
  • Passengers must carry an original identification card (Passport, Emirates ID, or Driver's license).
  • All passengers must wear life jackets.
  • If passengers run late, the ride time will be reduced accordingly.

Marina Skyline Tour

Key Sights

activities.name: Deep Dive Dubai
activities.timing_content: Daily 9 AM - 6 PM
activities.information:
Deep Dive Dubai is the latest record-breaking attraction in Dubai. It is the only diving facility in the world where you can dive to depths of 60 -meters and is verified by the Guinness World Record as the world's deepest swimming pool. 

The pool has an area designed to resemble a sunken city, and it is also used as an underwater film studio.

Important:

  • Children should be 10 years and above and accompanied by an adult.
  • On entry, customers must display a valid photo identification document, such as an original Emirates ID, driving license in English, or original passport. The name on the identification document must match the individual participating in the diving experience. Entrance is valid only for the specified person and time mentioned on the ticket and cannot be reused across multiple bookings.
  • All Deep Dive Dubai bookings are paid in full at the time of reservation
  • Deep Dive Dubai bookings are non-refundable
  • A parent/legal guardian must be present during any diving experience and provide written consent for minors
  • All bookings must honor the specific terms and conditions for the given experience.
  • Deep Dive Dubai booking is valid as per the booked date and time only
  • Rescheduling is allowed up to 5 days in advance. Rescheduling must be completed within 6 months of the original booking
activities.pricing_content:
Discover Scuba for non-certified guests (up to 12m)

  • Standard Discover Scuba - AED 1,800
  • Premium Discovery Scuba - AED 2,400 - includes edited video, honorary wall certificate
  • Platinum Discovery Scuba - AED 3,000 - includes edited short and long video, personalized images, facility tour, honorary wall certificate

Guided Scuba up to 30m for certified guests (certification required)

  • Standard Guided Scuba - AED 1,200
  • Premium Guided Scuba - AED 2,400 - includes edited video, honorary wall certificate
  • Platinum Guided Scuba - AED 3,000 - includes edited short and long video, personalized images, facility tour, honorary wall certificate

Discover Snorkeling

  • Snorkeling - AED 400

activities.name: IMG Worlds of Adventure
activities.address: E311 Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Rd, City of Arabia
activities.timing_content:
Sunday to Thursday 12 PM - 10 PM

Friday & Saturday 12 PM - 11 PM
activities.information:
Visit the world's largest indoor theme park. IMG Worlds of Adventure is Dubai's first mega-themed entertainment destination, covering an area of over 1.5 million square feet. The park is divided into five zones, representing global brands such as Cartoon Network and Marvel.

Free parking is available and there is plenty of space for everyone.

Valet parking is also available for an additional fee.

Important:

  • Children under the age of 12 must be accompanied by an adult aged 16+ years.
  • Tickets are non-refundable and non-transferable.
activities.pricing_content:
General Admission

  • Per person - AED 365
  • Children below 1.05 m - FREE

activities.name: Atlantis Aquaventure Waterpark & The Lost Chambers Aquarium
activities.timing_content: Open daily 10 AM – sunset (Closing time subject to change depending on the season)
activities.information:
Aquaventure Waterpark Dubai is the world’s largest waterpark, with over 79 slides and attractions!

Make your way down Dubai’s longest Lazy River, and relax on 500 meters of private beach. Experience fun rides and attractions with full-day access to Dubai’s Largest Aquarium with Aquaventure Super Pass, and discover up to 65,000 marine creatures in The Lost Chambers Aquarium.

Important:

  • Children under 1.2 metres (48”) should be always supervised by a responsible adult.
  • Guests under 12 years old should be accompanied by an adult for The Lost Chambers Aquarium admission.
  • Aquaventure Waterpark ticket sales are final and are 100% non-refundable.
  • Please make note of the Swim Attire Policy- no refunds or discounts will be given to guests who are unable to ride the slides due to inappropriate swim attire.
activities.pricing_content:
Aquaventure Super Pass

  • Per Person - AED 380
  • Included: 1 Day access to Aquaventure, World's Largest Waterpark, Access to The Lost Chambers Aquarium

Age Policy

  • Children under 2 years old and below complimentary access.
  • Children under 1.2 metres (48”) should be always supervised by a responsible adult.
  • Guests under 12 years old should be accompanied by an adult for The Lost Chambers Aquarium admission.

*A valid Emirates I.D. must be presented at the ticket office.

activities.name: Atlantis Dolphin & Sea Lion Encounter
activities.timing_content: Daily from 9:45 AM to 6:30 PM
activities.information:
Interact with dolphins and sea lions at Atlas Bay Atlantis The Palm Dubai, one of the world's most sophisticated dolphin habitats. Choose from a range of dolphin and sea lion experiences – suitable for all ages and swimming abilities.

Every experience includes unlimited access to Aquaventure Waterpark, the world’s largest waterpark, for the day. Enjoy 105 slides, attractions and experiences, a private beach, and a wave rider.

Important:

  • If unaccompanied by an adult, children must be at least 13 years old to enter Aquaventure.
  • All children under 12 years old must be accompanied by a participating and paying adult over 18.
  • Children 2 years old and below have complimentary access to Dolphin Meet & Greet, Dolphin Encounter, and Sea Lion Meet & Greet.
activities.pricing_content:
Dolphin Meet & Greet

  • Per person - AED 845
  • This is a dry experience for all ages - guests can meet and learn more about the dolphins without getting into the water. Includes free same-day access to Aquaventure Waterpark.

Dolphin Encounter

  • Per Person - AED 995
  • This experience is for all ages and swimming abilities - guests can dip and play with the dolphins in the water. This is an activity suitable for beginner swimmers as well. Includes free same-day access to Aquaventure Waterpark.

Dolphin Swim

  • Per Person - AED 1,245
  • This experience is for confident/skilled swimmers aged 8 years old and above - guests can swim with the dolphins and get to know more about them. Includes free same-day access to Aquaventure Waterpark.

Sea Lion Meet & Greet

  • Per Person- AED 745
  • This is a dry experience for all ages - guests can meet and learn more about the sea lions without getting into the water. Includes free same-day access to Aquaventure Waterpark.

activities.name: Stretch Limousine
activities.information:
Enjoy a chauffeur-driven stretch limousine experience for a relaxing journey to your destination or special event. Our limousines are equipped with state-of-the-art facilities and can accommodate groups of 10-20 passengers.

We work closely with you to understand your needs and wishes for the event in order to provide you with the best possible experience and exceptional quality.

Explore the world’s highest lounge at 585 meters above the ground, and immerse yourself in the clouds with an exclusive tour of the outdoor terrace. Delight in an impeccable selection of the finest teas and coffees, or enjoy a house beverage or glass of bubbly complimented by gourmet canapés.

activities.information:
Shimmers is a relaxed beachfront restaurant situated on the beautiful private beach of Jumeirah Mina Al Salam. Enjoy classic Greek and Mediterranean flavors with front-row views of the iconic Burj Al Arab.

Dress Code: Casual 

Entry & Age Policy: The last seating for children under the age of 12 is 5 PM and are welcome to stay until 7 PM. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Jetty Lounge is an elegant beachfront lounge and bar set on a private stretch of beach at One & Only Royal Mirage. Surrounded with palm trees and manicured gardens, you can unwind to the sound of soothing waves and chill lounge beats for a picture-perfect sunset moment.

Dress Code: Casual chic

Entry & Age Policy: Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Minimum Spend Policy: None

activities.information:
Nammos Dubai hosts a popular restaurant with beach and lounge, inspired by the luxurious beach life of Mykonos. Known for its lavish fun, you can dance 'til dawn with exquisite tastes and delectable bites at this glamorous venue, set at the prestigious Four Seasons Resort Jumeirah.

Dress Code: Smart Casual

Entry & Age Policy: Guests below 21 years are allowed until 10 PM only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Homegrown Beirut concept February 30 has made its way to the stunning location of Palm West Beach. This impressive outdoor lounge, beach bar, and restaurant overlooks the Dubai Marina skyline. Chef Reif Othman serves a Mediterranean-Japanese inspired menu in a beautiful beachfront setting.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.timing_content: Daily 12 PM - 10 PM
activities.information:
Embrace the beach vibe of Caña by Tamoka on JBR beach, overlooking the Arabian Gulf and Ain Dubai, the world’s largest observation wheel. Caña by Tamoka is the perfect beach spot for a relaxed lounge day or a sunset moment. Private access is available beside The Ritz-Carlton Hotel, JBR.

Dress Code: Smart Casual (dress shorts allowed). Swimwear, sportswear, and flip-flops prohibited after 7 PM

Entry & Age Policy: Entry is restricted to guests aged 21 and older. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required - a pre-payment of AED 200 per guest applies. Non-refundable in case of late cancellation or no-show.

Minimum Spend Policy: AED 200 per guest.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

Daily 12 PM - 1 AM

Party starts at 6 PM
activities.information:
Set on Palm Jumeirah’s West Beach, Surf Club offers a casual-chic beachside destination, hosting popular DJs on the weekends. Daytime guests can enjoy the sunshine with private beach cabanas or sun loungers and dance the night away against the backdrop of the iconic Marina skyline.

Dress Code: Casual

Entry & Age Policy: The venue is restricted to guests aged 21 and above only. Entry is permitted for mixed groups, couples, or ladies only. Bar entry is on a walk-in basis only, as reservations are not accepted for bar access. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

Restaurant Daily 12:30 PM - 12 AM
activities.information:
Located at the luxurious five-star hotel Jumeirah Al Naseem, Summersalt offers a laid-back beach dining experience with views of the Burj Al Arab. It serves experimental fusion cuisine and expert mixology to the sounds of live DJs.

Privilege rooftop presents poolside relaxation from the 75th floor of the SLS Dubai Hotel & Residences. Soak up the sun with two rooftop infinity pools and uninterrupted city views of Downtown Dubai. The pool bar lounge is the perfect spot for shisha and sundowners, serving a selection of signature cocktails with lively DJ tunes in time for sunset.

Dress Code: Casual/Swimwear

Ladies Day: Tuesday, 1 PM - 4 PM / AED 149 with selected cocktails and 30% discount on food.

Entry & Age Policy: Children aged 12 years and below are strictly not permitted to access the infinity pools on level 75. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Not required

Entrance Fee:

Weekdays & Weekends - AED 400 per person, AED 350 redeemable.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required - a pre-payment (depending on the number of guests) applies. Non-refundable in case of late cancellation or no-show.

Weekends AED 300 per person, AED 150 redeemable on F&B

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.timing_content:

Daily 11 AM - Sunset

Restaurant

Friday and Saturday 11 AM till late
activities.information:
Situated at the W Hotel in the Palm, BCH:CLB provides guests with a poolside playground ideal for partying. Guests can expect playful pools, Mediterranean flavors, and glamorous private cabanas.

Dress Code: Casual/Swimwear

Entry & Age Policy: The venue is restricted to guests aged 21 and above. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

activities.name: Bluewaters Island
activities.information:
Bluewaters is a vibrant lifestyle destination featuring distinctive residential, retail, hospitality, and entertainment options. The newly developed man-made island offers sweeping views of the Arabian Gulf, Palm Jumeirah, and the Marina skyline. This bustling waterfront destination includes a premium selection of cafés, restaurants, beach clubs, hotels, and home to the world’s largest observation wheel, Ain Dubai.

  • Number of restaurants 30+
  • Number of shops: 10+
  • Entertainment: Ain Dubai Observation Wheel, Cove Beach, Caesars Palace Resort, Madame Tussauds

activities.name: The Beach JBR
activities.information:
The Beach promenade in JBR (Jumeirah Beach Residences) is a relaxed district offering beachside restaurants, hotels, lounges, family-friendly entertainment, unique shops, water sports, a fully-equipped outdoor gym, and a lively beach club.

Popular with visitors, the bustling beachfront promenade is set against the beautiful backdrop of Dubai Marina, combined with a public beach. Wind past dining terraces, a grassy beachside amphitheater, and dedicated pathways for strolling and exercise including a scenic bridge which connects to Bluewaters Island.

  • Number of restaurants: 35+
  • Number of shops: 20+
  • Entertainment: Roxy Cinemas, Mini Golf, Aqua Fun, Byky, Hydro Water Sports, Splash Pad, Bla Bla Beach Club
activities.pricing_content:
The Beach is a popular beachfront promenade in Jumeirah Beach Residence, set against the beautiful backdrop of Dubai Marina. 
This bustling leisure destination, combines a free public beach with plenty of shops, restaurants and entertainment to enjoy.

  • Number of restaurants: 35+
  • Number of shops: 20+
  • Entertainment: Roxy Cinemas, Mini Golf, Aqua Fun, Byky, Hyrdo Water Sports, Splash Pad, Bla Bla Beach Club

activities.name: Souk Madinat Jumeirah
activities.timing_content: Restaurants 8 AM - 2 AM
activities.information:
Souk Madinat Jumeirah presents a traditional Arabic-style promenade with over 25 restaurants serving drinks and international cuisines, set against the beautiful backdrop of Burj Al Arab. The 5-kilometer river system allows you to explore the scenic waterways by foot or on an Arabian gondola boat trip.

  • Number of restaurants/bars: 25+
  • Number of shops: 40+
  • Entertainment: Theatre of Digital Art Dubai

activities.name: Downtown Boulevard
activities.information:
Discover Downtown Dubai, a lively entertainment district filled with popular restaurants, cafes, and shops.

  • Burj Khalifa – the world’s tallest building 
  • Dubai Mall – one of the world’s biggest shopping malls 
  • Dubai Fountain – the world’s biggest choreographed fountain show 
  • Dubai Opera – a multi-format performing arts center
  • Souk Al Bahar – a modern Arabic souk which hosts a variety of restaurants and shopping outlets   
  • Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Boulevard – a 3.5 km long boulevard offering a wide selection of restaurants, cafes and outdoor art exhibitions

activities.name: Time Out Market
activities.timing_content:
Monday to Thursday 12 PM - 12 AM

Friday 12 PM - 1 AM

Saturday 10 AM - 1 AM

Sunday 10 AM - 2 AM
activities.information:
Time Out Market Dubai is an elevated food hall dining experience situated in Souk Al Bahar, Downtown. Choose from a selection of cuisines, featuring 17 of the best homegrown restaurants in Dubai all under one roof. 

  • Number of bars: 3     
  • Number of restaurants: 17
  • Entertainment: The Dubai Fountain Show

activities.name: Club Vista Mare
activities.information:
Club Vista Mare is a premium waterfront dining and beach club promenade on one of Palm Jumeirah’s most popular destinations for both residents and tourists. 

This upscale lifestyle and dining destination serves a fabulous range of Middle Eastern, Italian, Ethiopian, and other cuisines.

Each restaurant has indoor and outdoor terrace seating, with some featuring space directly on the beach.

activities.name: Wasl 51
activities.information:
Wasl 51 is a multi-use development in the heart of Jumeirah and has become a popular location for visitors and locals.

Sample international cuisine with a wide selection of restaurants and cafes, such as Brunch & Cake, offering Instagrammable all-day dining, while Portuguese favorite Lana Lusa will transport you straight to the streets of Lisbon.

activities.name: Depachika Food Hall
activities.timing_content:
Monday to Friday 10 AM - 10 PM

Saturday and Sunday 10 AM - 12 AM
activities.information:
Depachika is more than just a food hall showcasing a wide range of gourmet treats. It is more like a food-themed park experience taking you through a foodies’ paradise.

The food hall has excellent attention to detail and focuses on customer satisfaction

The retail mix combines specialty and artisanal and offers a range of food categories and gifting ideas targeting the foodie community, palm residents, local Emiratis, expats, and visiting tourists.

activities.name: Summersalt Beach Club
activities.timing_content:
Beach Club Daily 9 AM to sunset

Restaurant Daily 12:30 PM - 12 AM
activities.information:
Summersalt presents a luxurious family-friendly beach club, pool, and restaurant, located on the luxury five-star grounds of Jumeirah Al Naseem. Summersalt offers a relaxed dining experience with amazing beachside views, perfect for families.

Dress Code: Casual Beach Chic

Entry & Age Policy: Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required – a cancellation/no-show fee of AED 200 per guest applies.

Entrance Fee:

Weekends - AED 800 per person, AED 400 redeemable.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

Restaurant: Daily 12 PM -1 AM
activities.information:
Drawing inspiration from the authenticity of Greek life, KYMA offers a refined beach club and dining experience situated at the far end of Palm West Beach. This new destination serves a menu of authentic and delicious Greek flavors with dreamy décor and a chilled electro soundtrack. 

Dress Code: Smart Casual / Beachwear

Entry & Age Policy: The venue is for guests aged 21 years and above only only from 12 PM to 7 PM. After 7 PM, guests of all ages are welcome. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance Fee:

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

The retreat-style space is inspired by and named after Africa’s first indigenous tribe, the San. The restaurant features an open-plan layout with indoor and outdoor seating, providing an internationally inspired menu for a refined and relaxing beach experience.

Dress Code: Smart casual / Beachwear

Entry & Age Policy: Only guests aged 16 years and above are allowed in the entire venue. Reservations for the pool and beach are available from 9 AM until 12 PM only. After 12 PM, access is on a walk-in basis. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required pre-payment to secure the reservation.

Entrance Fee:

Weekdays - AED 250 per person, non-redeemable.

Weekends - AED 300 per person, non-redeemable.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

Tagomago captures the essence of the Balearic Islands with a bohemian style restaurant, bar, and beach club on Palm Jumeirah. The space features sunbeds on the beach and a terrace dining area overlooking Burj Al Arab with plenty of sea views, stunning décor, and delicious Spanish cuisine.

Dress Code: Casual/Beach Chic

Entry & Age Policy: Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Dress Code: Beach Chic/Swimwear

Ladies Day: Tuesday & Thursday, 10 AM - 7 PM / AED 99 inclusive of signature cocktail “Le Rose” or "Perrier-Jouët".

Dress Code: Beach Wear

Ladies Day: Friday, 9 AM - 12 AM / AED 275 with sunbed, five drinks, 1 food dish and pool/beach access.

Reservations for the beach or pool area apply only to day beds and cabanas. All ages are welcome at the beach and restaurant, but the pool is restricted to guests aged 18 and above. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

activities.information:
Casa Amor is a boho chic restaurant and beach club located at the Mandarin Oriental Hotel Jumeira. The restaurant showcases a menu of authentic Mediterranean cuisine, crafted with the fine ingredients. With its warm ambiance, intimate design, and exceptional service, Casa Amor is the ideal destination for romantic evenings, special celebrations, or day time parties.

Dress Code: Smart Casual/Swimwear

Entry & Age Policy: For the restaurant, all ages are allowed on weekdays, while weekends are restricted to 21 and above only. For the beach, all ages are welcome throughout the week. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required for group reservations of 7 guests and above - AED 200 pre-payment per person applies. Non-refundable in case of late cancellation or no-show.

activities.timing_content:
Sunday to Wednesday 10 AM - 1 AM

Thursday to Saturday 10 AM - 3 AM
activities.information:
Baoli Dubai brings the glamour of the French Riviera to Jumeirah, offering a seamless fusion of Asian flavors and entertainment. The venue features a vibrant atmosphere, stylish interiors, lush greenery, and a charming outdoor terrace. Perfect for dinner or late-night revelry, Baoli promises an unforgettable experience.

Dress Code: Beachwear/Swimwear

Entry & Age Policy: Guests under 6 are not allowed. Pool and beach access is for 16 and above; under 21 must be with an adult. Restaurant and terrace: weekdays, guests aged 6 to 16 can stay until 9 PM, 16 to 21 until 11 PM with an adult; weekends, 12 to 16 years can stay until 9 PM, 16 to 21 until 11 PM. Sunset Lounge and Moon Room: for 21 and above only. Bookings for the beach are available until 12 PM. After this time, walk-in guests are welcome, subject to availability. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required – a cancellation/no-show fee of AED 150 per guest applies.

Entrance Fee:

Weekdays - AED 300 per person, AED 200 redeemable.

Weekends - AED 400 per person, AED 300 redeemable.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Sirene by Gaia
activities.timing_content: Daily 10 AM - 1 AM
activities.information:
Sirene by Gaia brings Mediterranean-inspired elegance to the beach, offering a chic setting with refreshing cocktails and flavorful dishes. Guests can unwind in a relaxed atmosphere, enjoying the sea views while indulging in delicious meals.

Dress Code: Smart Casual/Smart Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: Guests below the age of 21 are allowed in the restaurant until 9 PM only; after that, the venue is for 21 and above only. In the beach area, all ages are welcome as long as accompanied by an adult. Pool access is restricted to 21 and above only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required – a cancellation/no-show fee of AED 250 per guest applies.

Entrance Fee:

Weekdays - AED 300 per person, non-redeeemable.

Weekends - AED 400 per person (beach sunbeds), non-redeemable & AED 500 per person (pool sunbeds), non-redeemable.

Beach/Pool: 10 AM until sunset
activities.information:
Ninive Beach is a restaurant and beach club offering Middle Eastern cuisine in a stunning beachfront setting. Showcasing a menu inspired by the rich culinary heritage of the region, the restaurant offers a feast of vibrant dishes, aromatic spices, and fresh ingredients. With its enchanting décor, warm hospitality, and breathtaking sea views, Ninive Beach is an ideal spot for sunset gatherings, intimate dinners, or beach days.

Dress Code: Smart Casual/Smart Beachwear

Entry & Age Policy: The venue is restricted to guests aged 19 and above only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

activities.name: Outlet Village
activities.timing_content:
Monday to Thursday 10 AM - 11 PM
Friday to Sunday 10 AM - 12 AM
activities.information:
Outlet Village, located at Dubai Parks & Resorts, inspired by the architecture of a medieval Tuscan village. Discover great deals on high-end luxury brands. 

  • Number of Shops: 87 
  • Number of Food Outlets: 12

activities.name: Dubai Outlet Mall
activities.timing_content:
Sunday to Thursday 10 AM - 10 PM
Friday to Saturday 10 AM - 12 AM
activities.information:
Dubai Outlet Mall is the first outlet mall in the Middle East, located on Al Ain - Dubai Road, just a 30-minute drive from Downtown Dubai. Discover great discounts on more than 1,200 of the world’s premium and top fashion brands. 

  • Number of Shops: 181
  • Number of Food Outlets: 20
  • Entertainment: Chuck E Cheese’s family entertainment center.

activities.name: Billionaire Dubai
activities.timing_content:
Monday - Closed
Tuesday to Sunday 9 PM – 3 AM
activities.information:
Founded in 1998 by world-renowned F1 legend Flavio Briatore, Billionaire Dubai presents a high-end dining experience, featuring live entertainment and Japanese and Italian flavors. Guests enjoy a set five course menu and experience energetic live dance performances and acrobatic shows throughout the night. Billionaire is truly an electric experience for a night to remember.

  • Our Favorite Thing: The great music and live performances     
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Caviar  

Dress Code: Smart Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: Only guests aged 16 and older are allowed until 12 AM; after 12 AM, entry is restricted to guests aged 21 and older. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Requires a 50% pre-payment of the total amount – a cancellation/no-show will result in no refund of the deposit. 

Minimum Spend Policy: Depends on the number of guests.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Aretha
activities.timing_content: Wednesday to Sunday 8 PM - 3 AM
activities.information:
Located at the St. Regis Gardens, Palm Jumeirah, Aretha is a live music restaurant inspired by the sixties and seventies. Inspired by the legendary Aretha Franklin, it features soul, R&B, with a touch of Arabic performances. The cuisine is international and top-notch in terms of quality.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Fantastic Live Music Performers
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Rigatoni Arrabbiata

Dress Code: Chic & Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: Children aged 7 and above are allowed until 10 PM only. After 10 PM, the venue is restricted to ages 21 and above. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Opa
activities.timing_content: Daily 7 PM - 2 AM
activities.information:
Transport yourself to the Greek Isles with this family run restaurant. Opa has quickly become a top spot for mouth-watering Greek cuisine and live entertainment. Situated at the Fairmont Hotel on Sheikh Zayed Road, with its own dedicated entrance. Guests are encouraged to join in performances including the famous Zorba dance and traditional Greek plate smashing for an exciting night out.

  • Our Favorite Thing: The upbeat atmosphere and friendly staff
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Lamb Chops with Pickled Cucumber

Dress Code: Smart Casual

Entry & Age Policy: Guests aged 7 and above are welcome until 10 PM. After 10 PM, only guests aged 21 and above are permitted. The lounge and bar area is for guests aged 21 and above only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required – a cancellation fee of AED 80 per guest or a no-show fee of AED 120 per guest applies. 

Minimum Spend Policy: Required to have a full dining experience per guest.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.timing_content:
Daily 9 AM until late

Last order 11 PM
activities.information:
Josette welcomes Parisian glamor to the DIFC dining scene, inspired by the iconic French actress Josette Day. Expect a refined menu of reimagined French classics, including foie gras and escargot. Artistic director Sebastien Agius brings together exciting live performances of burlesque stars, tap dancers, and singers to deliver a classy theatrical dining experience viewing pleasure.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Josette’s very own Josette French bubbly 
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Signature Poulet Roti

Dress Code: Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: Please be informed that children of all ages are welcome for breakfast while children aged 6 and above are welcome for lunch. 16 years old and above are welcome for sparkling afternoons, brunch, and dinner from 7 PM – 10 PM. Josette loves a late-night soirée so after 10 PM it’s 21 and over only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required for group reservations of 8 guests and above. A cancellation/no-show fee of AED 100 for lunch and afternoon tea, AED 150 for dinner per guest applies.

Minimum Spend Policy: Requires to have a full dining experience.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Gatsby
activities.timing_content: Wednesday to Sunday 9 PM - 3 AM
activities.information:
Gatsby brings the spirit of the Roaring Twenties to life with an elegant setting and a vibrant atmosphere. A place where fine dining, crafted drinks, and lively entertainment come together for an unforgettable night.

  • Our Favorite Thing: An Entertaining Show with Multiple Acts
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Yellowtail Carpaccio

Dress Code: Smart Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: Guests aged 13 to 20 are welcome until 12 AM; after that, only guests 21 and above are allowed. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Not required

Minimum Spend Policy: None

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Gatsby
activities.timing_content: Wednesday to Sunday 9 PM - 3 AM
activities.information:
Gatsby brings the spirit of the Roaring Twenties to life with an elegant setting and a vibrant atmosphere. A place where fine dining, crafted drinks, and lively entertainment come together for an unforgettable night.

  • Our Favorite Thing: An Entertaining Show with Multiple Acts
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Yellowtail Carpaccio

Dress Code: Smart Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: Guests aged 13 to 20 are welcome until 12 AM; after that, only guests 21 and above are allowed. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Not required

Minimum Spend Policy: None

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Birds Dubai
activities.timing_content: Daily 4 PM - 3 AM
activities.information:
Nestled on the 63rd floor of Address Downtown, Birds Dubai offers guests a sky-high dining experience with stunning views of Burj Khalifa. Guests can enjoy a unique theatrical dining experience with contemporary Japanese fusion cuisine.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Entertaining Show with an Amazing View
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Sushi Rolls

Dress Code: Chic & Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: Guests aged 10 years and above are welcome to dine until 10 PM. After 10 PM, only guests aged 21 years and above are allowed. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required – a cancellation fee of AED 150 and no-show fee of AED 250 per guest applies.

Minimum Spend Policy: Sunday to Thursday: Depending on the number of guest.

Friday and Saturday: AED 800 per guest.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: The Theater Dubai
activities.timing_content: Wednesday to Sunday 10 PM - 3 AM
activities.information:
The Theater offers an upscale level of live entertainment in Dubai, featuring a combination of vocalists, musicians, dancers, and aerialists. Guests can experience an adventurous musical journey, a true masterpiece in motion, complemented by a refreshing international menu of bold flavors.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Amazing multicultural performances of Eastern and Western influences 
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Beluga and Oscietra Caviar 

Dress Code: Smart Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: The venue is for guests aged 21 and above only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required – prepayment is necessary to secure the reservation. A cancellation fee of AED 120 and a no-show fee of AED 180 per guest applies.

Minimum Spend Policy: AED 500 per guest is required for a regular table every Wednesday, Thursday, Saturday, and Sunday, AED 800 per guest applies for a regular table on Fridays. VIP tables range from AED 800 to AED 1,500, depending on the day of the reservation.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Aretha
activities.timing_content: Wednesday to Sunday 8 PM - 3 AM
activities.information:
Located at the St. Regis Gardens, Palm Jumeirah, Aretha is a live music restaurant inspired by the sixties and seventies. Inspired by the legendary Aretha Franklin, it features soul, R&B, with a touch of Arabic performances. The cuisine is international and top-notch in terms of quality.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Fantastic Live Music Performers
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Rigatoni Arrabbiata

Dress Code: Chic & Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: Children aged 7 and above are allowed until 10 PM only. After 10 PM, the venue is restricted to ages 21 and above. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required - a cancellation/no-show fee of AED 150 per guest applies.

Minimum Spend Policy: Weekdays: Regular seating (2 hours) AED 500 per guest, whole night experience AED 1,000 per guest. Weekends (Friday and Saturday): Regular seating and second seating (2 hours) AED 500 per guest, whole night experience AED 1,500 per guest.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Sky 2.0
activities.timing_content:
Closed from Sunday to Wednesday

Thursday to Saturday 10:30 PM - 4 AM
activities.information:
Sky 2.0 is a buzzing club located right in the heart of Dubai Design District, featuring a backdrop of Dubai's majestic skyline. Originally from Beirut, Sky 2.0 is known for hosting unforgettable evenings filled with entertainment and awesome vibes. 

Music Schedule:

  • Closed from Sunday to Wednesday
  • Thursday – Commercial & Hip-Hop
  • Friday – Iconic Hits, Pop, & Commercial
  • Saturday – Open Format

Dress Code: Smart Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: The venue is restricted to guests aged 21 and above. Entry is permitted for mixed groups, couples, or all-ladies only. Walk-ins are advised to arrive early, preferably before 11 PM, to ensure availability. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required for table reservations - a pre-payment applies. Non-refundable in case of late cancellation or no-show.

Minimum Spend Policy: Walk-in entry for couples and ladies is free before 12 AM. After 12 AM, the entrance fee is AED 600 per couple (including 2 drinks per person) and AED 300 per lady (including 2 drinks). Walk-ins will be standing only. For bar seating, a reservation is required with a minimum spend of AED 500 per person. For table reservations, prices start from AED 4,000 for up to 4 people.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Be Beach
activities.timing_content:
Pool/Beach Daily 10 AM to sunset

Restaurant Monday to Thursday 10 AM to sunset

Friday and Sunday 10 AM - 1 AM

Night Party Friday and Sunday 7 PM - 2 AM
activities.information:
Be Beach, situated at Dubai Harbour, is a luxury pool club offering guests an outdoor nightclub experience. Enjoy stylish poolside lounging that seamlessly transitions into an electrifying outdoor nightlife venue.

Dress Code: Beach Chic

Entry & Age Policy: The venue is restricted to guests aged 21 and above only. Entry is permitted for mixed groups, couples, or ladies only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required.

Minimum Spend Policy: Varies based on the number of guests and the booking date, as the venue hosts different events and features various DJs.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Surf Club
activities.timing_content:
Daily 12 PM - 1 AM

Party starts at 6 PM
activities.information:
Set on Palm Jumeirah’s West Beach, Surf Club offers a casual-chic beachside destination, hosting popular DJs on weekends. Daytime guests can enjoy the sunshine with private beach cabanas or sun loungers, and dance the night away against the backdrop of the iconic Marina skyline.

Dress Code: Smart Casual

Entry & Age Policy: The venue is restricted to guests aged 21 and above only. Entry is permitted for mixed groups, couples, or ladies only. Bar entry is on a walk-in basis only, as reservations are not accepted for bar access. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required - a pre-payment (depending on the number of guests and date of booking) applies. Non-refundable in case of late cancellation or no-show.

Minimum Spend Policy: Varies based on the number of guests and the booking date, as the venue hosts different events and features various DJs.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Ushuaia Dubai
activities.timing_content: Event Based Venue
activities.information:
Ushuaia Dubai brings the energy and vibrancy of Ibiza to the heart of the Dubai Harbour, offering an unparalleled party experience. This iconic venue features an open-air layout, top-tier DJs, and a lively atmosphere that transforms into a dynamic nightclub. Ushuaia is a must-visit for those seeking unforgettable nightlife in Dubai.

Dress Code: Smart Casual

Entry & Age Policy: The venue is restricted to guests aged 21 and above only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required - a pre-payment (depending on the number of guests and date of booking) applies. Non-refundable in case of late cancellation or no-show.

Minimum Spend Policy: Varies based on the number of guests and the booking date, as the venue hosts different events and features various DJs.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Montgomerie Golf Club
activities.timing_content:
Daily 6:30 AM - 5 PM

Timings may vary depending on season.
activities.information:
Montgomerie Golf Club is located in the prestigious Emirates Hills community at Address Montgomerie. Covering 200 acres, it features 14 lakes and 81 bunkers, offering golf enthusiasts a top-class golfing experience. 

Number of holes: 18-hole, par-72

Length: 7,461 yards

activities.name: Dubai Hills Golf Club
activities.timing_content:
Daily 7 AM - 5 PM

Timings may vary depending on season.
activities.information:
The Dubai Hills Golf Club is one of the latest additions to Dubai’s golfing scene, covering 1.2 million square meters of varied terrain. It offers a fun yet challenging course designed for golfers of all levels.

Number of holes: 18-hole, par-72

Length: 7,220 yards

activities.name: The Els Club
activities.timing_content: Daily 7 AM - 6 PM
activities.information:
Known for being one of the finest golfing destinations in the Middle East, this course is truly a masterpiece. 

The Els Club provides a top-notch golfing experience and is designed by former US Open Championship winner Ernie Els. 

Number of holes: 18-holes, par-72

Length: 7,538 yards

activities.name: Jumeirah Golf Estates
activities.timing_content:
Daily 6 AM - 8:30 PM

Timings may vary depending on the season.
activities.information:
Jumeirah Golf Estates is a world-class golf destination, offering two internationally acclaimed championship courses. 

The Earth Course, a DP World Tour Championship course, is inspired by the European and North American parklands.

The Fire Course is designed with a natural landscape and is suitable for players on all levels. 

Number of holes: 18-hole, par-72 on both courses

Length: 7,480 yards (Fire course) & 7,706 yards (Earth course)

activities.name: Dubai Creek Golf Club
activities.timing_content:
First tee time 6:40 AM

Last tee time 10 PM

Timings may vary depending on season
activities.information:
Dubai Creek Golf & Yacht Club is a five-star leisure experience located next to the peaceful Creek and overlooking the Downtown skyline.

Voted one of the world's 'Top 100 Must-Play Golf Courses', the iconic club-house is even pictured on the 20 dirham-note.

Number of holes: 18-holes, par-71

Length: 6,967 yards

activities.name: City Walk
activities.timing_content:
Monday to Friday 10 AM - 10 PM

Saturday and Sunday 10 AM - 12 AM
activities.information:
City Walk is a high-end neighborhood where world-class shopping is artfully combined with dining and entertainment. The European-inspired boulevards make it a great place for a stroll during the cooler months.

  • Number of Shops: 90+
  • Number of Food Outlets: 60+
  • Entertainment: Green Planet, Mattel Play Town, Roxy Cinema, Geek Nation.

activities.name: Dubai Festival City Mall
activities.timing_content:
Monday to Thursday 10 AM - 10 PM

Friday to Sunday 10 AM - 12 AM
activities.information:
Dubai Festival City Mall is situated on the banks of the historic Dubai Creek. It offers over 185,000 square meters of shopping, dining, and entertainment and is also home to IKEA. Do not miss IMAGINE, the world’s largest water projection show, which plays every night. 

  • Number of Shops: 400+
  • Number of Restaurants: 70+
  • Entertainment: Novo Cinemas, Bounce X, Fabyland, Dream Aero, Stay & Play.

activities.name: Nakheel Mall
activities.timing_content:
Monday to Thursday 10 AM - 10 PM

Friday to Sunday 10 AM - 12 AM
activities.information:
Nakheel Mall is the latest shopping center on Palm Jumeirah. It features rooftop fine dining and an observation deck showcasing a 360 degree view of The Palm and Dubai Marina.

Nakheel Mall also includes its own Monorail, allowing easy accessibility. The rooftop is now also home to top dining and nightlife venues, including Trend Studio and Soho Garden Palm Jumeirah, both with stunning outdoor spaces to enjoy.

  • Number of Shops: 300+
  • Number of Food Outlets: 50+
  • Entertainment: The View Palm, Vox Cinemas, Trampo Extreme, Fabyland, Bricobilandia, Depachika Food Hall

activities.name: Mall of the Emirates
activities.timing_content:
Monday to Thursday 10 AM - 11 PM 

Friday to Sunday 10 AM - 12 AM
activities.information:
Mall of the Emirates offers a great selection of shopping, dining, and entertainment. Spread across more than 230,000 square meters, it is home to the region's only indoor ski resort, Ski Dubai. For added convenience, Kempinski Hotel is also attached to the mall.

  • Number of Shops: 630+
  • Number of Restaurants: 100+
  • Entertainment: Ski Dubai, Magic Planet, VOX Cinemas

activities.name: Dubai Mall
activities.timing_content:
Sunday to Thursday 10 AM - 12 AM

Friday and Saturday 10 AM - 1 AM
activities.information:
The Dubai Mall by Emaar is the ultimate retail destination in Dubai, covering over 1 million square meters of world-class shopping, dining, and entertainment situated right in the heart of Downtown.

  • Number of Shops: 1300+ 
  • Number of Food Outlets: 200+  
  • Entertainment: At The Top Burj Khalifa, The Dubai Fountain Show, Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo, VR Park, KidZania®, Reel Cinemas Megaplex, Dubai Ice Rink, Infinity Lumieres

activities.name: Dubai Hills Mall
activities.information:
Dubai Hills Mall is a retail, leisure, and entertainment complex situated in Dubai Hills. The mall has over 650 shops and restaurants, as well as a rollercoaster.

  • Number of Shops: 320
  • Number of Food Outlets: 71+
  • Entertainment: Adventure Park by Emaar, Roxy Cinemas, The Storm Coaster/Play DXB

activities.name: Ibn Battuta Mall
activities.timing_content:
Sunday to Thursday 10 AM - 10 PM
Friday and Saturday 10 AM - 12 AM
activities.information:
With around 275 shops and 50 restaurants, Ibn Battuta is the world's largest themed shopping mall, consisting of six courts: Andalusia Court, China Court, Egypt Court, India Court, Persia Court, and Tunisia Court. The mall contains several activities, such as a trampoline park, a light exhibition, Carrefour hypermarket, and a 21-screen cinema theater.

  • Number of Shops: 250+
  • Number of Dining Outlets: 80+
  • Entertainment: Fun City, Kidz Palooza, Novo Cinemas IMAX, Sing N Swing, Stay and Play, Switch Bowling, and Warehouse Gym

activities.name: Dubai Marina Mall
activities.timing_content:
Sunday to Wednesday 10 AM - 10 PM

Thursday to Saturday 10 AM - 11 PM
activities.information:
Dubai Marina Mall is a modern, thoughtfully designed haven for the shopping, leisure, and lifestyle pursuits of residents and tourists. 

﻿In terms of scale, 140 outlets and a gross leasable area spanning 390,000 sq. ft. are tiered over four levels that bring together high-street fashion brands, aspirational couture, and al fresco dining, There's also a shimmering waterfront, cinematic thrills at Reel Cinemas, engaging children’s entertainment, and the convenience of a supermarket.

  • Number of shops: 104
  • Number of food outlets: 24
  • Entertainment: Reel Cinemas, Zip Across Dubai Marina with XDubai, Dhow Cruise, Kids Playzone, Pier 7 and Address Marina Hotel are also connected.

activities.name: Wafi City Mall
activities.timing_content:
Monday to Thursday 10 AM - 10 PM
Friday to Sunday 10 AM - 12 AM
activities.information:
Open since the early 1990s, Wafi City has the honor of being one of Dubai's first large shopping centers. As soon as you arrive at the mall entrance, you’re greeted by striking sphinx statues. The opulent Egyptian theme continues indoors, surrounding you with inspiring décor that transports you to another place and time.

  • Number of Shops: 250
  • Number of Dining Outlets: 26+
  • Entertainment: Lazy & River Pool, VOX Cinema, Magic Planet, AYA

activities.name: BurJuman Mall
activities.timing_content:
Sunday to Thursday 10 AM - 10 PM
Friday and Saturday 10 AM - 12 AM
activities.information:
BurJuman is centrally located in Bur Dubai, at the heart of the retail and heritage districts. It has convenient and direct public transport access from both Dubai Metro lines at the BurJuman interchange station.

The opportunities within the spacious mall are endless, with the latest fashion, beauty, and lifestyle provided by the world’s leading retailers, There's also a state-of-the-art cinema, a fun-packed family entertainment center, a Carrefour hypermarket, and a great range of dining options.

  • Number of Shops: 200+
  • Number of Dining Outlets: 52+
  • Entertainment: Magic Planet, VOX Cinema, Syllogism

activities.name: Galaxy Bar
activities.timing_content:
Sunday and Monday Closed

Tuesday and Wednesday 8 PM - 3 AM

Thursday to Saturday 9 PM - 4 AM
activities.information:
Galaxy Bar presents an exclusive cocktail bar and lounge in DIFC. With limited capacity each night, Galaxy Bar provides an intimate atmosphere, bespoke signature cocktails, and lively DJ tunes until the early hours of the morning.

Dress Code: Smart Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: The venue is restricted to guests aged 21 years and above only. Entry is allowed for mixed groups or couples. However, if there is still significant availability, all-gent or all-ladies groups may be given an exemption. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Not required

Minimum Spend Policy: Every Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, and Saturday, minimum spend for Bottle Service is AED 2,000 for 4 guests. Every Friday, AED 1,000 per person, with a minimum of 4 guests per reservation.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Zuma
activities.timing_content:
Monday to Wednesday 12 PM - 3:30 PM / 7 PM - 12 AM

Thursday and Friday 12 PM - 3:30 PM / 7 PM - 1 AM

Saturday 1:30 PM - 4 PM / 7 PM - 1 AM

Sunday 12 PM - 4 PM / 7 PM - 12 AM

Bar: Daily 12 PM - 2 AM
activities.information:
Zuma Dubai is a popular award-winning restaurant, serving modern Japanese cuisine in a sleek and stylish setting spanning two floors in DIFC. The menu is based around the Japanese Izakaya style of dining, an informal and fun food-sharing concept. Children are allowed to dine in the restaurant section, although the upper lounge area is only open to adults.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Zuma’s award-winning bar is one of the best in the Middle East & Africa
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Miso Marinated Black Cod 

Dress Code: Smart Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: All ages allowed to dine for lunch & dinner. Lounge & Bar: strictly 21 and above. Reservations are allowed only for the restaurant and lounge areas. The bar operates on a walk-in basis, subject to availability.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required – a cancellation/no-show fee of AED 120 per guest applies.

Minimum Spend Policy: Required to have a full dining experience.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Honeycomb Hi-Fi
activities.timing_content:
Sunday to Thursday 7:30 PM - 2 AM

Friday and Saturday 7:30 PM - 3 AM
activities.information:
Honeycomb Hi-Fi is the region’s first listening bar, showcasing photography exhibitions, vinyl records, and a book shop. This musical hotspot at Pullman Dubai in Business Bay offers weekly DJ sets, musicians, and listening sessions. An Izakaya dining menu is served alongside craft cocktails. 

Dress Code: Smart Casual

Entry & Age Policy: The bar area operates on a walk-in basis only, and seating is available on a first-come, first-served basis. Guests aged 13 years and above are welcome for the first seating only. After 10 PM, all guests must be 21 years & above and are required to present a valid physical ID. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Reservation Policy: Required for the restaurant – a cancellation/no-show fee of AED 150 per guest applies.

Minimum Spend Policy: AED 350 per person for groups of 9 guests and above in the restaurant.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: LY-LA
activities.timing_content: Daily 10 PM - 3 AM
activities.information:
Chef Izu’s hidden bar LY-LA is set behind a soundproof door in the basement of Alaya restaurant in the upmarket DIFC district. The intimate bar hosts an exciting musical line-up of house music, Middle Eastern tunes, and live belly dancing performances

Dress Code: Smart Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: The venue only accepts table reservations. If you do not wish to book a table, you are welcome to walk in, subject to availability. The venue is restricted to guests aged 21 years and above. Entry is allowed for mixed groups, couples, or all-ladies group only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Not required 

Minimum Spend Policy: Depends on the number of guests.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Nyx
activities.timing_content: Daily 9 PM - 3 AM
activities.information:
Set in the basement of upscale Gaia restaurant in DIFC is the unassuming speakeasy NYX, named after the evening goddess. This secret 70-person underground club is loved by celebrities and residents alike, with world-class DJs providing lively sets throughout the night.

Dress Code: Smart Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: The venue only accepts table reservations. If you do not wish to book a table, you are welcome to walk in, subject to availability. Guests aged 21 years and above are permitted in the venue. Entry is allowed for mixed groups or couples only. Photography and video recording are prohibited within the venue. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required

Minimum Spend Policy: AED 650 per guest on weekdays, AED 850 per guest on weekends (Thursday, Friday, and Saturday)

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Soul Kitchen
activities.timing_content:
Sunday to Thursday 6 PM - 2 AM

Friday and Saturday 6 PM - 3 AM
activities.information:
Nestled in Business Bay, Soul Kitchen is an indoor bar and lounge offering a fusion of Levantine and Latin American cuisine. Guests can immerse themselves in a unique space celebrating regional alternative culture, art, and talent.

Dress Code: Smart Casual

Entry & Age Policy: Guests below 21 years are allowed in the venue until 8:30 PM. After 8:30 PM, the venue is restricted to guests aged 21 years and above. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required for reservations of 6 guests and above every Monday and required every Wednesday, Friday, and Saturday - a cancellation/no-show fee of AED 100 per guest applies.

Minimum Spend Policy: Wednesday night - AED 450 per person (front row seating) and AED 350 per person (middle and back row seating), Friday and Saturday AED 450 per guest from 8 PM or AED 550 per guest from 10 PM.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Electric Pawn Shop
activities.timing_content:
Sunday to Thursday 6 PM - 1:30 AM
Friday and Saturday 6 PM - 3 AM
activities.information:
Electric Pawn Shop is described as an Asian-Mediterranean bar inspired by 1970s Chinatown New York. Located at H Hotel, Electric Pawn Shop serves contemporary Asian Mediterranean cocktails and cuisine, combining two vastly diverse cultures in Dubai. Expect cool music, retro interiors, and a DJ station for an unconventional night out.

Dress Code: Casual

Entry & Age Policy: The venue is restricted to guests aged 21 years and above. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required for group reservations of 6 guests and above - a pre-payment of AED 1,000 applies. Non-refundable in case of late cancellation or no-show.

Minimum Spend Policy: None

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Salmon Guru
activities.timing_content: Daily 12:30 PM - 2 AM
activities.information:
The award-winning bar and restaurant Salmon Guru hails from Madrid. It's often ranked within the World’s 50 Best Bars and is well-known for its quirky cocktail experience and fabulous tapas.

Set on the ground floor of the ME Hotel in Business Bay, Salmon Guru serves a mixture of exotic flavors and drinks. It's sure to give you a unique Dubai experience.

Dress Code: Smart Casual 

Ladies Night: Tuesday, 8:30 PM - 11:30 PM / AED 150 with unlimited drinks.

Entry & Age Policy: The venue is restricted to guests aged 21 years and above. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Not required

Minimum Spend Policy: AED 475 per person for group reservations of 8 guests and above.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Blind Tiger
activities.timing_content: Daily 5 PM - 2 AM
activities.information:
Blind Tiger in Jumeirah Al Naseem is set at the idyllic Turtle Lagoon. This hidden bar features timeless art décor with a speakeasy theme, ideal for pre- or post-dinner drinks. Soundtracks are provided by live DJs until the early hours. 

Guests are treated to a selection of premium beverages, hand-crafted by an expert team of innovative mixologists and paired with mouth-watering bites.

Dress Code: Smart Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: The venue is restricted to guests aged 21 years and above. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Not required

Minimum Spend Policy: AED 250 per guest applies every Friday and Saturday from 9 PM to 12 AM.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Agora Cocktail Bar & Social Club
activities.timing_content:
Monday to Thursday 6 PM - 2 AM

Friday to Sunday 6 PM - 3 AM
activities.information:
Agora, a lively venue in the heart of The Dubai EDITION Hotel, brings a new level of sophistication and energy to Dubai's nightlife. As both a cocktail bar and social club, offers an immersive experience with its eclectic music, expertly crafted cocktails, exquisite cuisine, and vibrant community atmosphere.

Dress Code: Smart Casual

Ladies Night: Wednesday, 8 PM - 11 PM / AED 150 free-flow of drinks and house pours.

Entry & Age Policy: The venue is restricted to guests aged 21 years and above. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required for group reservations of 5 guests and above. A cancellation/no-show fee of AED 85 per guest applies.

Minimum Spend Policy: Every Friday and Saturday, AED 250 per guest.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: 1 OAK
activities.address: JW Marriott Marquis Hotel, Business Bay
activities.timing_content:
Club: Tuesday, Thursday, Friday, and Saturday 11 PM until late

Terrace: Daily 9 PM - 3 AM
activities.information:
1 OAK, born out of the catchphrase “one of a kind”, hails from the iconic New York-style clubbing experience. It is spread over two floors, with separate gendered facilities and treatment rooms for ultimate privacy and relaxation.

  • Number of Treatment Rooms: 30
  • Facilities: Snow rooms, thalassotherapy pools, relaxation lounges, saunas, steam rooms, adventure showers, outdoor cabanas.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.timing_content: Daily 11 AM - 8 PM

  • Facilities: Hammam, steam rooms, saunas, and plunge pools

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

  • Number of Treatment Rooms: 7 
  • Facilities: Hammam, indoor pool, vitality pool, sauna, aroma steam rooms, rainforest showers, fitness center, Italian barbershop, and salon.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

The spa is set over two floors with separate gender-specific facilities and amenities to ensure total privacy and discretion. 

  • Number of Treatment Rooms: 42
  • Facilities: Saltwater infinity pool, freshwater pool, swim-up bar, jacuzzies, steam rooms, saunas, and a fitness center

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

activities.name: Anantara Al Yamm Villa Sir Bani Yas Island
activities.address: Anantara Al Yamm Villa Sir Bani Yas Island
activities.information:
Anantara Al Yamm is an all-villa retreat on Sir Bani Yas Island – approximately 3.5 hours drive from Dubai on an island off the coast of Abu Dhabi. 

This resort is a former private retreat of Sheikh Zayed. It offers a unique opportunity to experience nature, as it serves as a wildlife sanctuary and reserve boasting over 13,000 animals, including Arabian oryx, cheetahs, and giraffes. 

Guests can enjoy secluded villas and a stretch of private beach with a relaxing pool overlooking the Arabian Gulf. Other activities include kayaking, horse riding, and snorkeling.

  • Number of Villas: 30 Villas
  • Food & Beverage: 3 restaurants/bars/lounges 
  • Facilities: Pool, spa, and fitness center. Guests receive complimentary access to the facilities of sister resorts Desert Islands and Al Sahel 
  • Our Favorite Thing: Gaze out towards the mangroves and the surrounding sea or relax by the pool

activities.name: Anantara Qasr Al Sarab Desert Resort
activities.address: Anantara Qasr Al Sarab Desert Resort
activities.information:
Anantara Qasr Al Sarab Desert Resort is located within the world’s largest continuous sand desert, a 3-hour drive from Dubai.

Voted “The most instagrammable hotel in the world”, this hidden oasis offers its guests a truly unique desert experience.

Enjoy a variety of exciting desert adventures such as a Bedouin overnight camping experience, camel trekking, and dune bashing.

  • Number of rooms/suites/villas: 140 rooms, 14 suites and 52 pool villas
  • Eating & drinking: 6 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Outdoor pool, spa, fitness center, tennis court, kids club 
  • Our Favorite Thing: An authentic desert experience with total seclusion and privacy

activities.name: Emirates Palace Mandarin Oriental, Abu Dhabi
activities.information:
Located on a pristine private beach, Emirates Palace Mandarin Oriental Abu Dhabi is one of the city’s most famous hotels and includes Michelin star dining, an award-winning spa, and premium wedding facilities. 

Decorated with gold, pearl, marble, and over 1,000 premium Swarovski chandeliers, the main palace stretches over 1 kilometer from wing to wing, offering lavish rooms with a 24-hour butler service available. Guests can enjoy a 1.5 kilometer stretch of private beach and marina.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 394 rooms and suites
  • Food & Beverage: 10 restaurants, including the award-winning Chinese fine dining restaurant Hakkasan
  • Facilities: Two temperature-controlled swimming pools, a kids' club, private beach and marina, a lavish spa and fitness center, and cinema
  • Our Favorite Thing: The new Hideaway Spa

activities.name: Ritz Carlton Ras Al Khaimah, Al Wadi Desert
activities.address: Ritz Carlton Al Wadi Desert Resort
activities.information:
The Ritz-Carlton Ras Al Khaimah Al Wadi Desert Resort is located inside the 1,235-acre-protected Al Wadi Nature Reserve, approximately a 1-hour drive from Dubai. 

Guests can relax in luxurious Bedouin-styled villas with a private pool and magnificent desert views. 

There are plenty of exciting activities to enjoy, such as horseback riding, nature drives, falcon shows, and night walks.

  • Number of Villas: 101
  • Food & Beverage: 6 restaurants/bars/lounges 
  • Facilities: 2 pools, spa, fitness center, equestrian center
  • Our Favorite Thing: A luxurious camping experience

activities.name: Zaya Nurai Island
activities.information:
Zaya Nurai Island is located right off the shores of Abu Dhabi, about a 90-minute trip from Downtown Dubai. 

Also known as “The Maldives of the Middle East”, this private island resort offers an oceanside spa, a beach club, and great dining options. 

Guests can choose from a selection of premium luxury villas, all with their own private tempered pool and panoramic windows overlooking the Arabian Gulf. 

  • Number of villas: 32
  • Food & beverage: 5 restaurants/bars/lounges 
  • Facilities: Private beach, pool, spa, fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: The seclusion
