activities.name: Al Maha Desert Resort & Spa
activities.information:
Al Maha Desert Resort & Spa offers an exclusive eco-friendly-certified retreat nestled within the Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve. 

Each Bedouin-inspired suite is equipped with temperature-controlled private swimming pools operated by solar panels, saving up to 220,000 kilowatts every month. Suites are adorned with handcrafted furnishings and antiques whilst surrounded by flora and wildlife in their natural habitat.

The oryx and other wildlife species have been reintroduced to the area under the conservation programme, where the resort plays an integral part in protecting the ecology of the desert. 

Enjoy the ultimate desert experience with plenty of activities to take part in, including archery, nature walks, desert drives, wildlife safaris, falconry, horse riding, camel trekking, and a private desert dining experience.

  • Number of Villas: 42 individual suites    
  • Food & Beverage: 2 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Outdoor pool, fitness center, spa and wellness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Private pools in each suite
activities.pricing_content:
Al Maha Desert Resort & Spa offers an exclusive eco-friendly-certified retreat nestled within the Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve. 

Each Bedouin-inspired suite is equipped with temperature-controlled private swimming pools operated by solar panels, saving up to 220,000 kilowatts every month. Suites are adorned with handcrafted furnishings and antiques whilst surrounded by flora and wildlife in their natural habitat.

The oryx and other wildlife species have been reintroduced to the area under the conservation programme, where the resort plays an integral part in protecting the ecology of the desert. 

Enjoy the ultimate desert experience with plenty of activities to take part in, including archery, nature walks, desert drives, wildlife safaris, falconry, horse riding, camel trekking, and a private desert dining experience.

  • Number of Villas: 42 individual suites    
  • Food & Beverage: 2 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Outdoor pool, fitness center, spa and wellness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Private pools in each suite

activities.name: Bab Al Shams Desert Resort & Spa
activities.information:
Bab Al Shams Desert Resort is a 5-star luxury resort designed to resemble a traditional Arabic fort, set amongst the desert dunes around Dubai.

The resort features an infinity pool overlooking the desert. Courtyards with fountains, gardens, and stone alleyways pave the way for tastefully decorated Arabic-style guest rooms, inviting you to relax as you soak up the scenic views from your desert hideaway.

Guests can explore the surrounding desert by jeep, horse, or camel. Other on-site activities offered include archery, falconry, and croquet.

  • Number of rooms/villas: 115
  • Food & beverage: 4 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: 3 outdoor pools, Satori Spa, fitness center, Sinbad’s Kids Club
  • Our Favorite Thing: Private dinner in the desert experience

activities.name: Ritz Carlton Ras Al Khaimah Al Hamra Beach
activities.information:
The Ritz-Carlton Ras Al Khaimah, Al Hamra Beach boasts 32 private tent villas facing the sea, each with their own private pool.

Located on a private stretch of white sandy beach in Al Jazirah Al Hamra, experience a scenic boat trip upon arrival to the resort. The luxurious tented villas are inspired by Arabic architecture, featuring an infinity pool with direct beach access. 

  • Number of rooms & villas: 32 private villas          
  • Food & beverage: 1 restaurant/bar/lounge
  • Facilities: Private pool, spa and wellness center, private beach, fitness center, and kids club
  • Our favorite thing: The luxurious tent villas are designed for ultimate privacy and comfort

activities.name: The Oberoi Beach Resort, Al Zorah
activities.information:
The Oberoi Beach Resort Al Zorah Ajman is a sea-facing contemporary resort featuring panoramic ocean views with a private stretch of beach.

The spacious rooms and suites provide private terraces and modern décor, while the villas have private, temperature-controlled pools.

Guests can enjoy chic indoor and al fresco restaurants with sweeping ocean views. 

  • Number of rooms/villas: 89       
  • Eating & drinking: 5 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, spa and wellness
activities.pricing_content:
The Oberoi Beach Resort Al Zorah Ajman is a sea-facing contemporary resort featuring panoramic ocean views with a private stretch of beach.

The spacious rooms and suites provide private terraces and modern décor, while the villas have private, temperature-controlled pools.

Guests can enjoy chic indoor and al fresco restaurants with sweeping ocean views. 

  • Number of rooms/villas: 89       
  • Eating & drinking: 5 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, spa and wellness

activities.name: Waldorf Astoria Ras Al Khaimah
activities.information:
Waldorf Astoria Ras Al Khaimah is a 5-star luxury beach resort in the Emirate of Ras Al Khaimah, about an hour’s drive from Dubai.

Inspired by the palaces of the Arabian Peninsula, the generous rooms provide ocean or golf course views.

Guests can enjoy 350 meters of private beach and access to an 18-hole golf course.

  • Number of rooms/suites: 346    
  • Eating & drinking:10 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Outdoor pools, spa, fitness center, tennis courts, golf course, kids club 
  • Our Favorite Thing: The adults-only pool on the beach
activities.pricing_content:
Waldorf Astoria Ras Al Khaimah is a 5-star luxury beach resort in the Emirate of Ras Al Khaimah, about an hour’s drive from Dubai.

Inspired by the palaces of the Arabian Peninsula, the generous rooms provide ocean or golf course views.

Guests can enjoy 350 meters of private beach and access to an 18-hole golf course.

  • Eating & drinking:10 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Outdoor pools, spa, fitness center, tennis courts, golf course, kids club 
  • Our Favorite Thing: The adults-only pool on the beach

activities.name: Rove City Centre
activities.information:
Rove City Centre is a modern and funky hotel located in Deira, providing easy access to Dubai International Airport and the cultural experience of nearby Dubai Creek.

Zip across the creek by Abra boat and discover the city’s rich history and museums. 

Rove City Centre is a 5-minute drive from Dubai International Airport and The Dubai Mall.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 270 rooms 
  • Food & beverage: 2 restaurants/bars
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, 24-hour fitness center 
  • Our Favorite Thing: Budget-friendly modern accommodation
activities.pricing_content:
Rove City Centre is a modern and funky hotel located in Deira, providing easy access to Dubai International Airport and the cultural experience of nearby Dubai Creek.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 270 rooms

activities.name: Rove Dubai Marina
activities.information:
Rove Dubai Marina is a trendy hotel for leisure travelers, located in the popular neighborhood of Dubai Marina.

The hotel is surrounded by stunning high-rise buildings and is within walking distance of Jumeirah Beach and Marina Mall, as well as a short drive from Palm Jumeirah.

Dubai Marina Walk is only a few steps away, offering a wide variety of restaurants, cafes, and shops to enjoy.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 384 rooms 
  • Food & beverage: 2 restaurants/bars
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool and fitness center 
  • Our Favorite Thing: Prime location in Dubai Marina
activities.pricing_content:
Rove Dubai Marina is a trendy hotel for leisure travelers, located in the popular neighborhood of Dubai Marina.

The hotel is surrounded by stunning high-rise buildings and is within walking distance of Jumeirah Beach and Marina Mall, as well as a short drive from Palm Jumeirah.

Dubai Marina Walk is only a few steps away, offering a wide variety of restaurants, cafes, and shops to enjoy.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 384 rooms 
  • Food & beverage: 2 restaurants/bars
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool and fitness center 
  • Our Favorite Thing: Prime location in Dubai Marina

activities.name: Rove Downtown
activities.information:
Rove Downtown is the first Rove property built in 2016. It is a contemporary hotel in the heart of Downtown Dubai.


Situated adjacent to Burj Khalifa and Dubai Mall, Rove Downtown provides easy access for exploring the bustling Downtown district.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 420 rooms 
  • Food & beverage: 2 restaurants/bars
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, 24-hour fitness center 
  • Our favorite thing: The 46-seater Reel Cinema room
activities.pricing_content:
Rove Downtown is the first Rove property built in 2016. It is a contemporary hotel in the heart of Downtown Dubai.


Situated adjacent to Burj Khalifa and Dubai Mall, Rove Downtown provides easy access for exploring the bustling Downtown district.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 420 rooms 
  • Food & beverage: 2 restaurants/bars
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, 24-hour fitness center 
  • Our favorite thing: The 46-seater Reel Cinema room

activities.name: Rove La Mer Beach
activities.information:
Rove La Mer is situated in the popular beachfront promenade of La Mer. 

Enjoy a wide variety of retail stores, cafes, and restaurants right on your doorstep.

The fantastic property offers glistening views of the Arabian Gulf with direct beachfront access.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 366 rooms 
  • Food & beverage: 2 restaurants/bars
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool and fitness center 
  • Our Favorite Thing: The beachfront location next to La Mer

activities.name: Rove Healthcare City
activities.information:
Rove Healthcare City provides a contemporary and seamless stay in Healthcare City.

The prestigious Dubai American Hospital is just across the street from the hotel. Rove Healthcare City features modern interiors and furniture with culturally informed art.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 286 rooms 
  • Food & Beverage: 2 restaurants/bars
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool and fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Close proximity to Dubai American Hospital and Downtown Dubai

activities.name: Rove City Walk
activities.information:
Rove City Walk is a contemporary hotel operated by the award-winning Rove Hotels. The hotel’s design is seamless and contemporary, featuring spacious rooms with an array of amenities for the modern traveler, including a convenient safe, and modern bathrooms with power rain showers. 

Rove City Walk is only 15 minutes from the Dubai International Airport and within walking distance to Coca-Cola Arena.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 560
  • Food & Beverage: 2 restaurant/cafe
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool and fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: The convenient location and proximity to Downtown

activities.name: Lemon Tree Hotel Dubai
activities.information:
Located on Al Wasl Road Jumeirah, Lemon Tree Hotel is strategically situated close to many famous tourist destinations. The Palm Jumeirah, Dubai Marina, The Walk JBR, and Souk Madinat Jumeirah are all easily accessible from the hotel. 

Lemon Tree Hotel offers a seamless service, featuring contemporary interiors and well-appointed rooms, along with a multi-cuisine coffee shop, complemented by a chic al fresco lounge.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 144
  • Food & beverage: Lemon Tree Café
  • Facilities: Rooftop pool and fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: The hotel has a picturesque and refreshing rooftop swimming pool with panoramic views
activities.pricing_content:
Located on Al Wasl Road Jumeirah, Lemon Tree Hotel is strategically situated close to many famous tourist destinations. The Palm Jumeirah, Dubai Marina, The Walk JBR, and Souk Madinat Jumeirah are all easily accessible from the hotel. 

Lemon Tree Hotel offers a seamless service, featuring contemporary interiors and well-appointed rooms, along with a multi-cuisine coffee shop, complemented by a chic al fresco lounge.

  • Food & beverage: Lemon Tree Café
  • Facilities: Rooftop pool and fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: The hotel has a picturesque and refreshing rooftop swimming pool with panoramic views

activities.name: Rove Trade Centre
activities.information:
Rove Trade Centre offers the perfect location for leisure and business guests alike. Rove Trade Centre is located adjacent to Dubai World Trade Centre and is just 10 minutes from Downtown Dubai, The Dubai Mall, and Burj Khalifa.

This hotel offers spacious rooms and modern furnishings, and there’s a free ice machine on every room floor.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 270 rooms
  • Food & beverage: 1 Restaurant
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, 24-hour fitness center, 24-hour convenience store
  • Our Favorite Thing: The central location and proximity to Downtown Dubai
activities.pricing_content:
Rove Trade Centre offers the perfect location for leisure and business guests alike. Rove Trade Centre is located adjacent to Dubai World Trade Centre and is just 10 minutes from Downtown Dubai, The Dubai Mall, and Burj Khalifa.

This hotel offers spacious rooms and modern furnishings, and there’s a free ice machine on every room floor.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 270 rooms
  • Food & beverage: 1 Restaurant
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, 24-hour fitness center, 24-hour convenience store
  • Our Favorite Thing: The central location and proximity to Downtown Dubai

activities.name: Rove Expo 2020
activities.information:
Rove Expo 2020 Hotel is the only on-site hotel at Expo 2020, offering spacious king rooms, twin rooms, and suites, which include 100% sustainable in-room amenities. Enjoy plenty of dining options, a rooftop swimming pool, and a sundeck overlooking the Al Wasl Plaza.

Rove Expo 2020 will remain a permanent modern hospitality offering at District 2020.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 312 Rooms + 19 Suites
  • Food & beverage: 4 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Rooftop swimming pool, 24-hour fitness center

  • Number of rooms & suites: 312 Rooms + 19 Suites
  • Food & beverage: 4 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Rooftop swimming pool, 24-hour fitness center

activities.name: Hampton by Hilton Dubai Al Seef
activities.information:
Hampton by Hilton Dubai Al Seef is situated along Dubai Creek and surrounded by consulates, restaurants, and shops. It is perfectly suited for exploring the historic and cultural sites of the city. Nearby activities are great for families, including the Museum of Illusions, a fun and immersive experience for all ages.

Rooms feature views of the city or courtyard, WiFi, and a smart satellite TV. There is also a work desk and tea and coffee-making facilities. The bathrooms provide a shower and complimentary organic toiletries.

Guests can enjoy the outdoor pool and state-of-the-art fitness center, including free breakfast.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 150 
  • Food & beverage: 2 restaurants
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool and fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Great location to explore Dubai Creek in Al Seef
activities.pricing_content:
Hampton by Hilton Dubai Al Seef is situated along Dubai Creek and surrounded by consulates, restaurants, and shops. It is perfectly suited for exploring the historic and cultural sites of the city. Nearby activities are great for families, including the Museum of Illusions, a fun and immersive experience for all ages.

Rooms feature views of the city or courtyard, WiFi, and a smart satellite TV. There is also a work desk and tea and coffee-making facilities. The bathrooms provide a shower and complimentary organic toiletries.

Guests can enjoy the outdoor pool and state-of-the-art fitness center, including free breakfast.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 150 
  • Food & beverage: 2 restaurants
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool and fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Great location to explore Dubai Creek in Al Seef

activities.name: Address Beach Resort
activities.information:
Situated in the heart of Jumeirah Beach Residence, Address Beach Resort is the first beachfront property from the luxury lifestyle brand Address Hotels & Resorts.

Guests can enjoy panoramic ocean views of the Arabian Gulf, Palm Jumeirah, and Ain Dubai. Address Beach Resort offers 100 meters of prime beachfront access, with close proximity to Ain Dubai and Dubai Marina.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 217
  • Food & Beverage: 8 restaurants/bars
  • Facilities: 4 outdoor pools, spa, fitness center, private beach
  • Our Favorite Thing: The highest rooftop infinity pool in the world

activities.name: The St. Regis Dubai The Palm
activities.information:
Experience world-class service at St.Regis Dubai The Palm. Set on the iconic Palm Jumeirah, this 5-star hotel occupies the first 18 floors of the 52-storey luxury Palm Towers, which provides direct access to Nakheel Mall, Palm Monorail, and the observation deck The View Palm. 

All suites boast floor-to-ceiling windows with views of Palm Jumeirah, the Arabian Gulf, and the city skyline.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 264 rooms & 26 suites
  • Food & Beverage: 4 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: 2 Pools, St.Regis Spa, Fitness Center, The View Palm
  • Our Favorite Thing: 24-hour personalized St. Regis Butler Service

activities.name: SLS Dubai Hotel & Residences
activities.information:
Born out of Los Angeles and Miami, SLS Dubai is a striking landmark in the Downtown District, designed by award-winning architects Aedas and interior designer Paul Bishop. 

You’ll find two rooftop infinity pools on the 75th floor, offering incomparable 360-degree views of Dubai. 

SLS Dubai also features world-renowned signature culinary concepts such as Fi’lia, S Bar mixology lounge, contemporary steakhouse Carna by Dario Cecchini, and the exciting rooftop venue Privilege.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 254 hotel rooms
  • Food & Beverage: 6 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: 3 Pools, Fitness Center, Ciel Spa
  • Our Favorite Thing: One of the best views from rooftop pools in Dubai

activities.name: Crowne Plaza Dubai Jumeirah
activities.information:
Centrally located in the heart of Jumeirah 1, Crowne Plaza Dubai Jumeirah features a rooftop pool with views of the city skyline.

Crowne Plaza Dubai Jumeirah offers an extensive culinary selection, from Mediterranean to Asian cuisine, as well as a pool bar, on-site spa, and a fully-equipped gym. Guests can also enjoy the free shuttle service to Dubai’s shopping malls and Jumeirah Beach.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 252 
  • Food & Beverage: 6 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Outdoor pool, fitness center, spa & wellness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: The rooftop pool with views of Burj Khalifa

activities.name: The Dubai EDITION
activities.information:
Highly anticipated The Dubai EDITION has recently opened in the heart of the bustling Downtown Dubai district. The stylish boutique hotel features 275 contemporary guest rooms and suites, with a chic infinity pool and front-row Burj Khalifa views.

Designed with LW Design Group, restaurants include Jolie, serving French-inspired food, and Duomo, a unique Italian dining experience showcasing a digital art show.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 275
  • Food & Beverage: 4 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Outdoor pool, spa, and fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Located on the 23rd floor is Inti, a Peruvian-Nikkei restaurant

activities.name: Hyde Hotel Dubai
activities.information:
Hyde Hotel Dubai, situated in Business Bay, is the first Hyde hotel outside the US. Chic guest rooms and suites are designed by Ciarmoli Queda, with private balconies offering spectacular city and Burj Khalifa views.

Hyde Hotel Dubai features three incredible culinary experiences, including The Perq, Hyde pool & lounge,  Mediterranean restaurant Cleo, contemporary Japanese restaurant Katsuya, and hand-crafted burgers from Hudson Tavern.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 276 hotel rooms
  • Food & Beverage: 5 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Pool, Fitness Center, Cinq Mondes Dubai Spa
  • Our Favorite Thing: Hyde Pool & Lounge

activities.name: W Dubai Mina Seyahi
activities.information:
The newly opened W Dubai Mina Seyahi is a 31-storey, five-star hotel located in the heart of Dubai Marina. Wet Deck at Ginger Moon features a breathtaking infinity pool overlooking Palm Jumeirah and Ain Dubai, and it plays host to lots of live entertainment. 

Ginger Moon is described as a ‘no beach, beach club’ experience, with a boho-inspired restaurant serving artisan breakfast, lunch, and dinner. The hotel showcases elegant and modern designed rooms with gray marble bathrooms, wooden furniture, and ambient lighting.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 318 rooms & suites
  • Food & Beverage: 5 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: Fitness center, beachfront, 1 swimming pool, spa
  • Our Favorite Thing: The rooftop pool overlooking Palm Jumeirah and Ain Dubai

activities.name: Taj Exotica Resort & Spa The Palm
activities.information:
Taj Exotica Resort & Spa brings a unique experience to the United Arab Emirates. It is situated on the East Crescent of the iconic Palm Jumeirah and provides luxury and modern accommodation. Guest rooms offer resort views, sea-facing balconies, spacious rooms, suites with jacuzzi, and a presidential suite.

Enjoy 230 meters of private beach with airy cabanas, as well as holistic wellness experiences, advanced sporting facilities, or sundowners beside the Palm’s longest pool. 

Unwind at the award-winning Jiva Spa, where guests can enjoy the options of Ayurvedic treatments, invigorating massages, and couple’s therapy, enhanced by gold-infused oils and eco-friendly herb-dyed linen. Gastronomy includes British and Indian cuisine, featuring a chic bar and lounge with scenic ocean views. 

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 258 rooms and 67 suites
  • Food & Beverage: 5 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: Fitness center, tennis court, beachfront, 1 swimming pool, spa
  • Our Favorite Thing: The longest swimming pool on Palm Jumeirah

activities.name: Hyatt Centric Jumeirah
activities.information:
Situated next to La Mer Beach, Hyatt Centric Jumeirah Dubai features 173 stylish guest rooms with contemporary furnishing, sleek finishes, ample amenities, and magnificent sea and city skyline views.

Enjoy an outdoor swimming pool and a dedicated beach area, especially for Hyatt Centric guests at La Mer beach, just a 5-minute walk from the hotel. The area is equipped with sun beds, towels, umbrellas, and water. The 5-star hotel offers magnificent views of the ocean and downtown Dubai, a 24-hour front desk, room service, and currency exchange for guests.

La Mer in Jumeirah 1 is a world-class beachfront in Dubai that incorporates a minimalist and contemporary design with boutique stores, eclectic restaurants and cafés, and a vibrant nightlife along 2.5 kilometers of relaxing white sand.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 173 rooms & suites
  • Food & Beverage: 1 restaurant
  • Facilities: Fitness center,1 swimming pool, spa and wellness center, beach access
  • Our Favorite Thing: The close proximity to La Mer Beach

activities.name: Anantara World Islands Dubai Resort
activities.information:
Discover a unique destination on Dubai’s World Islands at Anantara World Islands Dubai Resort. It is the first luxury resort on the island and is only a 15-minute speedboat ride from Anantara the Palm. 

Located on its own island just four kilometers into the Arabian Gulf, guests can enjoy sweeping views from the Burj Khalifa to the Burj Al Arab, for a new perspective on world class.

Relax in well-appointed suites or villas, private plunge pools, and a contemporary island design with subtle tones. 

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 70 rooms, suites, and villas
  • Food & Beverage: 4 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Beach access, swimming pool, fitness center, spa and wellness center, children's playground
  • Our Favorite Thing: HamacLand – a bespoke floating dining concept for breakfast or lunch with a panoramic ocean view.

activities.name: 25hours Hotel One Central
activities.information:
25hours Hotel One Central is conveniently located near the bustling Dubai International Financial Centre and Dubai World Trade Centre, overlooking The Museum of the Future.

Rooms and suites are cozy and well-designed for comfort and practicality. Features include modern tech, 5-meter-high ceilings, and large windows so you can enjoy the breathtaking views. Guests have access to a co-working space, open pantry, and coffee bar at the gallery on the first floor. Five characterful restaurants and bars take guests on a culinary trip around the world.

With a bright, airy, industrial feel, this hotel provides the perfect setting for creative thinking, productive discussions, or special occasions. 

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 434 rooms and suites
  • Food & Beverage: 5 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, fitness center, spa and wellness center, ladies salon, pottery studio, and games room
  • Our Favorite Thing: The outdoor pool overlooking The Museum of the Future

activities.name: Raffles The Palm Dubai
activities.information:
The new Raffles The Palm Dubai is a retreat inspired by the Renaissance and Baroque eras, offering the ultimate palatial experience, decorated with over 6,000 Swarovski Crystal chandeliers.

Spanning across the famous beachfront of Palm Jumeirah, guests can relax on 500 meters of private beach, temperature-controlled outdoor pools, and lush landscaped gardens. Culinary options include Mediterranean, Japanese, and the beachside Italian restaurant Piatti, with a muted all-white theme to transport you straight to the Amalfi coast. 

This resort is perfect for couples, families, friends, and even large family gatherings.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 389 guest rooms, suites, and villas
  • Food & Beverage: 8 restaurants and bars, beach club
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, award-winning Parisian Cinq Mondes Spa, fitness center, yoga studio, private beach, in-house cinema, watersports facilities, and dedicated kids and teens club
  • Our Favorite Thing: The hotel’s famous 24-hour butler service.

activities.name: Radisson Beach Resort Palm Jumeirah
activities.information:
Located along the vibrant Palm West Beach, Radisson Beach Resort Palm Jumeirah provides contemporary guest rooms and suites featuring beautiful views of the Arabian Gulf, each with floor-to-ceiling windows for plenty of daylight and your own private balcony.


Discover excellent services and amenities from a beautiful private beachfront with sun loungers to on-site restaurants, bars, and lounges. Unwind at two outdoor pools, or spend a refreshing afternoon at the health club and rejuvenating spa. Radisson Beach Resort has everything you need to relax and enjoy your stay.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 389 contemporary rooms & suites
  • Food & Beverage: 5 restaurants, bars, lounges
  • Facilities: 2 outdoor pools, private beach, spa, fitness center, health club, and outdoor kid’s pool
  • Our Favorite Thing: Visit Tonino Lamborghini, a luxurious Mediterranean venue located on the rooftop.

activities.name: Hilton Dubai Palm Jumeirah
activities.information:
Located on Palm West Beach on the exclusive Palm Jumeirah, this luxury beachfront resort boasts 10 bars & restaurants, a private beach, eforea spa, ocean-view pool, and much more. 

All 608 rooms have balconies or terraces to take in breathtaking views of the Arabian Gulf & glittering Dubai Marina skyline. Located at the entrance of the Palm Jumeirah, guests have easy access to the heart of Dubai, with The Walk at JBR located 3.4 km away and Aquaventure Waterpark 4 km away.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 608 trendy rooms & suites
  • Food & Beverage: 9 restaurants, bars, lounges
  • Facilities: Outdoor pool, private beach, spa, fitness center, kids club 
  • Our Favorite Thing: Located on the vibrant Palm West Beac

activities.name: Paramount Midtown Dubai
activities.information:
Set in Dubai, 1.4 km from Burj Khalifa, Paramount Hotel Midtown offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can use the indoor pool and the sauna, or enjoy city views.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 281 contemporary rooms & suites
  • Food & Beverage: 5 restaurants
  • Facilities: Kids club, spa facilities, salon, rooftop pool, fitness center 
  • Our Favorite Thing: The rooftop pool on the 68th floor

activities.name: Th8 Palm Hotel
activities.information:
Th8 Palm by House Of Originals provides accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool, and a fitness center. This 5-star resort offers a 24-hour front desk, room service, and free WiFi. The resort also has a garden and features a children's playground.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 161 boutique rooms & suites
  • Food & Beverage: 3 restaurants, bars, lounges
  • Facilities: Pool, beach club, spa, beachfront, gym, basketball court, kids play area 
  • Our Favorite Thing: Fluid Beach Club

activities.name: Ramee Dream Hotel Downtown
activities.information:
Featuring a fitness center, bar, and views of the city, Ramee Dream Hotel Downtown is located in Dubai, a 17-minute walk from The Dubai Fountain. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi. 

Dubai Mall is a 19-minute walk from the accommodation, while Burj Khalifa is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Dubai International, 14 km from Ramee Dream Hotel Downtown, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

  • ﻿Number of Rooms & Suites: 182 guest rooms and suites
  • Food & Beverage: 5 restaurants
  • Facilities: Pool, spa, fitness center, billiards, nightclub, sports bar
  • Our Favorite Thing: The popular tropical jungle restaurant and lounge Cavo

activities.name: Vida Dubai Marina
activities.information:
Situated in the heart of Dubai Marina along the idyllic waterfront promenade, Vida Dubai Marina & Yacht Club is at the center of the city’s very best culinary experiences and amazing nightlife.

Vida Dubai Marina & Yacht Club offers contemporary rooms with deluxe city-view rooms and executive Marina-view suites. Exceptional amenities include a state-of-the-art business center, social dining options, bespoke wellness experiences, and an outdoor infinity pool. You’re also only a short walk away from Dubai Marina Mall, JBR Beach, and Bluewaters Island. 

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 158 rooms and suites
  • Food & Beverage: All-day dining at Origins, as well as coffee shop and cafe at Stage 2, and a pool bar
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool and fitness center, 24-hour front desk, and currency exchange for guests.
  • Our Favorite Thing: Cycle around Dubai Marina and the surrounding areas using their complimentary bikes

activities.name: Marriott Palm West Beach
activities.information:
Located along the beachfront of the iconic Palm Jumeirah, the first Marriott Resort in Dubai caters to leisure seekers and business travelers. Guest rooms offer private balconies, 24-hour room service, and stunning sea views. Luxury amenities include the resort’s beachside pool, private beach area, fitness center, and the relaxing Saray Spa.

Popular beachfront promenade Palm West Beach is only steps away, where guests can relax on the beach, swim, enjoy water sports, and explore the restaurants along the promenade.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 608 guest rooms and suites
  • Food & Beverage: 10 restaurants which include Korean, Italian, Japanese and Mexican cuisines.
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, private beach area, fitness center, Saray Spa, and Kids Club
  • Our Favorite Thing: Located on Palm West Beach, a popular beachfront promenade

activities.name: Address Grand Creek Harbour
activities.information:
The Address Grand Creek Harbour is spread across two towers of 53 and 65 floors each, consisting of 223 hotel rooms and suites along with 794 serviced apartments.

The towers are connected by an observation bridge designed by the Spanish architect Santiago Calatrava. The hotel is directly connected to a waterfront promenade offering a range of entertainment, retail, and restaurants. Wellness and fitness offerings at the hotel include a spa, fitness center, and infinity pool.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 223 rooms and suites, 794 serviced apartments
  • Food & Beverage: The Restaurant, Cigar Lounge, Patisserie café, and Luma Pool Lounge 
  • Facilities: Spa, fitness center, infinity pool, 24-hour front desk, Qix Club, Qix Teens, Kids Pool, and Splash Pad for families with children.
  • Our Favorite Thing: Selected rooms include views of the Dubai skyline

activities.name: Atlantis The Royal
activities.information:
Atlantis The Royal will forever change the landscape of Dubai. Created by the world’s leading designers, architects, and artists, this ultra-luxury destination offers infinite ocean views, lush gardens, dramatic architecture, and contemporary rooms totaling 43 storeys. It also boasts a 90-meter rooftop sky pool.

Sitting beside the original Atlantis The Palm, Atlantis The Royal takes guests on a culinary journey. It is home to 17 world-class restaurants, including 8 celebrity chef restaurants. 

Amenities include a 3,000 square meter wellness center and an impressive lobby, where there are more than 2,000 ephemeral jellyfish in one of the world’s largest jellyfish tanks and one of the world’s most striking fountain performances.

All hotel rooms feature a pillow menu with high-end amenities from Hermès and Graff and complimentary access to Aquaventure waterpark.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 231 apartments and 795 hotel rooms
  • Food & Beverage: 17 world-class restaurants and bars and one leading international beach and nightclub
  • Facilities: 2.3 km stretch of private beach, wellness center, 4 swimming pools, 24-hour butler service, currency exchange, Skyblaze Fountain, and Aquaventure Waterpark 
  • Our Favorite Thing: Nobu by the Beach

activities.name: NH Collection Dubai The Palm
activities.information:
NH Collection Dubai The Palm is located on The Palm Jumeirah. With top attractions right on your doorstep, the hotel is just steps from Palm West Beach, Nakheel Mall and The Pointe. 

Guest rooms feature stunning views of the city or the sea, designed with style and comfort in mind.

Enjoy the use of excellent leisure facilities, including a signature rooftop infinity pool offering inspiring views of Dubai Marina.


NH Collection Dubai provides guests with plenty of delicious dining options, serving international cuisine to suit every taste and palate.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 533 guest rooms and suites
  • Food & Beverage: Maiora, an all-day dining restaurant, sports bar, Revo Café, Té Lounge, and SEEN Restaurant & Bar, which is located on the rooftop
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, spa and fitness center, terrace
  • Our Favorite Thing: If you’re looking for a drink with a view, check out SEEN Restaurant & Bar, which is located on the rooftop.

activities.name: Voco Dubai The Palm
activities.information:
Set along the popular lifestyle destination Palm West Beach, Voco Dubai The Palm offers reasonably priced contemporary rooms overlooking the Dubai Marina skyline, Palm West Beach, and Ain Dubai.


Amenities include a 24-hour fitness facility, an outdoor rooftop infinity pool lined with loungers, and a menu of spa treatments. Pet owners will also be pleased to know that Voco Dubai The Palm will allow pets if they weigh 10 kg or less. On-site restaurant Maison Mathis serves European cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan, and dairy-free options can also be requested.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 138 contemporary rooms
  • Food & Beverage: 1 restaurant on-site – Maison Mathis serves European cuisine and pays a rich tribute to the heritage of Belgian food culture.
  • Facilities: Rooftop swimming pool, beach club, 24-hour fitness center, Neroli Spa, business center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Enjoy breathtaking views of Ain Dubai from the rooftop infinity pool

activities.name: SO-Uptown
activities.information:
Discover SO/ Uptown Dubai, a first-of-its-kind in the Middle East. Located in Uptown Dubai, next to JLT, SO/ Uptown takes up residence inside the skyscraping 340-meter Uptown Tower.

The hotel covers 10 floors with unrivalled views of Dubai's skyline, Marina, Ain Dubai, and Jumeirah Beach, alongside a range of amenities and world-class dining.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 146 rooms and 42 suites
  • Food & Beverage: 3 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Ball Room, Beauty Salon, Spa, Pool, and Fitness Center
  • Our Favorite Thing: The backdrop of stunning skyline views

activities.name: Vida Creek Beach
activities.information:
Vida Creek Beach is a boutique hotel located at Dubai Creek Harbour. Guests can indulge in a glam getaway, with chic pieces of art and stunning views of a man-made Crystal Lagoon. 

  • Number of rooms & suites: 99
  • Food & beverage: 3 restaurants
  • Facilities: Infinity Pool, Fitness Center, Co-Working Space, & Crystal Lagoon
  • Our Favorite Thing: Views of Crystal Lagoon

activities.name: The First Collection Waterfront
activities.information:
The First Collection Waterfront Hotel, nestled along the Dubai Canal in Business Bay, provides an urban retreat with seamless access to nearby attractions. Guests can enjoy a serene experience overlooking the canal and breathtaking city views.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 327
  • Food & Beverage: All-day Restaurant, Bakery, Café, Sports Bar, Rooftop Pool Bar
  • Facilities: Rooftop Pool, Fitness Central, and Spa
  • Our Favorite Thing: It boasts a chic modern design

activities.name: Five Luxe
activities.information:
Five Luxe JBR invites guests to indulge in an ultra-luxurious beachfront experience. With the globally renowned Pacha Playa Beach Club, stunning beach views, and upscale amenities, it's the ultimate destination for a lively retreat.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 231 suites & 100 opulent serviced apartments
  • Food & Beverage: Ronin, Tete A Tete, Paradiso, Goose Island Tap House, Playa Pacha
  • Facilities: Pool, gymnasium, fitness center, garden, spa, private beach, beach club and bar
  • Our Favorite Thing: Ibiza Vibes at Pacha Playa

activities.name: SIRO Hotel
activities.information:
SIRO One Za'abeel is Dubai’s first fitness & recovery hotel, located in Zaa'beel Street with captivating views of the iconic skyline. 

Guests can integrate well being into their everyday routine with sleep-optimized rooms, innovative facilities, and guidance from in-house specialists, offering a transformative synergy of science and holistic wellbeing.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 132 rooms & suites
  • Food & Beverage: La Dame De Pic, Arrazuna, Tapasake, Duangdy, Qabu, Sphere, Aelia, Sagetsu, Andaliman, Streetxo, The Garden Pool Bar
  • Facilities: fitness & recovery suites, fitness center, gym, studio lab, and spa
  • Our Favorite Thing: The state-of-the-art wellness experience

activities.name: One & Only Za'abeel
activities.information:
Nestled in the heart of the city, One&Only One Za'abeel offers guests an urban resort experience that blends luxury and culture. The hotel features Dubai's first Longevity Hub by Clinique La Prairie. 

It also features The Link, the world's longest cantilever, along with 8 restaurants and 6 Michelin-rated chefs.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 51 suites and 178 luxury rooms
  • Food & Beverage: La Dame De Pic, Arrazuna, Tapasake, Duangdy, Qabu, Sphere, Aelia, Sagetsu, Andaliman, Streetxo, The Garden Pool Bar
  • Facilities: rooftop pool, spa & wellness, fitness center, ballrooms, and bars
  • Our Favorite Thing: There are various dining options at the Link

activities.name: The Lana
activities.information:
The Lana, an ultra-luxurious retreat situated along the waterfront of Dubai Canal in the lively Business Bay area, offers guests a landmark of unparalleled luxury. With amenities such as a rooftop pool, Dior Spa, and eight new restaurants, guests can indulge in a truly luxurious experience.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 104 rooms & 121 suites 
  • Food & Beverage: Jara by Martin Berasategui, Riviera by Jean Imbert, High Society, Bonbon Café Angelo Musa, The Gallery, Veranda, Bitter Honey, Txakolina
  • Facilities: wellness spa, pool, fitness center, meeting and events facility
  • Our Favorite Thing: The ultra high-end finishing of the hotel

activities.name: Palace Dubai Creek Harbour
activities.information:
Guests can expect Arabian hospitality and Middle Eastern-inspired design at this stylish new hotel in Dubai Creek Harbour.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 122 rooms & suites
  • Food & Beverage: Al Bayt, Ewaan, and Fai Lounge
  • Facilities: Pool, fitness center, wellness spa, and restaurants
  • Our Favorite Thing: The view of Creek Beach

activities.name: InterContinental Residences Dubai Business Bay
activities.information:
Located in Business Bay, Intercontinental Hotel & Residences offers a blend of luxury and convenience with stunning views of the Burj Khalifa and Dubai Canal. Guests can enjoy urban sophistication in every detail. Just minutes from The Dubai Mall, the hotel provides a modern sanctuary perfect for business and leisure travelers alike.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 176 luxurious serviced apartments
  • Food & Beverage: Ancora, 57 Deli Café and Alto
  • Facilities: Business Centre, Fitness Centre, Outdoor Pool, Indoor Play Area, Rooftop Bar and Spa
  • Our Favorite Thing: Views of the Canal and Burj Khalifa

activities.name: Delano Hotel
activities.information:
Delano Hotel Dubai is a stunning beachfront property that combines luxury and modern design, offering guests an unforgettable experience on Bluewaters Island. With its chic interiors, world-class amenities, and exceptional dining options, Delano an ideal destination for both relaxation and entertainment.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 251
  • Food & Beverage: Tutto Passa, Blue Door, Rose Bar and the Delano Pool Bar
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, fitness center, spa and conference rooms
  • Our Favorite Thing: Secluded Location on Bluewaters Island

activities.name: Hilton Dubai Creek Hotel & Residences
activities.information:
Hilton Dubai Creek Hotel & Residences offers a blend of modern luxury and traditional charm, situated along the scenic Dubai Creek. With stylish accommodations, exceptional dining options, and stunning views, this hotel is ideal for both leisure and business travelers seeking a comfortable stay in the heart of the city.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 180
  • Food & Beverage: Hi-Bye Coffee Shop and Serein
  • Facilities: Outdoor pool, fitness center, business center and spa
  • Our Favorite Thing: Proximity to the Airport

activities.name: Marriott Marquis Dubai
activities.information:
Marriott Marquis Dubai offers a modern haven on the creek. With spacious accommodations, exceptional dining options, and state-of-the-art facilities, this hotel is ideal for both business and leisure travelers seeking to explore the rich culture of the city.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 434
  • Food & Beverage: Creek Kitchen, The Copperhead, Great Room, Pool Bar, and M Club Lounge
  • Facilities: Spa, fitness center, outdoor swimming pool, and meeting rooms
  • Our Favorite Thing: Proximity to the Airport

activities.name: Address Downtown
activities.information:
Address Downtown Dubai is an iconic award-winning hotel situated in the heart of Downtown Dubai. 

Guests can enjoy impressive views of Burj Khalifa with world-class amenities and a wide array of exceptional dining, including Turkish/Mediterranean restaurant Urla and GAL. Dubai Mall is conveniently located nearby, with direct access via a pedestrian bridge.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 220
  • Food & Beverage: 8 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: 5 pools, spa, fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Front-row Burj Khalifa views
activities.pricing_content:
Address Downtown Dubai is an iconic award-winning hotel situated in the heart of Downtown Dubai. 

Guests can enjoy impressive views of Burj Khalifa with world-class amenities and a wide array of exceptional dining, including Turkish/Mediterranean restaurant Urla and GAL. Dubai Mall is conveniently located nearby, with direct access via a pedestrian bridge.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 220
  • Food & Beverage: 8 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: 5 pools, spa, fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Front-row Burj Khalifa views

activities.name: Armani Hotel Dubai
activities.information:
The exclusive Armani Hotel Dubai is situated in Burj Khalifa, the world’s tallest skyscraper.

It is one of only two Armani branded hotels in the world. The world-famous fashion designer Giorgio Armani oversaw all aspects of the hotel’s design, creating a world of minimalist elegance in the heart of Dubai.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 160
  • Food & Beverage: 7 restaurants/bars 
  • Facilities: 2 pools, spa, fitness center, nightclub
  • Our Favorite Thing: Front-row views of the dancing fountain show from your suite

activities.name: Kempinski the Boulevard
activities.information:
Kempinski the Boulevard offers a sophisticated city retreat in the heart of Downtown Dubai. 

The hotel features Burj Khalifa views, plus three infinity pools and premium spa facilities to help you unwind. There is also direct access to Dubai Mall through an indoor air-conditioned walkway.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 196
  • Food & Beverage: 2 restaurants/lounges
  • Facilities: 3 pools, fitness center, spa
  • Our Favorite Thing: It’s in a prime location – right in the heart of Downtown
activities.pricing_content:
Address Boulevard is a sophisticated city retreat in the heart of Downtown.

The Address Boulevard features Burj Khalifa views, three great pools and premium spa facilities with direct access to Dubai Mall. 

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 196
  • Food & Beverage: 2 restaurants/lounges
  • Facilities: 3 pools, fitness centre, spa
  • Our Favourite Thing: The resort-like atmosphere Downtown

activities.name: Address Sky View
activities.information:
Address Sky View is one of the latest additions to a growing list of iconic landmarks in Dubai. 

This elegant hotel features exquisite furnishings with superior comfort. It also boasts one of the best rooftop infinity pools in Dubai, alongside plenty of dining and entertainment options

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 169
  • Food & Beverage: 5 restaurants/bars 
  • Facilities: 2 pools, spa, fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: The rooftop restaurant and lounge Cé La Vi
activities.pricing_content:
Address Sky View is one of the latest additions to a growing list of iconic landmarks in Dubai. 

This elegant hotel features exquisite furnishings and superior comfort while boasting one of the best rooftop infinity pools in Dubai.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 169
  • Food & Beverage: 5 restaurants/bars 
  • Facilities: 2 pools, spa, fitness centre
  • Our Favourite Thing: The rooftop restaurant and lounge Cé La Vi

activities.name: Address Dubai Mall
activities.information:
Address Dubai Mall features three towers with opulent rooms and suites, attractively located in the bustling Downtown Dubai district. Guests have front-row Burj Khalifa views and direct access to Dubai Mall.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 788 
  • Food & Beverage: 4 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: 3 swimming pools, fitness center, spa
  • Our Favorite Thing: The Spa at Address Dubai Mall
activities.pricing_content:
Address Dubai Mall features three towers with opulent rooms and suites, attractively located in the bustling Downtown Dubai district. Guests have front-row Burj Khalifa views and direct access to Dubai Mall.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 788 
  • Food & Beverage: 4 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: 3 swimming pools, fitness center, spa
  • Our Favorite Thing: The Spa at Address Dubai Mall

activities.name: SLS Dubai Hotel & Residences
activities.information:
SLS Dubai is a striking landmark in the Downtown District, designed by award-winning architects Aedas and interior designer Paul Bishop. Two rooftop infinity pools are situated on the 75th floor, offering incomparable 360-degree views of Dubai. 

SLS Dubai also features signature dining concepts and an exciting rooftop venue (Privilege).

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 254 hotel rooms and suites
  • Food & Beverage: 6 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: 3 Pools, Fitness Center, Ciel Spa
  • Our Favorite Thing: One of the highest rooftop pools in Dubai
activities.pricing_content:
SLS Dubai is a striking landmark in the Downtown District, designed by award-winning architects Aedas and interior designer Paul Bishop. Two rooftop infinity pools are situated on the 75th floor, offering incomparable 360-degree views of Dubai. 

SLS Dubai also features signature dining concepts and an exciting rooftop venue (Privilege).

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 254 hotel rooms and suites
  • Food & Beverage: 6 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: 3 Pools, Fitness Center, Ciel Spa
  • Our Favorite Thing: One of the highest rooftop pools in Dubai

activities.name: The St. Regis Dubai The Palm
activities.information:
Experience sophistication at its finest at St. Regis The Palm, situated on the iconic Palm Jumeirah. The 5-star hotel occupies the first 18 floors of the 52-storey Palm Towers building, with direct access to Nakheel Mall, Palm Monorail, and The View Palm observation deck. 

All suites boast floor-to-ceiling windows with expansive sea views overlooking the city skyline.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 264 rooms & 26 suites
  • Food & Beverage: 5 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: 2 pools, spa, fitness center, The View Palm, 24-hour butler service 
  • Our Favorite Thing: CouCou Rooftop Lounge
activities.pricing_content:
Experience sophistication at its finest at St. Regis The Palm, situated on the iconic Palm Jumeirah. The 5-star hotel occupies the first 18 floors of the 52-storey Palm Towers building, with direct access to Nakheel Mall, Palm Monorail, and The View Palm observation deck. 

All suites boast floor-to-ceiling windows with expansive sea views overlooking the city skyline.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 264 rooms & 26 suites
  • Food & Beverage: 5 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: 2 pools, spa, fitness center, The View Palm, 24-hour butler service 
  • Our Favorite Thing: CouCou Rooftop Lounge

activities.name: One & Only Za'abeel
activities.information:
Nestled in the heart of the city, One&Only One Za'abeel offers guests an urban resort experience that blends luxury and culture. The hotel features Dubai's first Longevity Hub by Clinique La Prairie. 

It also features The Link, the world's longest cantilever, along with 8 restaurants and 6 Michelin-rated chefs.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 51 suites and 178 luxury rooms
  • Food & Beverage: La Dame De Pic, Arrazuna, Tapasake, Duangdy, Qabu, Sphere, Aelia, Sagetsu, Andaliman, Streetxo, The Garden Pool Bar
  • Facilities: rooftop pool, spa & wellness, fitness center, ballrooms, and bars
  • Our Favorite Thing: There are various dining options at the Link

activities.name: Jumeirah Emirates Towers
activities.information:
Soaring high above Dubai’s financial district, Jumeirah Emirates Towers is one of the region’s most iconic buildings. This award-winning hotel provides elegantly furnished accommodation, within close proximity of the Dubai International Convention & Exhibition Centre and Dubai World Trade Centre.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 400
  • Food & Beverage: 11 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: 2 pools, Talise Spa & fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: It’s a corporate tower and hotel that includes popular dining venues
activities.pricing_content:
Soaring high above Dubai’s financial district, Jumeirah Emirates Towers is one of the region’s most iconic buildings. This award-winning hotel provides elegantly furnished accommodation, within close proximity of the Dubai International Convention & Exhibition Centre and Dubai World Trade Centre.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 400
  • Food & Beverage: 11 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: 2 pools, Talise Spa & fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: It’s a corporate tower and hotel that includes popular dining venues

activities.name: The Lana
activities.information:
The Lana, an ultra-luxurious retreat situated along the waterfront of Dubai Canal in the lively Business Bay area, offers guests a landmark of unparalleled luxury. With amenities such as a rooftop pool, Dior Spa, and eight new restaurants, guests can indulge in a truly luxurious experience.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 104 rooms & 121 suites 
  • Food & Beverage: Jara by Martin Berasategui, Riviera by Jean Imbert, High Society, Bonbon Café Angelo Musa, The Gallery, Veranda, Bitter Honey, Txakolina
  • Facilities: wellness spa, pool, fitness center, meeting and events facility
  • Our Favorite Thing: The ultra high-end finishing of the hotel

activities.name: The Dubai EDITION
activities.information:
Highly anticipated, The Dubai EDITION has recently opened in the heart of the bustling Downtown Dubai district. The stylish boutique hotel features 275 contemporary guest rooms and suites, with a chic infinity pool and front-row Burj Khalifa views.

Designed with LW Design Group, restaurants include Jolie, offering French-inspired food, and Duomo, a unique Italian dining experience showcasing a digital art show.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 275
  • Food & Beverage: 4 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Outdoor pool, spa and fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Located on the 23rd floor is Inti, a Peruvian-Nikkei restaurant

activities.name: Jumeirah Beach Hotel
activities.information:
The wave-shaped Jumeirah Beach Hotel presents a luxury resort for families, boasting front-row sea views of the iconic Burj Al Arab. Guests have access to a private stretch of beach, multiple pools, and a wide variety of world-class dining options. Wild Wadi Water Park is located right next door and hotel guests have unlimited access.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 618
  • Food & Beverage: 13 restaurants/bars/lounges 
  • Facilities: Private beach, 6 pools, spa, fitness center, 7 tennis courts 
  • Our Favorite Thing: All rooms have stunning views of the sea and Burj Al Arab
activities.pricing_content:

Guests have access to a private stretch of beach, multiple pools, and a wide variety of world-class dining options. Wild Wadi Water Park is located right next door and hotel guests have unlimited access.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 618
  • Food & Beverage: 13 restaurants/bars/lounges 
  • Facilities: Private beach, 6 pools, spa, fitness center, 7 tennis courts 
  • Our Favorite Thing: All rooms have stunning views of the sea and Burj Al Arab

activities.name: Jumeirah Al Qasr
activities.information:
Jumeirah Al Qasr is an Arabian-inspired luxury resort situated above the serene grounds of Madinat Jumeirah. Al Qasr offers 2 kilometers of private beach with landscaped gardens and waterways. Guests can also enjoy award-winning restaurants and relax at one of the best spas in Dubai. 

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 292
  • Food & Beverage: 7 restaurants/bars/lounges 
  • Facilities: Private beach, 17 pools, Talise Spa, kids club, fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Access to Wild Wadi Waterpark is complimentary for all hotel guests.
activities.pricing_content:
Jumeirah Al Qasr is an Arabian-inspired luxury resort situated above the serene grounds of Madinat Jumeirah. Al Qasr offers 2 kilometers of private beach with landscaped gardens and waterways. Guests can also enjoy award-winning restaurants and relax at one of the best spas in Dubai. 

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 292
  • Food & Beverage: 7 restaurants/bars/lounges 
  • Facilities: Private beach, 17 pools, Talise Spa, kids club, fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Access to Wild Wadi Waterpark is complimentary for all hotel guests.

activities.name: Atlantis The Palm
activities.information:
Atlantis The Palm Dubai is the ultimate destination for families in Dubai. The world-renowned resort hosts an underwater aquarium and gives you the opportunity to swim with dolphins. 

Discover an extensive selection of award-winning restaurants, catering to the taste buds of the entire family. It’s also home to the largest waterpark in the Middle East, so all guests receive complimentary access to Aquaventure Waterpark.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 1539 
  • Food & Beverage: 23 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Private beach, beach club, 2 pools, spa, fitness center, 3 tennis courts 
  • Our Favorite Thing: Home to the world-famous Nobu Restaurant
activities.pricing_content:
Atlantis The Palm Dubai is the ultimate destination for families in Dubai. The world-renowned resort hosts an underwater aquarium and gives you the opportunity to swim with dolphins. 

Discover an extensive selection of award-winning restaurants, catering to the taste buds of the entire family. It’s also home to the largest waterpark in the Middle East, so all guests receive complimentary access to Aquaventure Waterpark.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 1539 
  • Food & Beverage: 23 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Private beach, beach club, 2 pools, spa, fitness center, 3 tennis courts 
  • Our Favorite Thing: Home to the world-famous Nobu Restaurant

activities.name: Jumeirah Al Naseem
activities.information:
Jumeirah Al Naseem presents a luxury beach resort set in the picturesque grounds of Madinat Jumeirah. Boasting landscaped gardens with a stunning private beach facing Burj Al Arab, Al Naseem includes some of the best restaurants, beach clubs, and fine dining in Dubai.

Jumeirah Al Naseem pioneers sustainability in multiple ways. The five-star resort prioritizes water conservation and the elimination of single-use plastic while minimizing food waste, recycling, and energy consumption. 

Jumeirah Al Naseem’s Dubai Turtle Rehabilitation Project (DTRP) rehabilitates unwell and injured turtles. Guests can feed the turtles and discover marine life conservation.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 430
  • Food & Beverage: 7 restaurants/bars/lounges 
  • Facilities: Private beach, 6 pools, spa, fitness center, Souk Madinat
  • Our Favorite Thing: Summersalt Beach Club
activities.pricing_content:
Jumeirah Al Naseem presents a luxury beach resort set in the picturesque grounds of Madinat Jumeirah. Boasting landscaped gardens with a stunning private beach facing Burj Al Arab, Al Naseem includes some of the best restaurants, beach clubs, and fine dining in Dubai.
