  • Food & Beverage: 7 restaurants/bars/lounges 
  • Facilities: Private beach, 6 pools, spa, fitness center, Souk Madinat
  • Our Favorite Thing: Summersalt Beach Club

activities.name: Le Meridien Mina Seyahi Beach Resort & Waterpark
activities.information:
Le Meridien Mina Seyahi in Dubai Marina is a family-friendly beach resort with several swimming pools, set amongst lush greenery with 1,200 meters of sandy beach to enjoy. Each room boasts panoramic views of the Arabian Gulf or the Marina skyline. 

Guests benefit from access to the newly opened Jungle Bay Waterpark and the Le Meridien Family Kids Club, which offers activities programs, beach games, and 2 separate kids’ pools. 

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 220
  • Food & Beverage: 5 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Private beach, 4 pools, spa and wellness center, fitness center, waterpark, tennis court, kids club
  • Our Favorite Thing: Jungle Bay Waterpark offers a day of adventure for the whole family to enjoy

activities.name: Sofitel Dubai The Palm
activities.information:
Sofitel Dubai The Palm presents a Polynesian-inspired resort on the iconic Palm Jumeirah. Rooms and suites are generous with fantastic views overlooking the pool and beach.

Discover the resort's 12 restaurants, bars, and lounges, which cater to cuisines from around the globe. Guests can also relax and unwind at the award-winning Sofitel Spa.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 361
  • Food & Beverage: 12 restaurants/bars/lounge
  • Facilities: Private Beach, 6 pools, spa and fitness center, Amura Kids Club, tennis courts
  • Our Favorite Thing: The many activities for children to enjoy
activities.pricing_content:
Sofitel Dubai The Palm presents a Polynesian-inspired resort on the iconic Palm Jumeirah. Rooms and suites are generous with fantastic views overlooking the pool and beach.

Discover the resort's 12 restaurants, bars, and lounges, which cater to cuisines from around the globe. Guests can also relax and unwind at the award-winning Sofitel Spa.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 361
  • Food & Beverage: 12 restaurants/bars/lounge
  • Facilities: Private Beach, 6 pools, spa and fitness center, Amura Kids Club, tennis courts
  • Our Favorite Thing: The many activities for children to enjoy

activities.name: Raffles The Palm Dubai
activities.information:
Raffles The Palm Dubai is a family-friendly retreat inspired by the Renaissance and Baroque eras. It offers the ultimate palatial experience, with over 6,000 Swarovski Crystal chandeliers.

Spanning across the famous beachfront of Palm Jumeirah, guests can relax on 500 meters of private beach, temperature-controlled outdoor pools, and lush landscaped gardens. 

Culinary options include Mediterranean, Japanese and the beachside Italian restaurant Piatti, with a muted all-white theme to transport you straight to the Amalfi coast. This resort is perfect for couples, families, friends, and even large family gatherings.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 389-guest rooms, suites, and villas
  • Food & Beverage: 8 restaurants and bars, beach club
  • Facilities: Outdoor pool, award-winning Parisian Cinq Mondes Spa, fitness center, yoga studio, private beach, in-house cinema, watersports facilities, and dedicated kids and teens club
  • Our Favorite Thing: Access to the hotel’s famous 24-hour butler service

activities.name: Le Royal Méridien Beach Resort & Spa
activities.information:
Overlooking the pristine waters of the Arabian Gulf, Le Royal Méridien Beach Resort & Spa offers an award-winning stay in the heart of JBR. 


Enjoy three swimming pools, water sports, and a state-of-the-art fitness center, with direct access to Jumeirah Beach. Spacious rooms and suites offer contemporary design with inspiring sea views.

Le Royal Méridien hosts award-winning restaurants and bars, serving a wide variety of cuisines from Pan-Asian to Mexican. Guests can also access 16 inspired culinary venues at Grosvenor House nearby.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 504
  • Food & Beverage:13 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: 3 swimming pools, private beach, spa and wellness center, fitness center, tennis courts, Kids Club
  • Our Favorite Thing: Set on 19 acres of landscaped gardens with views of Ain Dubai

activities.name: Four Seasons Resort Dubai Jumeirah Beach
activities.information:
Four Seasons Resort Dubai at Jumeirah is an elegant 5-star resort featuring a private beach, 2 outdoor swimming pools, a lavish spa, and a collection of the finest dining experiences in Dubai.

All rooms and suites at Four Seasons Resort Dubai are decorated in a modern style with a touch of Arabic elegance. You will get sweeping ocean views from one side and the glittering Dubai skyline on the other.

  • Number of Room & Suites: 237
  • Food & Beverage: 11 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Private beach, 3 pools, spa, fitness center, 2 tennis courts, jogging track
  • Our Favorite Thing: Restaurant Village features world-famous restaurants such as Nusr-Et & Coya. Nammos is also located nearby

activities.name: The Ritz Carlton Dubai
activities.information:
This Mediterranean-style retreat is set amongst landscaped gardens and a golden stretch of private beach in the heart of Jumeirah Beach Residences (JBR). 

The Ritz-Carlton JBR provides a sustainable initiative, having partnered with Green Container Advanced Farming (GCAF) to launch their own sustainable on-site hydroponic farm, which produces fresh produce and is one of the first-ever vertical farms in Dubai.

Guests can enjoy first-class spa facilities and six outdoor swimming pools. The popular Dubai Marina district is only a 5-minute walk away.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 294
  • Food & Beverage: 9 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: 6 swimming pools, spa & fitness center, tennis courts, private cinema, kids' club, salon 
  • Our Favorite Thing: The hotel harvests a range of herbs, microgreens, lettuce, and other produce from its on-site hydroponic farm

activities.name: Vida Emirates Hills
activities.information:
Vida Emirates Hills is a contemporary hotel situated in the upmarket Emirates Hills neighborhood overlooking Emirates Golf Club. Spacious rooms & suites offer a calming space to unwind, with luxurious king beds and immaculately designed furnishings. Take a dip in the infinity pool with endless views of the greens.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 157
  • Food & Beverage: 3 restaurants/bars/lounges 
  • Facilities: 2 pools and a fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: The infinity pool overlooking the golf course
activities.pricing_content:
Vida Emirates Hills is a contemporary hotel situated in the upmarket Emirates Hills neighborhood overlooking Emirates Golf Club. Spacious rooms & suites offer a calming space to unwind, with luxurious king beds and immaculately designed furnishings. Take a dip in the infinity pool with endless views of the greens.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 157
  • Food & Beverage: 3 restaurants/bars/lounges 
  • Facilities: 2 pools and a fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: The infinity pool overlooking the golf course

activities.name: Aloft Palm Jumeirah
activities.information:
Aloft Palm Jumeirah is a vibrant beachfront hotel situated on the eastern crescent of Palm Jumeirah.

Comfortable rooms are spacious and contemporary, with private balconies overlooking the Arabian Gulf and Marina skyline. 

Keep the vibe going at the beachside bar, or end the night in style at Luchador, our authentic Mexican Cantina overlooking the iconic Burj Al Arab. 

  • Number of rooms & suites: 206
  • Food & beverage: 7 restaurants/bars/lounges 
  • Facilities: Outdoor pool, beach, fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Seaside views of Burj Al Arab
activities.pricing_content:
Aloft Palm Jumeirah is a vibrant beachfront hotel situated on the eastern crescent of Palm Jumeirah.

Comfortable rooms are spacious and contemporary, with private balconies overlooking the Arabian Gulf and Marina skyline. 

Keep the vibe going at the beachside bar, or end the night in style at Luchador, our authentic Mexican Cantina overlooking the iconic Burj Al Arab. 

  • Number of rooms & suites: 206
  • Food & beverage: 7 restaurants/bars/lounges 
  • Facilities: Outdoor pool, beach, fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Seaside views of Burj Al Arab

activities.name: Heritage Hotel, Autograph Collection
activities.information:
Heritage Hotel, Autograph Collection situated in the heart of Downtown is a low-rise boutique property with traditional Arabic design.

Conveniently located within walking distance of Dubai Mall, Souk Al Bahar and the iconic Burj Khalifa. 

Contemporary rooms and suites offer prime views of Burj Khalifa and Downtown.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 197
  • Food & beverage: 3 restaurants/bars, including Arabic and International cuisines
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, fitness, and business center
activities.pricing_content:
Heritage Hotel, Autograph Collection situated in the heart of Downtown is a low-rise boutique property with traditional Arabic design.

Conveniently located within walking distance of Dubai Mall, Souk Al Bahar and the iconic Burj Khalifa. 

Contemporary rooms and suites offer prime views of Burj Khalifa and Downtown.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 197
  • Food & beverage: 3 restaurants/bars, including Arabic and International cuisines
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, fitness, and business center

activities.name: Hotel Boulevard, Autograph Collection
activities.information:
Nestled amongst skyscrapers, Hotel Boulevard, Autograph Collection offers a low-rise boutique hotel with plenty of charm. Hotel Boulevard is within walking distance of the iconic Burj Khalifa, Souk Al Bahar, and Dubai Mall. Perfect for solo travelers and couples looking to be closer to the action Downtown.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 157
  • Food & Beverage: 4 restaurants
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, fitness center and mosque 
  • Our Favorite Thing: The chic pool on the boulevard
activities.pricing_content:
Nestled amongst skyscrapers, Hotel Boulevard, Autograph Collection offers a low-rise boutique hotel with plenty of charm. Hotel Boulevard is within walking distance of the iconic Burj Khalifa, Souk Al Bahar, and Dubai Mall. Perfect for solo travelers and couples looking to be closer to the action Downtown.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 157
  • Food & Beverage: 4 restaurants
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, fitness center and mosque 
  • Our Favorite Thing: The chic pool on the boulevard

activities.name: Zabeel House by Jumeirah
activities.information:
Zabeel House by Jumeirah is a stylish hotel conveniently located near Dubai Marina in The Greens. 

Rooms and suites are spacious and contemporary, with eco-friendly amenities. A top spot for solo travelers, couples, and quick business trips.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 210
  • Eating & drinking: 2 restaurants/lounges,
  • Facilities: Outdoor pool, fitness center, spa and wellness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: The modern design
activities.pricing_content:
Zabeel House by Jumeirah is a stylish hotel conveniently located near Dubai Marina in The Greens. 

Rooms and suites are spacious and contemporary, with eco-friendly amenities. A top spot for solo travelers, couples, and quick business trips.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 210
  • Eating & drinking: 2 restaurants/lounges,
  • Facilities: Outdoor pool, fitness center, spa and wellness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: The modern design

activities.name: Al Seef Heritage Hotel Dubai
activities.information:
Escape the hustle and bustle of the city and immerse yourself in old Dubai. Al Seef Heritage Hotel is conveniently located along Dubai Creek, featuring traditional Arabic-style architecture and design.

The spice and gold souks are on the opposite riverbank, only a short boat ride away.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 180
  • Food & beverage: Saba’a a Traditional Emirati-inspired restaurant in the hotel, however there are many dining options along the Al Seef Promenade
  • Our Favorite Thing: The traditional and local architecture
activities.pricing_content:
Escape the hustle and bustle of the city and immerse yourself in old Dubai. Al Seef Heritage Hotel is conveniently located along Dubai Creek, featuring traditional Arabic-style architecture and design.

The spice and gold souks are on the opposite riverbank, only a short boat ride away.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 180
  • Food & beverage: Saba’a a Traditional Emirati-inspired restaurant in the hotel, however there are many dining options along the Al Seef Promenade
  • Our Favorite Thing: The traditional and local architecture

activities.name: DoubleTree by Hilton Jumeirah Beach
activities.information:
Opened in 2014, DoubleTree by Hilton Dubai Jumeirah Beach is located on The Walk, a bustling waterfront promenade in the heart of Jumeirah Beach Residences. This upscale all-suite hotel offers private access to the beach, beach cabanas, and a private pool. All suites feature modern furnishings with private balconies and sea views of the Arabian Gulf or Dubai Marina skyline.

  • Number of Apartments: 110
  • Food & Beverage: 3 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: outdoor pool, spa, fitness center, private beach, salon
  • ﻿Our Favorite Thing: Direct beachfront access with views of Ain Dubai

activities.name: Vida Creek Harbour
activities.information:
Vida Creek Harbour is a contemporary haven within the master development of Dubai Creek Harbour. Take a stroll down the promenade to enjoy the abundance of eateries, retail outlets, and captivating entertainment venues.

Recreational amenities at the hotel include an infinity pool overlooking the Dubai skyline, the ideal spot for you to experience a sunset like no other. Vida Creek Harbour is only a 10-minute drive from Downtown Dubai and boasts spectacular views of the city’s skyline.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 286
  • Food & beverage: 3 restaurants
  • Facilities: Outdoor pool, fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: The fabulous views of the famous Dubai skyline
activities.pricing_content:
Vida Creek Harbour is a contemporary haven within the master development of Dubai Creek Harbour. Take a stroll down the promenade to enjoy the abundance of eateries, retail outlets, and captivating entertainment venues.

Recreational amenities at the hotel include an infinity pool overlooking the Dubai skyline, the ideal spot for you to experience a sunset like no other. Vida Creek Harbour is only a 10-minute drive from Downtown Dubai and boasts spectacular views of the city’s skyline.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 286
  • Food & beverage: 3 restaurants
  • Facilities: Outdoor pool, fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: The fabulous views of the famous Dubai skyline

activities.name: Hotel Indigo Dubai Downtown
activities.information:
Situated in Downtown Dubai, Hotel Indigo Dubai Downtown is a unique boutique hotel that combines authentic local experiences with modern design. Guest rooms offer plush bedding, flexible work spaces, and creative artwork. Spa-inspired bathrooms feature glass-enclosed rain showers with quality amenities that will leave you feeling refreshed and invigorated. Enjoy a 25-meter infinity pool, fitness center, and yoga studio.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 269 guest rooms 
  • Food & Beverage: 4 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, fitness center, yoga studio 
  • Our Favorite Thing: The 25-meter outdoor infinity pool
activities.pricing_content:
Situated in Downtown Dubai, Hotel Indigo Dubai Downtown is a unique boutique hotel that combines authentic local experiences with modern design. Guest rooms offer plush bedding, flexible work spaces, and creative artwork. Spa-inspired bathrooms feature glass-enclosed rain showers with quality amenities that will leave you feeling refreshed and invigorated. Enjoy a 25-meter infinity pool, fitness center, and yoga studio.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 269 guest rooms 
  • Food & Beverage: 4 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, fitness center, yoga studio 
  • Our Favorite Thing: The 25-meter outdoor infinity pool

activities.name: Radisson Beach Resort Palm Jumeirah
activities.information:
Located along the vibrant Palm West Beach, Radisson Beach Resort Palm Jumeirah provides contemporary guest rooms and suites featuring beautiful views of the Arabian Gulf. Each room has its own private balcony and floor-to-ceiling windows for plenty of daylight. 


Discover excellent services and amenities, from a beautiful private beachfront with sun loungers to on-site restaurants, bars, and lounges. Unwind at two outdoor pools, or spend a refreshing afternoon at the health club and rejuvenating spa. Radisson Beach Resort has everything you need to relax and enjoy your stay.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 389 contemporary rooms & suites
  • Food & Beverage: 5 restaurants, bars, lounges
  • Facilities: 2 outdoor pools, private beach, spa, fitness center, health club, and outdoor kid’s pool
  • Our Favorite Thing: Visiting Tonino Lamborghini, a luxurious Mediterranean venue located on the rooftop.

activities.name: Vida Dubai Marina
activities.information:
Situated in the heart of Dubai Marina along the idyllic waterfront promenade, Vida Dubai Marina & Yacht Club is at the center of the city’s very best culinary experiences and amazing nightlife.

Vida Dubai Marina & Yacht Club offers contemporary rooms with deluxe city-view rooms and executive Marina-view suites. Exceptional amenities include a state-of-the-art business center, social dining options, bespoke wellness experiences, and an outdoor infinity pool. 

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 158 rooms and suites
  • Food & Beverage: All-day dining at Origins, as well as coffee shop and cafe at Stage 2, and a pool bar
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool and fitness center, 24-hour front desk, and currency exchange for guests.
  • Our Favorite Thing: Cycle around Dubai Marina and the surrounding areas using their complimentary bikes. You’re only a short walk away from Dubai Marina Mall, JBR Beach, and Bluewaters Island.

activities.name: One & Only The Palm
activities.information:
Situated on the west crescent of Palm Jumeirah, One & Only The Palm offers an intimate beachfront getaway. Guests can enjoy private villas surrounded by manicured gardens, as well as world-class dining from Michelin-star chef Yannick Alléno. Treat yourself at the luxurious Guerlain Spa for the ultimate day of relaxation.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 94
  • Food & Beverage: 4 restaurants/lounges 
  • Facilities: Private beach, pool, spa, gym, tennis courts 
  • Our Favorite Thing: Guests can arrive in style to sister property One & Only Royal Mirage by yacht

activities.name: Mandarin Oriental Jumeira
activities.information:
Welcoming a new standard of luxury to the shores of Dubai. Mandarin Oriental Jumeira presents a sophisticated beachfront property – the first resort for the Asia-based Mandarin Oriental Group in the United Arab Emirates. 

This award-winning hotel practices global sustainability initiatives, which include the elimination of single-use plastic, while the amenities in guest suites are cruelty-free and made from responsibly sourced & sustainable materials.

Guests can enjoy world-class leisure activities and fine dining, including popular Portuguese restaurant Tasca by José Avillez.

Contemporary suites feature floor-to-ceiling windows with beautiful marble bathrooms overlooking panoramic views across the Arabian Gulf.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 256
  • Food & Beverage: 8 restaurants/bars/lounges, 
  • Facilities: Private beach, 5 outdoor pools, spa & hammam, fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: In 2022, the hotel partnered with Freestyle Divers and Azraq For The Oceans to create an artificial reef in Dibba Bay, off the coast of Fujairah. The reef is designed to create a new underwater ecosystem that supports marine life

activities.name: Bulgari Resort Dubai
activities.information:
Bulgari Resort Dubai provides a seaside luxury escape, inspired by modern Italian design. 

It is home to the world's only Bulgari Yacht Club & Marina, offering sweeping ocean views with Mediterranean charm. The resort is situated on the man-made island of Jumeirah Bay, an island carved into the shape of a seahorse. And it is only a short distance from the bustling Downtown district of Dubai.

  • Number of Rooms/Suites/Villas: 101
  • Food & Beverage: 6 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Yacht club, private beach, 3 swimming pools, spa and fitness center, kids club
  • Our Favorite Thing: Bulgari's first ever Yacht Club overlooks a 46 boat harbor

activities.name: Jumeirah Al Naseem
activities.information:
Jumeirah Al Naseem presents a luxury beach resort boasting landscaped gardens with a private beach facing Burj Al Arab. Al Naseem includes some of the best restaurants, beach clubs, and fine dining Dubai has to offer.

Jumeirah Al Naseem pioneers sustainability in multiple ways. The five-star resort prioritizes water conservation and the elimination of single-use plastic while minimizing food waste, recycling, and reducing energy consumption. 

Jumeirah Al Naseem’s Dubai Turtle Rehabilitation Project (DTRP) rehabilitates unwell and injured turtles. Guests can feed the turtles and discover marine life conservation.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 430
  • Food & Beverage: 7 restaurants/bars/lounges 
  • Facilities: Private beach, 6 pools, spa, fitness center, Souk Madinat
  • Our Favorite Thing: Summersalt Beach Club and Restaurant

activities.name: Burj Al Arab
activities.information:
Burj Al Arab is one of the most famous landmarks in Dubai and one of the most luxurious hotels in the world. 


The all-suite hotel is situated on its own man-made island, offering opulence in every way, from Michelin-star dining to a 10,000 sqm terrace featuring one of the best infinity pools in Dubai. Guests can choose to arrive by helicopter or Rolls Royce.

  • Number of Suites: 202 
  • Food & Beverage: 11 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Private beach, 5 pools, spa and wellness center, fitness center, tennis court
  • Our Favorite Thing: The outdoor infinity pool and restaurant SAL

activities.name: Jumeirah Al Qasr
activities.information:
Jumeirah Al Qasr is an Arabian-inspired luxury resort situated above the serene grounds of Madinat Jumeirah. Located on 2 km of private beach, landscaped gardens and waterways, award-winning restaurants, and one of the best spas in Dubai. 

All suites overlook the Arabian Gulf with private balconies. The vibrant Souk Madinat Jumeirah offers plenty of dining options and shops to discover nearby.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 292
  • Food & Beverage: 7 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Private beach, outdoor pools, Talise Spa and fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Access to Wild Wadi Waterpark is complimentary for all hotel guests

activities.name: Address Beach Resort
activities.information:
Located in the heart of Jumeirah Beach Residence, Address Beach Resort is the first beachfront property from the luxury lifestyle brand Address Hotels & Resorts.


Rooms & suites offer sleek and luxurious interiors, designed with comfort in mind and boasting panoramic sea views. Guests have access to over 100 meters of beachfront, within walking distance to Ain Dubai and Dubai Marina.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 217
  • Food & Beverage: 8 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: 4 outdoor pools, spa, fitness center, private beach
  • Our Favorite Thing: Officially the highest rooftop infinity pool in the world

activities.name: Banyan Tree
activities.information:
Nestled on the exclusive Bluewaters Island, Banyan Tree Dubai sits along a pristine 500-meter stretch of private beach. Rooms and suites are stylishly designed as sleek, modern retreats, complete with marble bathrooms and furnished balconies overlooking the Arabian Gulf.

Banyan Tree Dubai is a short walking distance to Bluewaters, offering plenty of dining options and home to the largest observation wheel in the world, Ain Dubai. A scenic bridge connects pedestrians conveniently to JBR and Dubai Marina.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 495
  • Food & Beverage: 6 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: 4 outdoor pools, Qua Spa, fitness center, private beach
  • Our Favorite Thing: 500 meters of private beach - Cove Beach is located next to the resort

activities.name: One & Only Royal Mirage
activities.information:
One & Only Royal Mirage is an Arabian-styled resort made up of 3 distinct environments: The Palace, Arabian Court, and Residence & Spa. Each have unique rooms and themed restaurants.

This luxury beachfront resort boasts 1 kilometer of private beach and 65 acres of lush landscaped gardens, including 3 large temperature-controlled swimming pools and 3 tennis courts. Guests can enjoy a wide range of international cuisines and fresh seafood on the beachfront with clear views of the ocean.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 235
  • Food & Beverage: 8 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: 3 pools, 3 tennis courts, fitness center, spa, private beach, kids club
  • Our Favorite Thing: Complimentary access to Drift Beach

activities.name: Four Seasons Resort Dubai Jumeirah Beach
activities.information:
Four Seasons Resort Dubai at Jumeirah is an elegant 5-star resort featuring a private beach, 2 outdoor swimming pools, a lavish spa, and a collection of the finest dining experiences in Dubai.

All rooms and suites at Four Seasons Resort Dubai are decorated in a modern style with a touch of Arabic elegance. You’ll get sweeping ocean views on one side, and the glittering Dubai skyline on the other.

  • Number of Room & Suites: 237
  • Food & Beverage: 11 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Private beach, 3 pools, spa, fitness center, 2 tennis courts, jogging track
  • Our Favorite Thing: Restaurant Village features world-famous restaurants such as Nusr-Et & Coya. Nammos is also located nearby

activities.name: Atlantis The Royal
activities.information:
The iconic landmark Atlantis The Royal will forever change the landscape of Dubai.

Created by the world’s leading designers, architects, and artists, this ultra-luxury destination offers infinite ocean views, lush gardens, dramatic architecture, and contemporary rooms totaling 43 storeys, crowned by a 90-meter rooftop sky pool.

Sitting beside the original Atlantis The Palm, Atlantis The Royal takes guests on a culinary journey. It is home to 17 world-class restaurants, including 8 celebrity chef restaurants. 

Amenities include a 3,000 square meter wellness center and an impressive lobby, where you will find more than 2,000 ephemeral jellyfish in one of the world’s largest jellyfish tanks and one of the world’s most striking fountain performances.

All hotel rooms feature a pillow menu with high-end amenities from Hermès and Graff and complimentary access to Aquaventure waterpark.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 231 apartments and 795 hotel rooms
  • Food & Beverage: 17 world-class restaurants and bars and one leading international beach and nightclub
  • Facilities: 2.3km stretch of private beach, wellness center, 4 swimming pools, 24-hour butler service, currency exchange, Skyblaze Fountain, and Aquaventure Waterpark 
  • Our Favorite Thing: Nobu by the beach

activities.name: Raffles The Palm Dubai
activities.information:
The new Raffles The Palm Dubai is a retreat inspired by the Renaissance and Baroque eras. It offers the ultimate palatial experience, with over 6,000 Swarovski Crystal chandeliers.

Spanning across the famous beachfront of Palm Jumeirah, guests can relax on 500-meters of private beach, temperature-controlled outdoor pools, and landscaped lush gardens. Culinary options include Mediterranean, Japanese, and the beachside Italian restaurant Piatti, with a muted all-white theme to transport you straight to the Amalfi coast. 

This resort is perfect for couples, families, friends, and even large family gatherings.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 389 guest rooms, suites, and villas
  • Food & Beverage: 8 restaurants and bars, beach club
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, award-winning Parisian Cinq Mondes Spa, fitness center, yoga studio, private beach, in-house cinema, watersports facilities and dedicated kids and teens club
  • Our Favorite Thing: The hotel’s famous 24-hour butler service

activities.name: Jumeirah Emirates Towers
activities.information:
Soaring high above Dubai’s financial district Jumeirah Emirates Towers is one of the region’s most iconic buildings.

This award-winning hotel provides elegantly furnished accommodation, with close proximity to Dubai International Convention & Exhibition Centre and Dubai World Trade Centre.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 400
  • Food & Beverage: 11 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: 2 Pools, Talise Spa & Fitness Center
  • Our Favorite Thing: World-class dining options such as La Cantine and Ninive

activities.name: Waldorf Astoria Dubai International Financial Centre
activities.information:
Waldorf Astoria DIFC is a luxury hotel in DIFC, inspired by the effortless cool of sixties-era New York. Rooms and suites occupy floors 27-50 of the high-rise building. Facilities include a rooftop terrace and temperature-controlled outdoor pool.

With close proximity to popular bars and restaurants in DIFC, it’s the perfect spot for business and leisure.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 275 
  • Food & Beverage: 3 restaurants/lounges 
  • Facilities: 2 Pools, Spa, Fitness Center 
  • Our Favorite Thing: DIFC Location - some of Dubai’s best restaurants and bars are right on your doorstep

activities.name: Four Seasons Dubai International Financial Centre
activities.information:
Four Seasons Hotel Dubai International Financial Centre is conveniently located in the heart of Dubai’s business and financial hub, DIFC.

Premium facilities include an impressive glass-walled outdoor pool, restaurants, bars, and lounges, ideal for business meetings or relaxing with friends.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 106 rooms & suites 
  • Food & Beverage: 4 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: Glass-walled rooftop pool, spa, fitness center, 24-hour business services 
  • Our Favorite Thing: Dubai’s best restaurants and bars are only steps away

activities.name: Ritz Carlton Dubai International Financial Centre
activities.information:
The 5-star Ritz-Carlton Dubai International Financial Centre embodies modern luxury with contemporary interiors influenced by French art deco, with direct access to DIFC Gate Building.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 341 rooms & suites 
  • Food & Beverage: 6 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: Indoor and heated rooftop swimming pools, The Ritz Carlton Spa, hair salon, fitness center, full business center
  • Our Favorite Thing: The Club Lounge – level 13 outdoor terrace

activities.name: ME Dubai by Meliá
activities.information:
ME Dubai by Meliá is an architectural masterpiece situated in Business Bay. Designed by Zaha Hadid, the contemporary boutique hotel is located near Burj Khalifa and DIFC.

Guests can enjoy premium amenities and world-class culinary experiences such as ROKA and The MAINE Oyster Bar & Grill.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 74 rooms 19 suites 
  • Food & Beverage: 3 restaurants
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, spa, fitness center 
  • Our Favorite Thing: The futuristic design by Zaha Hadid

activities.name: The Angsana Hotel
activities.information:
Situated in Business Bay, The Angsana Dubai is a contemporary luxury hotel nestled between skyscrapers, featuring a 25-meter outdoor pool.

Guests can enjoy impressive views of Burj Khalifa from the spacious rooms & suites, plus award-winning restaurants serving international cuisines.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 252
  • Food & Beverage: 3 restaurants/lounges
  • Facilities: Outdoor pool, spa, fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Close proximity to Downtown & DIFC

activities.name: Taj Dubai
activities.information:
Featuring panoramic views of Burj Khalifa, Taj Dubai is a luxurious Indian-themed hotel situated in the heart of the Business Bay.

Taj Dubai offers guests sophisticated suites with an exotic range of classic and contemporary restaurants, lounges, and bars. 

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 296 rooms & suites  
  • Food & Beverage: 7 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: 2 pools, Spa, Fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: The exclusive Billionaire Mansion restaurant and nightclub

activities.name: JW Marriott Marquis Hotel Dubai
activities.information:
Situated across two iconic towers, JW Marriott Marquis Hotel is home to an enticing array of 10 award-winning restaurants, bars, and lounges and the sublime Saray Spa and Health Club.

For business travelers, the hotel is ideally placed in Business Bay, directly beside the Dubai Water Canal extension. 

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 1608
  • Food & Beverage: 11 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: Pool, Spa, Fitness Center
  • Our Favorite Thing: A wide selection of dining options including the popular Wanderlust Brunch
activities.pricing_content:
Situated across two iconic towers, JW Marriott Marquis Hotel is home to an enticing array of 10 award-winning restaurants, bars, and lounges and the sublime Saray Spa and Health Club.

For business travelers, the hotel is ideally placed in Business Bay, directly beside the Dubai Water Canal extension. 

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 1608
  • Food & Beverage: 11 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: Pool, Spa, Fitness Center
  • Our Favorite Thing: A wide selection of dining options including the popular Wanderlust Brunch

activities.name: 25hours Hotel One Central
activities.information:
25hours Hotel One Central is conveniently located near the bustling DIFC district and Dubai World Trade Centre, overlooking The Museum of the Future.

Rooms and suites are cozy and well-designed for comfort and practicality. Features include 5-meter-high ceilings, and large windows so you can enjoy breathtaking views. 

Guests have access to a co-working space, open pantry, and coffee bar at the gallery on the first floor. Five charming restaurants and bars transport guests on a culinary trip around the world.

With a bright, airy, industrial feel, this hotel provides the perfect setting for creative thinking, productive discussions, or special occasions. 

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 434 rooms and suites
  • Food & Beverage: 5 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, fitness center, spa and wellness center, ladies salon, pottery studio, and games room
  • Our Favorite Thing: The outdoor pool overlooking The Museum of the Future

activities.name: The Dubai EDITION
activities.information:
Highly anticipated, The Dubai EDITION has recently opened in the heart of the bustling Downtown Dubai district. The stylish boutique hotel features 275 contemporary guest rooms and suites with a chic infinity pool and Burj Khalifa views.

Designed with LW Design Group, restaurants include Jolie, offering French-inspired food, and Duomo, a unique Italian dining experience showcasing a digital art show.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 275
  • Food & Beverage: 4 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Outdoor pool, spa, and fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Located on the 23rd floor is Inti, a Peruvian-Nikkei restaurant

activities.name: Address Sky View
activities.information:
Address Sky View is one of the latest additions to a growing list of iconic landmarks in Dubai. 

This elegant hotel boasts a stunning rooftop infinity pool and lounge, including direct access to Dubai Mall.

Each apartment features sophisticated interiors, a modern kitchen & dining room, and a king-size bed, with city views of Burj Khalifa.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 166 serviced apartments
  • Eating & drinking: 5 restaurants/bars 
  • Facilities: 2 pools, spa, fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: The spectacular views from the rooftop infinity pool and restaurant Ce La Vi
activities.pricing_content:

activities.name: Address Dubai Mall
activities.information:
Attractively located in the Downtown Dubai district, Address Dubai Mall features stunning views of Burj Khalifa and The Dubai Fountain, with direct access to entertainment and shops at The Dubai Mall.

Opulent apartments include large private balconies, open kitchens with modern appliances, and spacious living rooms.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 788 serviced apartments
  • Eating & drinking: 4 restaurants/lounges/bar
  • Facilities: 3 swimming pools, fitness center, spa
  • Our Favorite Thing: The Spa at Address Dubai Mall

activities.name: Kempinski the Boulevard
activities.information:
Kempinski the Boulevard is a sophisticated city retreat in the heart of Downtown.

The Kempinski the Boulevard features Burj Khalifa views, three great pools, premium spa facilities, and direct access to Dubai Mall. It combines the luxury of a hotel with the privacy of your own studio, resulting in perfect five-bedroom residences.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 523
  • Eating & drinking: 2 restaurants/lounges
  • Facilities: 3 pools, fitness center, spa
  • Our Favorite Thing: The central location Downtown

activities.name: Jumeirah Living Marina Gate Hotel & Apartments
activities.information:
Located in Dubai Marina’s Waterfront and surrounded by restaurants and the iconic Marina Walk Promenade.

Jumeirah Living Marina Gate Hotel & Apartments is an ideal destination for urban living in Dubai Marina, offering luxury serviced apartments for short and longer stays.

Apartments feature floor-to-ceiling windows, private balconies with sweeping views of Dubai Marina, spacious living rooms, and a fully-equipped open-plan kitchen.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 104 serviced apartments
  • Eating & drinking: 1 lounge
  • Facilities: Infinity pool, fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Direct access to Marina Walk Promenade

activities.name: Address Downtown
activities.information:
Address Downtown Dubai is an iconic award-winning hotel situated in the heart of Downtown. 

Guests can enjoy impressive views of Burj Khalifa, world-class amenities, and a wide variety of exceptional restaurants.

Luxury hotel apartments are available for short & long-term stays, offering everything from sleek studios to 4-bedroom hotel residences.

The Dubai Mall is also easily accessible through a pedestrian bridge.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 220
  • Eating & drinking: 8 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: Indoor/outdoor pool, spa, fitness center, kids club
  • Our Favorite Thing: Front-row Burj Khalifa views

activities.name: La Ville Hotel & Suites
activities.information:
The award-winning luxury La Ville Hotel is a stylish boutique hotel located in the trendy neighborhood of City Walk.

One and two-bedroom furnished apartments include fully-equipped kitchens, a separate dining area with contemporary décor and neutral furnishings, and spectacular city views. Treat yourself to the easily accessible outdoor mall City Walk, only a few steps away.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 77 rooms and 11 suites 
  • Food & Beverage: 4 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: Rooftop infinity pool, fitness center, spa and wellness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: The stunning rooftop infinity pool overlooking Downtown Dubai

activities.name: SLS Dubai Hotel & Residences
activities.information:
SLS Dubai Hotel & Residences is a striking landmark in the Downtown District, designed by the award-winning architects Aedas and interior designer Paul Bishop.

Spread over 75 floors, SLS Dubai is one of tallest hotels and residences in the region.

Two infinity pools are situated on the rooftop of the 75-storey tower, offering an incomparable 360-degree view of Dubai.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 321 hotel apartments
  • Food & beverage: 6 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: 3 Pools, Fitness Center, Ciel Spa
  • Our Favorite Thing: One of the highest rooftop pools in the world

activities.name: Grosvenor House, a Luxury Collection Hotel
activities.information:
Located on Dubai Marina promenade, Grosvenor House is an instantly recognisable landmark of Dubai.

The modern apartments feature marble bathrooms, floor-to-ceiling windows, luxury Byredo amenities, and a personalized butler service. They offering all the five-star luxury of the hotel with the added comforts of home.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 750    
  • Eating & drinking: 10 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: 2 pools, spa & wellness center, fitness center 
  • Our Favorite Thing: Guests have full access to the beach, pool, and leisure facilities at Grosvenor's sister hotel, Le Royal Meridien Beach Resort & Spa

activities.name: Intercontinental Dubai Marina
activities.information:
Set in the heart of Dubai Marina, Intercontinental Dubai Marina is within walking distance of Jumeirah Beach and Dubai Marina Mall.

Guests have access to an outdoor infinity pool, health club, spa, and nine food and beverage venues, which include scenic views of Dubai Marina and direct access to the Marina promenade. 

Feel at home with a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher, washing machine, cooking range, and other amenities.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 328
  • Eating & drinking: 9 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: 2 pools, spa & wellness center, fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: The location in the center of Dubai Marina along the Marina promenade

activities.name: JW Marriott Hotel Marina
activities.information:
Located in the heart of Dubai Marina, JW Marriott Hotel Marina is directly linked to Dubai Marina Mall.

The property features an impressive infinity pool on level 4, outdoor dining, and a poolside bar with panoramic Marina views.

From luxury studios to four-bedroom penthouses, these apartments boast floor-to-ceiling windows, modern amenities, plush furnishings, and panoramic Marina views.

  • Number of apartments: 443
  • Eating & drinking: 5 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: 1 outdoor pool, spa, fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Direct access to Marina Mall and Marina Promenade

activities.name: Address Beach Resort
activities.information:
Located in the heart of Jumeirah Beach Residence, Address Beach Resort is the first beachfront property from the luxury lifestyle brand Address Hotels & Resorts. Enjoy luxurious beachfront living with 1-5 bedroom serviced apartments boasting plush furnishings and panoramic city and sea views.

Guests have access to 100 meters of private beach and 4 pools. The resort is also within walking distance of Bluewaters Island, JBR, Dubai Marina, and Ain Dubai.

  • Number of Apartments: 443
  • Food & Beverage: 8 restaurants and bars
  • Facilities: 4 pools, spa, fitness center, private beach
  • Our Favorite Thing: The highest rooftop infinity pool in the world

activities.name: The Residences at Banyan Tree Dubai
activities.information:
The Residences at Banyan Tree Dubai offer sophisticated comfort with elegantly furnished luxury accommodations and thoughtful amenities. 

Guests of The Residences are just steps away from the world-class dining, indulgent leisure, and iconic entertainment experiences available at Bluewaters Island.

Relish in the comforts of home in a one, two, three or four-bedroom serviced apartment with fully-equipped kitchens and in-room laundry appliances/services for your convenience.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 495
  • Food & Beverage: 12 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Outdoor pools, Spa, Fitness Center, Private Beach      
  • Our Favorite Thing: Complimentary access to facilities at Banyan Tree Dubai

activities.name: FIVE Palm Jumeirah
activities.information:
Located on Palm Jumeirah, Five Palm Residences offer luxury serviced apartments with panoramic views of the Arabian Gulf and Marina skyline.

The fully furnished apartments feature a contemporary furnished living room, fully-equipped kitchen, and spacious balconies with views over the beach and resort.

Guests can enjoy private beach access, outdoor swimming pools, and a variety of international flavors.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 470
  • Eating & drinking: 8 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Private beach, 4 outdoor pools, spa, fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Location on Palm Jumeirah with private beach access

activities.name: Sofitel Dubai The Palm
activities.information:
Situated on the iconic Palm Jumeirah, Sofitel Dubai The Palm Resort & Spa is a Polynesian island-style resort. Each serviced apartment offers a flat-screen TV, fully-equipped kitchen, separate living and dining room, private balcony, and all the necessary amenities for a comfortable stay.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 361
  • Food & Beverage:12 restaurants/bars/lounge
  • Facilities: Private beach, 6 pools, spa, fitness center, kids club, tennis courts
  • Our Favorite Thing: The private beachfront location

activities.name: Andaz Dubai The Palm
activities.information:
Andaz Dubai The Palm is a stylish boutique hotel situated on Palm Jumeirah opposite Nakheel Mall.

Each apartment offers a kitchen, dining area, and 24-hour room service.

Guests have access to a private beach, outdoor pool, fitness center, and spa.

  • Number of apartments: 116
  • Eating & drinking: 4 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: 2 pools, spa, fitness center, private beach, volleyball, kids club 
  • Our Favorite Thing: The terrace on the roof

activities.name: Kempinski Hotel & Residences Palm Jumeirah
activities.information:
Kempinski Hotel & Residences on Palm Jumeirah is ideal for family holidays, offering ocean-facing serviced apartments, villas, and penthouses.

All rooms are finished to the highest standards, with spacious living rooms, fully-equipped kitchens, luxury furnishings, and a private balcony overlooking the Arabian Gulf.

  • Number of apartments: 244
  • Food & Beverage: 4 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: 1 outdoor pool, spa, fitness center, private beach, kid’s outdoor play equipment
  • Our Favorite Thing: Private beach with five acres of landscaped gardens

activities.name: Anantara The Palm Dubai
activities.information:
Located on the world-famous Palm Jumeirah, Anantara The Palm boasts 400 meters of private beach surrounded by views of the Arabian Gulf.

Anantara The Palm offers studios to two-bedroom apartments, each with private balconies, separate living and dining rooms, a fully-equipped kitchen, and amenities. Guests can enjoy full access to the facilities of Anantara The Palm Dubai Resort.

  • Number of apartments: 115
  • Food & beverage: 6 bars & restaurants
  • Facilities: Outdoor pools, spa, fitness center, private beach, kids club, tennis court
  • Our Favorite Thing: Relax at the award-winning Anantara Spa

activities.name: Dukes The Palm
activities.information:
Situated on Palm Jumeirah, Dukes The Palm, a Royal Hideaway Hotel brings a world of British charm with cosmopolitan luxury.

Guests can enjoy an array of water sports on the beachfront. Then, they can relax in their tastefully furnished serviced apartment with spectacular views of the Arabian Gulf, framed by the iconic Marina skyline. All rooms and suites have a flat-screen satellite TV, coffee and tea-making facilities, a spacious wardrobe and bathroom amenities.

  • Number of serviced apartments: 285
  • Food & beverage:  3 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: 2 pools, spa, fitness center, private beach, salon
  • Our Favorite Thing: State-of-the-art gym on the 14th floor with sea views

activities.information:
• Number of Rooms & Suites: 231 suites & 100 opulent serviced apartments
  • Food & Beverage: Ronin, Tete A Tete, Paradiso, Goose Island Tap House, Playa Pacha
  • Facilities: Pool, gymnasium, fitness center, garden, spa, private beach, beach club, and bar

activities.name: NH Collection Dubai The Palm
activities.information:
NH Collection Dubai The Palm is located on The Palm Jumeirah, with top attractions right on your doorstep. 


The hotel is just steps from Palm West Beach, Nakheel Mall, and The Pointe. Guest rooms feature stunning views of the city or the sea, designed with style and comfort in mind.


Enjoy the use of excellent leisure facilities, with its own signature rooftop infinity pool offering inspiring views overlooking Dubai Marina.


NH Collection Dubai provides guests with plenty of delicious dining options, serving international cuisine to suit every taste and palate.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 533 guest rooms and suites
  • Food & Beverage: Maiora, an all-day dining restaurant, sports bar, Revo Café, Té Lounge and SEEN Restaurant & Bar, which is located on the rooftop
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, spa and fitness center, terrace
  • Our Favorite Thing: If you’re looking for a drink with a view, check out SEEN Restaurant & Bar, which is located on the rooftop.

activities.name: Vida Emirates Hills
activities.information:
Vida Emirates Hills offers fully-furnished contemporary apartments situated in the upmarket Emirates Hills neighborhood. 

Overlooking the serene Emirates Golf Club, choose from one, two, and three-bedroom apartments offering a luxurious space to unwind with immaculately designed furnishings, an open-plan kitchen, and amenities.

  • Number of Apartments: 157
  • Food & Beverage 3 restaurants/bars
  • Facilities: 2 pools, spa, fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: The infinity pool overlooking the golf course

activities.information:
Nestled amongst skyscrapers, Hotel Boulevard, Autograph Collection is an airy and inviting space with plenty of charm.

Feel at home with thoughtfully designed apartments complete with a fully-equipped kitchen, dishwasher, and microwave. Each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, desk, ironing facilities, and a seating area with a sofa.

Hotel Boulevard is just a short walk away from the main attractions Downtown, including Dubai Opera, Dubai Mall, and Burj Khalifa. 

  • Number of apartments: 157
  • Food & beverage: 4 restaurants/bars
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, fitness center, kids club
  • Our Favorite Thing: The glamorous pool on the boulevard

Avani Palm View offers guests panoramic sea views of Palm Jumeirah, located close to numerous attractions, such as Dubai Marina, JBR, Burj Al Arab, and Palm Jumeirah.

Avani Palm View Dubai provides bright and airy accommodation with a fully-equipped modern kitchen, living, and dining area.

Guests can enjoy a state-of-the-art fitness studio located on the 1st floor, complimentary for in-house guests and open 24 hours a day.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 264
  • Eating & drinking: 3 restaurants/bars
  • Facilities: 1 pool, fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Great location near Palm Jumeirah and Dubai Marina

activities.information:
Inspired by old and new Dubai, Hyatt Place Dubai Jumeirah is a premium four-star hotel situated on Al Mina Road near the exclusive Jumeirah neighborhood and La Mer. Choose from studio, one-bedroom, or two-bedroom apartments with modern essentials for work and play in a stylish setting.

  • Number of apartments: 157
  • Food & beverage: 4 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Outdoor pool, spa, 24-hour fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Good breakfast included in the rate

activities.name: Adagio Premium The Palm
activities.information:
Adagio Premium The Palm is ideally situated on Palm Jumeirah, Dubai's most prominent community, boasting chic studios and contemporary apartments with city views.

Relax in spacious serviced apartments, which feature fully-equipped kitchens, laundry facilities, a satellite flat-screen TV, sofa, and desk. There is a private bathroom with showers in all units, along with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Lounge at the private beach, enjoy the rooftop pool, or get fit in the 24-hour gym.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 163
  • Eating & drinking: 1 restaurant
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, fitness center, and a private beach area

activities.name: Ramada by Wyndham Downtown Dubai
activities.information:
Ramada Downtown Dubai is situated right next to Dubai Opera, overlooking the Burj Khalifa and Dubai Fountain.

Guests can enjoy downtown living in 181 suites, consisting of studio rooms, one and two-bedroom suites, and a magnificent penthouse.

Rooms are spacious with elegantly designed interiors, fully furnished with a fully-equipped kitchen, dishwasher, laundry facilities, and a private bathroom with a rain shower for home-like convenience.

Facilities include a temperature-controlled outdoor swimming pool, gym, steam room, badminton court, kids’ pool, and children’s outdoor and indoor play areas.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 181
  • Food & beverage: 1 restaurant
  • Facilities: 2 pools, fitness center, badminton court
  • Our Favorite Thing: Room Service is available 24 hours

activities.name: DoubleTree by Hilton Jumeirah Beach
activities.information:
Opened in 2014, DoubleTree by Hilton Dubai Jumeirah Beach is located on The Walk, a bustling waterfront promenade in the heart of Jumeirah Beach Residences. This upscale all-suite hotel offers private access to the beach, beach cabanas, and the private pool. 

All suites have private balconies with views of the Arabian Gulf or Dubai Marina. Spacious family suites offer a fully-equipped kitchen, which includes a fridge, stove, microwave, basic cooking utensils, crockery, and cutlery, complete with a dining and living room.

  • Number of apartments: 225
  • Food & beverage: 3 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Outdoor pool, spa, fitness center, private beach, salon
  • Our Favorite Thing: Direct beachfront access

activities.name: Hilton Dubai The Walk
activities.information:
Hilton Dubai The Walk is steps away from entertainment, dining, and shopping at The Beach JBR. Options range from studios to 4-bedroom apartments and are perfect for families and guests looking for long-term stays.

Features include a fully-equipped kitchen, 24-hour room service, and stunning sea views overlooking Ain Dubai and the Palm Jumeirah. Hilton Dubai The Walk is connected to sister hotel Hilton Dubai Jumeirah via a footbridge, providing beach access and relaxing treatments at the spa. 

  • Number of rooms & suites: 364
  • Food & beverage: 4 restaurants/bars
  • Facilities: 2 pools, spa, fitness center, beach access
  • Our Favorite Thing: Views of Ain Dubai from Pure Sky Lounge on the 35th floor

activities.name: Radisson Blu Residence Dubai Marina
activities.information:
Radisson Blu Residence, Dubai Marina is a 10-minute walk to JBR Beach situated in the heart of Dubai Marina.

Stylish apartments feature minimalist design by Matteo Nunziati, with well-equipped kitchens, laundry services, and private balconies with panoramic views of Dubai Marina.

Facilities at the Radisson Blu Residence include a large outdoor pool, sauna, men's steam room, and a modern gym.

  • Number of apartments: 152   
  • Food & beverage: 1 restaurant
  • Facilities: Outdoor pool, fitness center 
  • Our Favorite Thing: Great location along Dubai Marina – a 10-minute walk to the beach
activities.pricing_content:

Stylish apartments feature minimalist design by Matteo Nunziati, with well-equipped kitchens, laundry services, and private balconies with panoramic views of Dubai Marina.

Facilities at the Radisson Blu Residence include a large outdoor pool, sauna, men's steam room, and a modern gym.

  • Number of apartments: 152   
  • Food & beverage: 1 restaurant
  • Facilities: Outdoor pool, fitness center 
  • Our Favorite Thing: Great location along Dubai Marina – a 10-minute walk to the beach

activities.name: Vida Dubai Marina
activities.information:
Situated in the heart of Dubai Marina along the idyllic waterfront promenade, Vida Dubai Marina & Yacht Club is at the center of the city’s very best culinary experiences and amazing nightlife.

Vida Dubai Marina & Yacht Club offers contemporary rooms with deluxe city-view rooms and executive Marina-view suites. Exceptional amenities include a state-of-the-art business center, social dining options, bespoke wellness experiences, and an outdoor infinity pool. You’re only a short walk away from Dubai Marina Mall, JBR Beach, and Bluewaters Island. 

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 158 rooms and suites
  • Food & Beverage: All-day dining at Origins, as well as coffee shop and cafe at Stage 2, and a pool bar
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool and fitness center, 24-hour front desk, and currency exchange for guests.
  • Our Favorite Thing: Cycle around Dubai Marina and the surrounding areas using their complimentary bikes

activities.name: SLS Dubai Hotel & Residences
activities.information:
Located in the Downtown district, SLS Dubai offers spectacular, unobstructed views of Dubai Creek and the world's tallest building, Burj Khalifa. It was designed by award-winning architects Aedas and interior designer Paul Bishop. 

Two rooftop infinity pools are situated on the 75th floor, offering incomparable 360-degree views. SLS Dubai presents world-class decor and world-renowned cuisine with an exciting nightlife venue on the rooftop.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 254 hotel rooms
  • Food & Beverage: 6 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: 3 Pools, Fitness Center, Ciel Spa
  • Our Favorite Thing: One of the best pools in Dubai

activities.name: W Dubai The Palm
activities.information:
Set on Palm Jumeirah, W Dubai presents 5-star service with a private beach and large outdoor swimming pool, including the lively WET Deck pool. 

Guest rooms offer panoramic sea views overlooking Palm Jumeirah and the Dubai Marina skyline, with a private balcony and modern furnishings. Dine at one of the 6 on-site restaurants, which serve a variety of Italian and Latin American dishes.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 347 guest rooms
  • Food & Beverage: 6 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: 2 swimming pools, fitness center, spa & wellness center, squash court
  • Our Favorite Thing: Torno Subito - a One MICHELIN Star Italian restaurant

activities.name: FIVE Palm Jumeirah
activities.information:
FIVE Palm Jumeirah Dubai boasts its own stretch of private beach, including a 55-meter-long pool running through the heart of the resort. 

Enjoy a wide selection of restaurants and entertainment, with an impressive line-up of DJs throughout the year.

Five Palm Jumeirah is the place to let go and live.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 470 guest rooms and suites
  • Food & Beverage: 9 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Private beach, 2 outdoor pools, fitness center, spa & wellness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: The lively atmosphere and entertainment

activities.name: Five Luxe
activities.information:
Five Luxe JBR invites guests to indulge in an ultra-luxurious beachfront experience. With the globally renowned Pacha Playa Beach Club, stunning beach views, and upscale amenities, it's the ultimate destination for a lively retreat.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 231 suites & 100 opulent serviced apartments
  • Food & Beverage: Ronin, Tete A Tete, Paradiso, Goose Island Tap House, Playa Pacha
  • Facilities: Pool, gymnasium, fitness center, garden, spa, private beach, beach club, and bar

activities.name: 25hours Hotel One Central
activities.information:
25hours Hotel One Central is conveniently located near the bustling Dubai International Financial Centre and Dubai World Trade Centre, overlooking The Museum of the Future.

Rooms and suites are cozy and well-designed for comfort and practicality. Features include modern tech, 5-meter-high ceilings, and large windows so you can enjoy the breathtaking views. Guests have access to a co-working space, open pantry, and coffee bar at the gallery on the first floor. Five characterful restaurants and bars take guests on a culinary trip around the world.

With a bright, airy, industrial feel, this hotel provides the perfect setting for creative thinking, productive discussions, or special occasions. 

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 434 rooms and suites
  • Food & Beverage: 5 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, fitness center, spa and wellness center, ladies salon, pottery studio, and games room
  • Our Favorite Thing: The outdoor pool overlooking The Museum of the Future

activities.name: Grosvenor House, a Luxury Collection Hotel
activities.information:
Located on Dubai Marina promenade, the 5-star Grosvenor House comprises 2 unique twin towers, an instantly recognizable landmark of the Dubai Marina.

The modern suites offer floor-to-ceiling windows, personalized butler service, marble bathrooms with Byredo amenities (a soaking tub and rain shower), and panoramic views of Dubai Marina.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 750 hotel rooms, suites, and apartments
  • Food & beverage: 10 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: 2 swimming pools, spa & wellness center, fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Guests have full access to the beach, pool, and leisure facilities at Grosvenor's sister hotel, Le Royal Meridien Beach Resort & Spa.
activities.pricing_content:

  • Our Favorite Thing: Guests have full access to the beach, pool, and leisure facilities at Grosvenor's sister hotel, Le Royal Meridien Beach Resort & Spa.

activities.name: Palazzo Versace Dubai
activities.information:
Reminiscent of a 16th century Italian Palace, Palazzo Versace Dubai features a lavish high ceiling entrance, beautifully landscaped gardens, and unobstructed views of the Dubai Creek and skyline.

Lavish rooms and suites are furnished with the Versace Home Collection. Serene views of the Dubai Creek or Jaddaf Waterfront can be enjoyed from a private balcony or terrace. 

Explore Versace-themed restaurants and bars and enjoy al fresco dining with views of the surrounding Dubai Creek. 

  • Number of rooms & suites: 150 rooms and 65 suites
  • Food & beverage: 9 restaurants/lounges/bars 
  • Facilities: 3 Outdoor pools, spa & wellness center, fitness center, salon, Versace Home, Kids’ club
  • Our Favorite Thing: Q’s Bar - Quincy Jones’ first ever bar, an intimate venue for live entertainment
activities.pricing_content:

activities.name: Habtoor Palace Dubai
activities.information:
Situated along the banks of Dubai Water Canal, Habtoor Palace is Dubai’s first-ever integrated urban resort.

Habtoor Palace Dubai features 52 elegantly decorated suites, including its flagship Sir Winston Churchill Suite and Bentley Suite. All guests have access to butler services, fine dining, and sprawling gardens.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 200 guest rooms, 52 suites
  • Food & Beverage: 6 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: 2 swimming pools, fitness center, spa and wellness center, tennis court, nightclub
  • Our Favorite Thing: The spectacular Las Vegas style theater show La Perle by Dragone
activities.pricing_content:

activities.name: Palace Downtown
activities.information:
This award-winning hotel, nestled on the Old Town Island's lakeside in Downtown Dubai, transforms vacations into unforgettable adventures. With its palatial oasis design featuring distinctive Arabesque architecture, it stands as a luxurious retreat at the heart of the city. Located in Downtown Dubai, it offers a remarkable setting for creating cherished memories.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 242 rooms & suites
  • Food & beverage: Al Bayt, Buhayra Lounge, Ewaan and Thiptara
  • Facilities: Outdoor pool, state-of-the-art fitness center, and spa
  • Our Favorite Thing: Overviewing Burj Khalifa views

activities.name: Kempinski Hotel Mall of the Emirates
activities.information:
The award-winning Kempinski Mall of the Emirates is connected to the Mall of the Emirates, where guests can enjoy over 700 shops and Ski Dubai. Features include the unique Aspen Ski Chalets, the only hotel room in the region with views of the ski slopes at Ski Dubai.

Discover many dining options, including authentic Levantine cuisine at Olea, Spanish tapas at Salero, and drinks at Noir.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 392 rooms & suites 20 Aspen Chalets
  • Food & beverage: 3 restaurants/lounges/bars 
  • Facilities: Swimming pool, spa & wellness center, fitness center, Ski Dubai
  • Our Favorite Thing: Direct access to the Mall of the Emirates and Ski Dubai
activities.pricing_content:

  • Number of rooms & suites: 392 rooms & suites 20 Aspen Chalets

activities.name: La Ville Hotel & Suites City Walk
activities.information:
The award-winning La Ville Hotel is a low-rise boutique hotel found in the heart of City Walk. Contemporary rooms and suites offer spectacular city views of Downtown Dubai and Burj Khalifa. 

Lounge at the rooftop infinity pool, or treat yourself to some retail therapy at the easily accessible outdoor mall City Walk, which is only a few steps away.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 77 rooms and 11 suites 
  • Food & beverage: 5 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: Rooftop infinity pool, fitness center, spa and wellness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: The stunning rooftop infinity pool

activities.name: JW Marriott Hotel Marina
activities.information:
Standing tall in the heart of Dubai’s most vibrant neighborhoods, JW Marriott Hotel Marina offers a premium stay with stunning views, world-class dining, and leisure facilities.

The hotel boasts a spectacular infinity pool with a selection of five restaurants and lounges. Enjoy Wane by Somiya, an exciting lounge and pool club offering innovative al fresco dining with live entertainment.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 200
  • Food & Beverage: 5 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: 2 swimming pools, fitness center, spa and wellness center, salon
  • Our Favorite Thing: Directly linked to Marina Mall

activities.name: The St. Regis Downtown Dubai
activities.information:
The St. Regis Downtown Dubai is set along the Dubai Water Canal in Business Bay and offers captivating views across the city skyline. Facilities include an indoor/outdoor swimming pool, international dining experiences, and the relaxing Six Senses Spa.

Spacious rooms and suites feature the latest in-room technology, natural lighting, and floor-to-ceiling windows, which showcase Burj Khalifa or Dubai Water Canal. Elegant bathrooms offer complimentary luxury Amouage amenities.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 200 rooms & suites
  • Food & beverage: 5 restaurants/lounges/bars 
  • Facilities: Indoor/outdoor pool, spa & wellness center, fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Bleu Blanc Oysters & Grill – a fantastic French dining experience

activities.name: Park Hyatt Dubai
activities.information:
Nestled within Dubai Creek Resort along the enchanting Dubai Creek, Park Hyatt Dubai offers a picturesque backdrop for indulgent retreats. With a selection of acclaimed dining venues and a world-class spa, Park Hyatt Dubai promises a meticulously crafted experience that exudes sophistication and luxury. Whether dining or pampering, every aspect of your stay is tailored to provide an exceptional and memorable escape.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 223 guest rooms and suites
  • Food & beverage: 12+ restaurants, bars and lounges
  • Facilities: Pool, fitness center, spa, golf club and meeting facilities
  • Our Favorite Thing: Idyllic setting with Dubai creek views

activities.name: Raffles Dubai
activities.information:
Inspired by the great pyramids of Egypt, Raffles Dubai is a stunning landmark in Dubai’s skyline. This award-winning hotel features spacious rooms and suites, each with a private balcony showcasing views of the Dubai skyline.

Raffles Dubai is connected to Wafi Mall and offers a wide selection of international cuisines, including the popular Japanese restaurant TOMO.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 252 rooms  
  • Food & beverage: 7 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: 2 swimming pools, fitness center, spa and wellness center, salon
  • Our Favorite Thing: Popular Japanese restaurant TOMO

activities.name: Nikki Beach Hotel & Resort
activities.information:
Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Dubai is located on Pearl Jumeira. Expect modern suites and villas with oceanfront views, complemented with neutral tones and mood lighting.

The spectacular beachfront setting is ideal for events, weddings, and social gatherings. World-class venues and dining include Nikki Beach Restaurant & Beach Club, Café Nikki, and Bungalow 34. 

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 17 rooms and suites, 15 villas with private pools
  • Food & Beverage: 3 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Private beach, outdoor swimming pool, salon, fitness center, spa & wellness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: One of the best beaches in Dubai

activities.name: Rixos Premium Dubai JBR
activities.information:
Located on JBR beach, Rixos Premium Dubai is a premier lifestyle hotel offering a seamless blend of a vibrant nightlife, lively pool parties, and casual beach vibes.

Stylish rooms and suites are spacious with floor-to-ceiling windows, boasting sea views overlooking Palm Jumeirah and Ain Dubai.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 414
  • Food & Beverage: 9 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: Private beach access, 2 pools, spa & fitness center
  • Our Favorite Thing: Direct beach access with views of Ain Dubai

activities.name: W Dubai The Palm
activities.information:
Set on Palm Jumeirah, W Dubai is a 5-star hotel with a private beach and large outdoor swimming pool including the lively WET Deck pool.

Guest rooms offer panoramic sea views overlooking The Palm, with a private balcony and modern furnishings. Dine at the 6 on-site restaurants, which serve a variety of Italian and Latin American dishes.

  • Number of rooms & suites: 347 guest rooms
  • Food & beverage: 6 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: 2 swimming pools, fitness center, spa & wellness center, squash court
  • Our Favorite Thing: WET Deck, a party pool club

activities.name: The Ritz Carlton Dubai
activities.information:
This Mediterranean-style retreat is set amongst landscaped gardens and a golden stretch of private beach in the heart of Jumeirah Beach Residences (JBR). 

The Ritz-Carlton JBR provides a sustainable initiative, having partnered with Green Container Advanced Farming (GCAF) to launch their own sustainable on-site hydroponic farm, which produces fresh produce and is one of the first-ever vertical farms in Dubai.

Guests can enjoy first-class spa facilities and six outdoor swimming pools with a golden stretch of private beach. The popular Dubai Marina district is only a 5-minute walk away.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 294
  • Food & Beverage: 9 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: 6 swimming pools, spa & fitness center, tennis courts, private cinema, kids' club, salon 
  • Our Favorite Thing: The hotel harvests a range of herbs, microgreens, lettuce, and other produce from its on-site hydroponic farm.

activities.name: Jumeirah Zabeel Saray
activities.information:
Jumeirah Zabeel Saray is a palatial luxury beachfront resort situated on the West Crescent of the world-famous Palm Jumeirah.

All rooms and suites are inspired by the imperial palaces of the Ottoman era, including the Royal Residences, which certainly live up to their regal name. Relax and unwind at the exclusive Talise Ottoman Spa, featuring the Middle East’s largest Turkish bath.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 379 rooms and 26 lavish suites
  • Food & Beverage: 9 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: 2 pools, spa & fitness center, tennis courts, private cinema, Sinbad-themed kids' area
  • Our Favorite Thing: The award-winning Talise Ottoman Spa

activities.name: Waldorf Astoria Dubai Palm Jumeirah
activities.information:
Situated on the world-famous Palm Jumeirah, Waldorf Astoria Dubai Palm Jumeirah offers 200 meters of private beach with luxury sea-facing guest rooms and suites.

All spacious rooms and suites feature contemporary furnishings with signature Waldorf Astoria beds. Large balconies provide stunning sea views of the Arabian Gulf.

Guests can select from 6 restaurants and bars for a diverse dining experience. 

  • Number of rooms & suites: 319
  • Food & beverage: 6 restaurants/bars/lounges
  • Facilities: 2 swimming pools, Waldorf Astoria Spa, fitness center, kids club, tennis courts
  • Our Favorite Thing: Waldorf Astoria Spa with nearly 50 luxurious treatments

activities.name: Sofitel Dubai The Palm
activities.information:
Situated on the iconic Palm Jumeirah, Sofitel Dubai The Palm Resort & Spa is a Polynesian island-style resort with a touch of French elegance. Rooms and suites are modern and spacious, offering fantastic views overlooking the pool and beach area.

Discover the resort's 12 restaurants, bars, and lounges providing various cuisines from around the globe. Guests can relax and unwind at the private beach, 6 pools, and the award-winning Sofitel Spa.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 361
  • Food & Beverage: 12 restaurants/bars/lounge
  • Facilities: Private Beach, 6 pools, spa and fitness center, Amura Kids Club, tennis courts
  • Our Favorite Thing: Sofitel SPA with L’Occitane

activities.name: Marriott Palm West Beach
activities.information:
Located along the beachfront of the iconic Palm Jumeirah, the first Marriott Resort in Dubai caters to leisure seekers and business travelers. Guest rooms offer private balconies, 24-hour room service, and stunning sea views. Luxury amenities include the resort’s beachside pool, private beach area, fitness center, and the relaxing Saray Spa.

Popular beachfront promenade Palm West Beach is only steps away, where guests can relax on the beach, swim, enjoy water sports, and explore the restaurants along the promenade.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 608 guest rooms and suites
  • Food & Beverage: 10 restaurants which include Korean, Italian, Japanese, and Mexican cuisines.
  • Facilities: Outdoor swimming pool, private beach area, fitness center, Saray Spa, and Kids Club
  • Our Favorite Thing: Located on the popular beachfront promenade Palm West Beach

activities.name: Hilton Palm West Beach
activities.information:
Located on Palm West Beach on the exclusive Palm Jumeirah, this luxury beachfront resort boasts 10 bars & restaurants, a private beach, eforea spa, ocean-view pool, and much more. All 608 rooms have balconies or terraces to take in breathtaking views of the Arabian Gulf & glittering Dubai Marina skyline. 

Located at the entrance of the Palm Jumeirah, guests have easy access to the heart of Dubai, with The Walk at JBR located 3.4 km away and Aquaventure Waterpark 4 km away.

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 608 trendy rooms & suites
  • Food & Beverage: 9 restaurants, bars, lounges
  • Facilities: Outdoor pool, private beach, spa, fitness center, kids club 
  • Our Favorite Thing: Located on the vibrant Palm West Beach

activities.name: Taj Exotica Resort & Spa The Palm
activities.information:
Taj Exotica Resort & Spa, situated on the eastern crescent of the iconic Palm Jumeirah, provides contemporary rooms and suites with sea-facing balconies.

Enjoy 230 meters of private beach or a day in the sun at the longest swimming pool on Palm Jumeirah. Unwind at the award-winning Jiva Spa, where guests can enjoy Ayurvedic treatments for a truly refreshing experience. Dining options include British and Indian cuisine with scenic ocean views. 

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 258 rooms and 67 suites
  • Food & Beverage: 5 restaurants/lounges/bars
  • Facilities: Fitness center, tennis court, beachfront, 1 swimming pool, spa
  • Our Favorite Thing: The longest swimming pool on Palm Jumeirah
activities.pricing_content: as well as holistic wellness experiences, advanced sporting facilities

activities.name: Th8 Palm Hotel
activities.information:
Th8 Palm by House Of Originals provides contemporary rooms and suites with picturesque skyline views on Palm Jumeirah. This 5-star resort features a lush garden, beach club, and children's playground. 

  • Number of Rooms & Suites: 161 boutique rooms & suites
  • Food & Beverage: 3 restaurants, bars, lounges
  • Facilities: Pool, beach club, spa, beachfront, gym, basketball court, kids play area 
  • Our Favorite Thing: Fluid Beach Club

activities.name: Sirene by Gaia

activities.information:
Sirene by Gaia captures the essence of Mediterranean luxury, nestled along Dubai's picturesque shoreline. Featuring a menu that celebrates the freshest seafood and vibrant Mediterranean flavors, the restaurant offers a refined yet relaxed dining experience. With its elegant design and breathtaking ocean views, Sirene by Gaia is the perfect destination for romantic dinners, leisurely lunches, or stylish seaside gatherings.

  • Our Favorite Thing: Greek Ambiance
  • Our Favorite Menu Item: The Sea Bream Carpaccio

Dress Code: Smart Casual / Smart Elegant

Entry & Age Policy: Guests below the age of 21 are allowed in the restaurant until 9 PM only; after that, the venue is for 21 and above only. In the beach area, all ages are welcome as long as accompanied by an adult. Pool access is restricted to 21 and above only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required – a cancellation/no-show fee of AED 250 per guest applies.

Minimum Spend Policy: Requires to have a full dining experience.

Offering an exquisite menu inspired by Southeast Asian flavors, the restaurant blends innovative dishes with artful presentation. With stunning views of the Burj Khalifa and a sophisticated ambiance, Tang is an ideal destination for intimate dinners or memorable celebrations.

Il Gattopardo captures the charm of classic Italian dining in Dubai, presenting a refined menu that celebrates the rich, authentic flavors of Italy. Located in the heart of DIFC, the restaurant combines exquisite cuisine, sophisticated interiors, and warm hospitality. Whether for a romantic dinner or a business gathering, Il Gattopardo offers an authentic Italian experience with a modern touch.

  • Our Favorite Menu Item: Vitello Tonnato

Dress Code: Smart Casual

Entry & Age Policy: Children of all ages are welcome during lunch and dinner until 9:30 PM in the restaurant dining area. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required for group reservations of 10+ guests for lunch and 5+ guests for dinner. A cancellation/no-show fee of AED 200 + 7% DIFC Fee per guest applies.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.

Situated in DIFC, the restaurant radiates chic Parisian charm with a modern twist. With its innovative dishes and an extensive cocktail menu, Bar Des Prés is an ideal destination for an elevated dining experience or a stylish night out.
