activities.name: Ce La Vi
activities.timing_content:
Restaurant: Daily 12 PM - 4 PM / 6 PM - 12:30 AM

Club Lounge: Daily 6 PM - 3 AM

Skybar: Daily 12 PM - 3 AM

Ladies' Night: Tuesday 10 PM - 2 AM
activities.information:
CÉ LA VI sits on the 54th floor of Address Sky View Hotel Downtown. Originating from Singapore, this iconic rooftop lounge provides stunning views of Burj Khalifa, the tallest building in the world, while featuring a 360-degree outdoor dining terrace. Indulge in contemporary Asian cuisine created by Executive Chef Howard Ko. 

Dress Code: Smart Casual - shorts are permitted during lunch only. 

Timings: Tuesday 10 PM - 2 AM

Entry & Age Policy: All ages are welcome for lunch. For dinner, guests aged 7 and above are permitted from 6 PM to 11 PM. After 11 PM, the venue is restricted to guests aged 21 and above. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required – a cancellation/no-show fee of AED 150 per guest applies.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.
activities.pricing_content:
Ladies: AED 150 per person with unlimited selected beverages.

*Please note limited spots are available and advanced bookings are required.

activities.name: Salmon Guru
activities.timing_content:
Daily 12:30 PM - 2 AM

Ladies' Night: Tuesday 8:30 PM - 11:30 PM
activities.information:
The award-winning bar and restaurant Salmon Guru hails from Madrid. It's often ranked within the World’s 50 Best Bars and is well-known for its quirky cocktail experience and fabulous tapas.

Set on the ground floor of the ME Hotel in Business Bay, Salmon Guru serves a mixture of exotic flavors and drinks. It's sure to give you a unique Dubai experience.

Dress Code: Smart Casual 

Timings: Tuesday, 8:30 PM - 11:30 PM

Entry & Age Policy: The venue is restricted to guests aged 21 years and above. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Not required

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.
activities.pricing_content: Ladies: AED 150 Unlimited drinks and 2 starters for sharing

activities.name: Bar Du Port
activities.timing_content:
Sunday to Thursday 4 PM - 2 AM

Friday 4 PM - 3 AM

Saturday 1 PM - 3 AM

Ladies' Night: Wednesday 7 PM - 1 AM
activities.information:
Situated at Dubai Harbour, Bar Du Port showcases French-influenced coastal cuisine with hand-crafted cocktails, devised by executive chef Hadi Saroufim. The stylish bar and restaurant is one of the first outlets to open on the new waterfront development, Dubai Harbour. Bar Du Port features a spacious outdoor terrace, live music and impressive views of Dubai Marina.

﻿Dress Code: Day Casual - Evening Casual Chic

Timings: Wednesday 7 PM - 1 AM

Entry & Age Policy: The venue is restricted for guests aged 21 and above only. The venue only accepts table reservations for the bar for groups of 4 or more. For parties with fewer than 4 guests, walk-ins are welcome but subject to availability. Entry for the bar is permitted for mixed groups, couples, or all-ladies groups only. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Not required

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.
activities.pricing_content: Ladies: AED 230 per person two starters, dessert, and two hours of free-flowing beverages.

activities.name: The MAINE Oyster Bar & Grill

Daily 12 PM - 12 AM

Ladies' Night: Wednesday 8 PM - 12 AM
activities.information:
The Maine, located in JBR, offers an American bar and grill experience. This New England-inspired brasserie usually features live music. The ladies night at the Maine has been going strong for many years and is considered a Dubai ladies night institution.

Dress Code: Casual

Timings: Wednesday 8 PM - 12 AM

Entry & Age Policy: Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

activities.information:
Jass Lounge takes you on a soulful journey of classic jazz music, located in the heart of Dubai International Financial Centre (DIFC). The intimate venue celebrates the history of jazz, featuring soothing soul music, funk, and blues, and serving expertly crafted cocktails with an impressive collection of the finest spirits.

Wednesday, Thursday, and Sunday: 8 PM - 9 PM / 9:30 PM - 10:30 PM / 11 PM - 12 AM

Friday and Saturday: 8:30 PM - 9:30 PM / 10 PM - 11 PM / 11:30 PM - 12:30 AM
activities.information:
Q’s Bar and Lounge at Palazzo Versace Hotel is one of Dubai’s most exclusive venues for live jazz music. Versace-designed leather sofas, mahogany tables, and unmatched acoustics provide an old-world charm for an intimate night of jazz and blues.

Dress Code: Smart Casual

Timings: Live Music Nights - Wednesday to Sunday from 8 PM / 8:30 PM

Entry & Age Policy: The venue is restricted to guests aged 21 and above. Guests over the age of 21 are permitted to consume alcohol.a

Entrance is subject to management's sole discretion.

Credit Card Policy: Required for group reservations of 8 guests and above - a pre-payment (depending on the number of guests) applies. For Front seat - AED 2,000 holding fee per reservation, usable as venue credit; any remaining balance will be refunded. Non-refundable in case of late cancellation or no-show.

Minimum Spend Policy: AED 250 per guest on Wednesday and Thursday / AED 350 per guest from Friday to Sunday.

*The venue’s menu, prices, reservation policy, etc. can change at any time. We take no responsibility for any changes.
